summary_a1m3_1_001.cn: 你在工人之家见到了卡莉。了解后才知道，原来卡莉想和你一起画一本能让大家开心的故事书。
summary_a1m3_1_001.en: You meet Carly in the Worker Dorms and learn that she wants to make a storybook that will bring joy to everyone.

summary_a1m4_1_001.cn: 你在枢纽区基地见到了热情的赛尔乔·莱昂，她邀请你体验改编自真实事件的作品《影拓丰碑》。
summary_a1m4_1_001.en: You meet Sergio Leon at the Hub Base. She's buzzing with excitement and invites you to check out her adaptation of real-life events, titled "Umbral Monument".

summary_c13m1_1_001.cn: 洁尔佩塔独自飘浮在空中，看着眼前的信纸发呆，身边还有许多货物。在询问后得知，四号谷地人手不足，她正在帮忙送货，也希望能让这里的人们重新振作精神。在她的邀请下，你决定帮她一起送货。
summary_c13m1_1_001.en: Gilberta floats alone in the air, staring blankly at the letter in her hand, surrounded by cargo. After asking, you learn that Valley IV is short handed. She is helping with deliveries while hoping to lift everyone's spirits. At her invitation, you decide to join her in making the rounds.

summary_c13m1_3_001.cn: 你与洁尔佩塔一起完成了调味剂的递送。收到包裹的工作人员大受感动。
summary_c13m1_3_001.en: You deliver the condiments with Gilberta. The recipient is extremely touched.

summary_c13m1_5_001.cn: 你与洁尔佩塔一起把精密零件递送给了安德烈，并从他口中得知，离心机明天就能顺利启动了。
summary_c13m1_5_001.en: You deliver the precision parts to Andre with Gilberta. His centrifuge can finally start working tomorrow.

summary_c13m1_7_001.cn: 你与洁尔佩塔一起把医疗物资递送给了米格尔，缓解了医疗物资短缺的压力。米格尔提到卡莉不愿意打针，洁尔佩塔打算先去找到卡莉。
summary_c13m1_7_001.en: You and Gilberta deliver the medical supplies to Miguel. The medical staff no longer needs to worry about a shortage of medication. Miguel says Carly refused to get her injections. Gilberta wants to find Carly first.

summary_c13m2_10_001.cn: 你们俯瞰着谷地，伤痕被刻在了这片土地上。
summary_c13m2_10_001.en: Your gazes sweep across the entire Valley, the wounds of the land lay bare for you to see.

summary_c13m2_12_001.cn: 卡莉告诉你和洁尔佩塔，她迷上了摄影，却怎么也拍不好。你提议去拍摄她喜欢的事物，卡莉则想让你为她和洁尔佩塔拍摄合影。
summary_c13m2_12_001.en: Carly tells you and Gilberta how she got started on photography. However, she does not know how to take a nice photo. You tell Carly to photograph things she likes. Carly wants you to take a photo of her with Gilberta.

summary_c13m2_20_001.cn: 你帮助卡莉拍摄了她和洁尔佩塔的合影，卡莉找到了想拍的事物，心满意足地回了医务室。
summary_c13m2_20_001.en: You help take a photo of Carly with Gilberta. Carly finds out what she wants to photograph, and happily heads back to the medical bay.

summary_c13m2_4_001.cn: 洁尔佩塔为自己没能更多地帮助饱受苦难的人们而感到自责，她决定前去寻找安德烈所需的过滤装置。
summary_c13m2_4_001.en: Gilberta blames herself for failing the people at the Power Plant. She decides to help look for the water purifier Andre needs.

summary_c13m2_5_001.cn: 工团的成员封锁了前方区域，在管理员斡旋下，封锁区域的负责人给了你们一段时间进行寻找。
summary_c13m2_5_001.en: Members of the UWST have blocked off the area ahead. Through your negotiations, the person in charge of the blocked off area has given you a limited time to search.

summary_c13m3_10_001.cn: 洁尔佩塔发现了女研究员的日记，她因侵蚀研究影响了记忆，在独自完成研究的过程中遗忘了所有，过去的日记成了她恐惧的源头。洁尔佩塔想到了自己，她也看过不一样的“记忆”。在你的安慰下，她决定坦然面对一切。
summary_c13m3_10_001.en: Gilberta finds the female researcher's diary. Her memory was damaged by Blight studies, and while working alone she forgot everything. Her old diaries became sources of fear. Gilberta sees herself in this. She's also seen different "memories." With your comfort, she decides to face it all head on.

summary_c13m3_13_001.cn: 你和洁尔佩塔从空中落下，她希望你能先行保管这封空白的信，等到她想好写满什么样的内容。你们二人就此定下约定。
summary_c13m3_13_001.en: You and Gilberta descend from the sky. She asks you to hold onto this blank letter until she figures out what to fill it with. The two of you make this promise right there.

summary_c13m3_1_001.cn: 你和洁尔佩塔取得了可能锁有过滤装置的保险柜，但没有开启它的密码。你们最终决定前往医务室，看看知晓密码的罗普目前的情况。
summary_c13m3_1_001.en: Although you and Gilberta have retrieved the safe that might contain the filter, no one has the password. Ropp is the owner of the safe and should know the password. Thus, you decide to head to the medical bay and see how the scientist is doing.

summary_c13m3_2_001.cn: 神志不清的罗普反复念叨着“小美”，这个名字对他而言似乎非常重要。
summary_c13m3_2_001.en: Though unconscious, Ropp is constantly mumbling the word "MASIE". This sounds like the name of someone very important to him.

summary_c13m3_4_001.cn: 这位工团成员没有听过“小美”，但提到罗普曾和一个神秘的女孩走得很近。可女孩很快就消失了。她告诉我们抢救回的文件的位置，或许那里面会有罗普相关的线索。
summary_c13m3_4_001.en: The worker doesn't know any "Masie," but she says Ropp used to hang around with some mysterious girl who disappeared soon after. She points you to where they stashed the rescued files... There might be some Ropp leads in there

summary_c13m3_5_001.cn: 工团的老人也没见过和罗普走得近的女孩，但罗普曾有一台遗失的终端存放在失物招领处。老人建议你们查查看。
summary_c13m3_5_001.en: Even the old timers at the UWST haven't seen any girl hanging around Ropp. But they mentioned he had a lost terminal sitting in the lost and found. The elder suggests you check it out.

summary_c13m3_7_001.cn: 你解除了保险柜的锁定。除了过滤装置，保险柜里还放着一封信。
summary_c13m3_7_001.en: You unlock the safe. It contains the filter as well as a letter.

summary_c13m3_8_001.cn: 罗普苏醒了，他告诉你们，“小美”其实是他和一名神秘女研究员的实验成果——一个侵蚀物质过滤装置。罗普非常珍视和那位研究员共度的时光，但对方却突然不辞而别，这令他意志消沉。你们带回来的信让他重新燃起了希望。
summary_c13m3_8_001.en: Ropp is awake. He says "Masie" was actually an experimental project he worked on with a mysterious female researcher: a Blight matter filtration device. Ropp cherished the time they spent together, but she left without saying goodbye, which crushed his spirit. That letter you brought has given him hope again.

summary_c13m3_9_001.cn: 用水问题得到解决，众人聚在一起庆祝。
summary_c13m3_9_001.en: Water's running again! Everyone's gathering to celebrate.

summary_c16m1_1_001.cn: 回到帝江号的静滞核心后，你在佩丽卡的协助下试图回忆起些什么，结果依然一无所获。突然，你看到了一道神秘的火光……
summary_c16m1_1_001.en: You return to the Stasis Core aboard Dijiang. With Perlica's assistance, you attempt to recover some of your memories. There is nothing at first, but then you suddenly catch a glimpse of a mysterious flame...

summary_c16m1_3_001.cn: 被神秘的痕迹所吸引，你来到了一片陌生的冰原，并在这里遇到了一位红发萨卡兹少女。得知你迷路后，她愿意带你走出这里。
summary_c16m1_3_001.en: Mysterious traces caught your attention and you suddenly find yourself in an unfamiliar icefield. You then meet a red-haired Sarkaz girl. She learns that you are lost and agrees to lead you out of the place.

summary_c16m1_4_001.cn: 你发现这里是一处散布着记忆碎片的协议空间，而那位红发少女希望能在此找到她失去的记忆。
summary_c16m1_4_001.en: You discover that this is a Protocol Space strewn with fragments of memories. The red-haired girl wants to find her lost memories in this place.

summary_c16m1_4d5_001.cn: 红发少女看到了一段关于自己的描述——那时她曾深入雪原，寻找属于她的记忆。
summary_c16m1_4d5_001.en: The red-haired girl sees writing that describes her. She once ventured into an icefield in search of her own memories.

summary_c16m1_4d7_001.cn: 一篇描述火焰崇拜的祷文，让红发少女想起了一段与火焰和大剑有关的往事，但她并不确定这段记忆是否真正属于她。
summary_c16m1_4d7_001.en: A prayer about the worship of fire. It reminds the red-haired girl of fire and a greatsword. However, she is uncertain if this memory belongs to her.

summary_c16m1_4d8_001.cn: 一首有关阵亡战士的短诗，让红发少女想起了曾在雪原上战斗的模糊经历。
summary_c16m1_4d8_001.en: A short poem about fallen warriors. It gives the red-haired girl fuzzy memories of fighting in a snowy icefield.

summary_c16m1_4d9_001.cn: 这段铭文描述了一把会反噬主人的火焰之剑，好像与红发少女手里的剑有所关联，但更多的细节仍然无法查明。
summary_c16m1_4d9_001.en: The engravings describe a flaming sword cursed to devour its wielder. The weapon seems related to the sword wielded by the red-haired girl. However, you fail to gather other details.

summary_c16m1_5_001.cn: 和红发少女有着相同容貌的诡异幻影在这里出现，试图阻止红发少女寻回记忆，战斗随即展开。
summary_c16m1_5_001.en: A strange illusion sharing the exact likeness of the red-haired girl appears. The illusion attempts to stop the red-haired girl from recovering her memories. A battle then commences.

summary_c16m1_6_001.cn: 红发少女解释道，方才遇到幻影曾多次阻挠她。接下来她要追上那个幻影，寻回记忆。在确认你管理员的身份之后，她独自离开，继续寻找记忆去了。
summary_c16m1_6_001.en: The red-haired girl explains that the illusion has attempted to stop her many times. She intends to chase down the illusion and recover the past. After confirming your identity as the Endministrator, she sets off on her own and continues her search for memories.

summary_c16m1_8_001.cn: 你离开协议空间，在静滞核心中醒来。在了解刚才发生的怪事之后，佩丽卡展开了调查。此时，联络员菲奥娜报告，神秘的火光伴随陌生的源石反应在四号谷地出现，你怀疑与那位红发少女有关，决定前去一探究竟。
summary_c16m1_8_001.en: You leave the Protocol Space and wake up in the Stasis Core. Perlica learns about your encounter and starts looking into this matter. Meanwhile, Fiona the comms officer reports the sighting of mysterious fires and strange Originium reactions in Valley IV. You suspect this is associated with the red-haired girl and decide to investigate.

summary_c16m2_1d5_001.cn: 红发少女似乎想要借助长耳兽寻找她的家乡，但没有成功。
summary_c16m2_1d5_001.en: The red-haired girl wants to use the long-ears to help find her home, but it does not seem to be working.

summary_c16m2_1d7_001.cn: 红发少女发现了一些过去的记录，但这些并非她想要寻找的记忆。
summary_c16m2_1d7_001.en: The red-haired girl finds some records from the past. However, they are not the memories she is looking for.

summary_c16m2_1d8_001.cn: 红发少女为找不到“家”的记忆而感到失望。她决定前往世代摇篮，继续这段寻找记忆的旅程。
summary_c16m2_1d8_001.en: The red-haired girl is disappointed when she fails to find memories about "home". She decides to continue her search at the Cradle of the Ages.

summary_c16m3_12_001.cn: 你们没有共同进入下一个协议空间。你决定想办法找到莱万汀。
summary_c16m3_12_001.en: You realize you did not enter the next Protocol Space together, and decide to go look for Laevatain.

summary_c16m3_2_001.cn: 已被打败的罗丹突然出现在协议空间里，并试图再度逞凶。面对不该出现在此处的他，你陷入困惑。幸好莱万汀及时出现，帮助你打破了假象。
summary_c16m3_2_001.en: Rhodagn, whom you have defeated before, makes a sudden appearance in the Protocol Space and attempts violence again. You are confused by his totally unexpected presence. Fortunately, Laevatain enters the place in time and helps you defeat this illusion.

summary_c16m3_3_001.cn: 得知你再次进入协议空间的目的之后，莱万汀提醒你留心被扭曲的、虚假的记忆，并宣布你已经是她寻找记忆的同行者。
summary_c16m3_3_001.en: After learning your aim for re-entering the Protocol Space, Laevatain warns you of twisted and false memories. She formally makes you her fellow companion in her memory search.

summary_c16m3_4_001.cn: 刚才的假象源自你失去记忆后对自己“管理员”身份的怀疑，而莱万汀也同样为类似的问题感到困扰，于是你们彼此相互安慰。
summary_c16m3_4_001.en: The illusion arose from your doubts in your role as the Endministrator. Laevatain is also troubled by a similar problem. The two of you try to comfort each other.

summary_c16m3_5_001.cn: 从被扭曲的记忆中，莱万汀看出了你内心害怕着些什么。
summary_c16m3_5_001.en: Laevatain identifies your inner fears from the twisted memory.

summary_c16m3_6_001.cn: 另一个“你”出现在你们面前，并宣称塔卫二不值得被拯救。这让你陷入了震惊与迷茫。在莱万汀的鼓励下，你决心打破这个假象。
summary_c16m3_6_001.en: The other "you" appears before you and declares that Talos-II deserves no redemption. You are shocked and confused. With Laevatain's encouragement, you become determined to dispel this illusion.

summary_c16m3_7_001.cn: 失去记忆的你，为自己能否真正成为“管理员”而感到担忧。为混乱记忆所困的莱万汀邀请你同行，你们就此立下互相帮助对方找回记忆的约定。
summary_c16m3_7_001.en: Due to your amnesia, you are worried if you have what it takes to become the true "Endministrator". Laevatain, who is also afflicted with polymnestic confusion, invites you to travel with her. And thus the two of you make a promise to help each other recover memories that truly belong to you.

summary_c16m4_12_001.cn: 莱万汀与你一起回到了帝江号。她决定作为你的干员留在这里，继续履行同伴的承诺，而你也要为她创造新的记忆。
summary_c16m4_12_001.en: Laevatain and you return to Dijiang together. She decides to stay, become an operator, and fulfill her promise to a fellow companion. She also expects you to create memorable moments with her.

summary_c16m4_1_001.cn: 在佩丽卡和菲奥娜的帮助下，你决定再次借助协议奇点，循着莱万汀在四号谷地留下的痕迹进入她所在的协议空间。
summary_c16m4_1_001.en: With Perlica and Fiona's help, you decide to use the Protocol Singularity to follow Laevatain's trail left across Valley IV and enter the Protocol Space where she is.

summary_c16m4_2_001.cn: 你和莱万汀在协议空间中会合，共同踏上寻找记忆的旅程。
summary_c16m4_2_001.en: Laevatain and you meet in the Protocol Space. Together, you start your memory-searching journey.

summary_c16m4_2d5_001.cn: 莱万汀的幻影在房间中出现，质疑莱万汀无法从记忆中找到存在的意义，但莱万汀不愿意就此放弃。
summary_c16m4_2d5_001.en: The illusion of Laevatain suddenly appears in the room and doubts if Laevatain could ever find her raison d'être from her memories. However, Laevatain does not intend to give up like this.

summary_c16m4_33_001.cn: 阿吉的幻影在这里出现，勾起了莱万汀脑海中的回忆，但这段记忆实际上并不属于她。
summary_c16m4_33_001.en: An illusion of Ginny appears and it triggers a memory fragment within Laevatain's mind. Unfortunately, that fragment is not hers to begin with.

summary_c16m4_34_001.cn: 裂地者的幻影在这里出现，让莱万汀再度为“不属于自己的记忆”所困扰。
summary_c16m4_34_001.en: An illusion of a Landbreaker appears. Laevatain is once again confused by seeing a "memory that is not hers".

summary_c16m4_35_001.cn: 莱万汀的身体因协议空间而受到了损伤，但她依然决心在这里找到真正属于自己的记忆。
summary_c16m4_35_001.en: Laevatain has been injured in her dive into the Protocol Space. However, she remains determined to locate her true memories here.

summary_c16m4_36_001.cn: 你被幻影所阻挡。描述了莱万汀的色彩之后，你得到指引，继续寻找她。
summary_c16m4_36_001.en: An illusion blocks your way. After describing Laevatain's color, you receive directions to look for her.

summary_c16m4_37_001.cn: 你被幻影所阻挡。告知莱万汀的名字之后，你得到新的指引，继续寻找她。
summary_c16m4_37_001.en: The illusions block your way. You share Laevatain's name and receive a new instruction. You then continue your search for her.

summary_c16m4_38_001.cn: 你向幻影打听莱万汀的踪迹。说出莱万汀的目的之后，你得到了幻影的帮助。
summary_c16m4_38_001.en: You ask the illusion for Laevatain's whereabouts. When you speak about Laevatain's goals, the illusion agrees to help.

summary_c16m4_39_001.cn: 莱万汀的幻影再度出现，试图说服你放弃莱万汀。
summary_c16m4_39_001.en: Illusion of Laevatain appears once more and persuades you to give up on her.

summary_c16m4_6_001.cn: 莱万汀感觉到史尔特尔“家乡”的所在，不顾一切地冲了出去。
summary_c16m4_6_001.en: Laevatain feels the existence of Surtr's "home" and rushes forth without thinking.

summary_c16m4_6d8_001.cn: 莱万汀已经到达了记忆的尽头，但仍然没有在“家乡”找到关于自己是谁的答案。你帮助面临崩溃危机的莱万汀重拾希望，向史尔特尔留下的“答案”进发。
summary_c16m4_6d8_001.en: Laevatain has reached the end of her memories, but she failed to find out who she was from "home". You give hope to Laevatain who is on the brink of breaking down. Together, you follow Surtr's "answer" and press forward.

summary_c16m4_7_001.cn: 你和莱万汀看到了史尔特尔最后的“答案”——她把罗德岛当作了自己的“家”，就此放下了过去的记忆。你邀请莱万汀前往终末地，希望以同样的方式帮助她解开心结。
summary_c16m4_7_001.en: You and Laevatain witness Surtr's final "answer" — she finally left her past memories behind and treated Rhodes Island as "home". You hope to use the same approach to solve Laevatain's dilemma and invite her to Endfield Industries.

summary_c16m4_7d5_001.cn: 这是一段史尔特尔珍视的记忆，她驯服了体内的火焰巨人，之后展开了游历和冒险之旅。
summary_c16m4_7d5_001.en: Surtr's treasured memory fragment. It is about her taming of the flaming giant and how she started her journey and adventures.

summary_c16m4_7d7_001.cn: 这是一段史尔特尔珍视的记忆，关于她心心念念的冰淇淋。
summary_c16m4_7d7_001.en: Surtr's treasured memory fragment. It is about ice cream and how deeply she cares about it.

summary_c16m4_7d8_001.cn: 这是一段史尔特尔珍视的记忆，关于她加入罗德岛时的经历。
summary_c16m4_7d8_001.en: Surtr's treasured memory fragment. It is about her experiences of joining Rhodes Island.

summary_c16m4_8_001.cn: 此处残余的记忆不甘被抛弃，于是转化为敌人，阻止你和莱万汀离开。
summary_c16m4_8_001.en: The remaining memory fragments refuse to be left behind. They turn hostile and try to stop you and Laevatain from leaving.

summary_c16m4_9_001.cn: 莱万汀下定决心，与剩余的记忆告别。
summary_c16m4_9_001.en: Laevatain is determined to say goodbye to the rest of her memories.

summary_c17m1_2_001.cn: 你找到了包裹，工人发现收件人是伊冯后有些紧张，担心包裹里是静态侵蚀样本，叮嘱你小心对待。
summary_c17m1_2_001.en: You find the package but the crew mates become slightly nervous when they realize that the recipient is Yvonne. The crew tells you to treat the package carefully as it may contain Static Blight samples.

summary_c17m1_3_001.cn: 你把包裹送到伊冯手上，得知只是些普通的颜料。伊冯表示它们已经用不上了，但她有个计划，邀请你加入。
summary_c17m1_3_001.en: You deliver the package to Yvonne and realize that it only contains simple paints. Yvonne says they are not needed anymore, but she has a plan and is inviting you aboard.

summary_c17m1_4_001.cn: 伊冯的计划原来是用颜料在源石实验园区内涂鸦。你们涂鸦时被法比安·柯林斯逮个正着，伊冯招呼你一起跑走。
summary_c17m1_4_001.en: Yvonne's plan is to use the paint for her Originium Science Park graffiti. Fabian Collins catches you in the act. Yvonne hollers at you to run away with her.

summary_c17m1_5_001.cn: 躲过法比安·柯林斯后，伊冯审视着涂鸦，表示这幅作品没能传递出内心的“呐喊”，邀请你陪她去枢纽区基地寻找灵感。
summary_c17m1_5_001.en: After hiding from Fabian Collins, Yvonne looks at her graffiti and says her work fails to deliver the "scream" she needs to get off her chest. She invites you to the Hub Base for inspiration.

summary_c17m2_10_001.cn: 你跟伊冯找到了所有的孩子，他们告诉你们，阿丽娅去了世代摇篮附近。
summary_c17m2_10_001.en: Yvonne and you find all the children. They tell you that Alia went somewhere close to the Cradle of the Ages.

summary_c17m2_11_001.cn: 你们希望阿丽娅推荐些取材地点，她惆怅地表示锚点破坏了一切。伊冯送出颜料，鼓励她画出源石大树。阿丽娅由此想到世代摇篮，准备带着你们过去。
summary_c17m2_11_001.en: You ask Alia to recommend a few places for inspiration. However, she is depressed and tells you that the Ankhors wrecked everything. Yvonne gives her paint and hopes she can draw the Great Originium Oak. This reminds Alia of the Cradle of the Ages and she offers to take you there.

summary_c17m2_12_001.cn: 在送别仪式上，伊冯鼓励了悲伤的孩子们。看着源石树苗，她对画面有了想法，提议前往超域试验场。
summary_c17m2_12_001.en: Yvonne encourages the grieving children during the Send-Off ceremony. Looking at the Originium sapling, she suddenly gets an idea about her painting, and suggests going to the Æther Test Site.

summary_c17m2_13_001.cn: 你们碰到了克劳，他打算把一些数据发给伊冯。这些数据也许能用来复原塔塔。
summary_c17m2_13_001.en: You run into Crowe. He intends to send Yvonne some data that might be useful in reviving Tata.

summary_c17m2_14_001.cn: 你从克劳处得知了伊冯的过去，以及她对终末地工业的看法。提到复原塔塔一事，克劳有些担心她是否做好了准备。
summary_c17m2_14_001.en: You talk with Crowe and learn about Yvonne's past as well as her opinions on Endfield Industries. When you mention the restoration of Tata, Crowe is a little worried that Yvonne might not be prepared.

summary_c17m2_15_001.cn: 克劳询问伊冯是否得到了更多伙伴，伊冯表示伙伴就在她的身边。
summary_c17m2_15_001.en: Crowe asks Yvonne if she has made more friends. Yvonne replies that her friends are by her side.

summary_c17m2_1_001.cn: 你们来到安德烈近乎报废的实验室，伊冯决定顺手帮他翻修。在她工作时，安德烈请你一起去维修停摆的电机外廊。
summary_c17m2_1_001.en: You arrive at Andre's lab which is almost completely wrecked. Yvonne decides to help him fix the situation. While she works, Andre invites you to repair the generator gangway power facility that broke down.

summary_c17m2_2_001.cn: 前去修复电力装置的路上，安德烈偷偷问你伊冯收到包裹后有什么表现。得知颜料被她拿去涂鸦后，他似乎松了口气。
summary_c17m2_2_001.en: While you're heading to the power facility for repair work, Andre secretly asks how Yvonne responded when she received the package. He breathes a sigh of relief when he learns that Yvonne used the paint to create graffiti.

summary_c17m2_3_001.cn: 电力装置修复完毕后，安德烈有些担心伊冯会把他的实验室大变样，赶紧招呼你一起回去。
summary_c17m2_3_001.en: The power facility has been repaired but Andre is worried about Yvonne's massive overhaul of his lab. He quickly asks if you want to head back with him.

summary_c17m2_5_001.cn: 安德烈请求你帮忙打听伊冯未来的打算。而伊冯为了寻找更多涂鸦的灵感，决定去电机外廊看看电力恢复测试时的景色。
summary_c17m2_5_001.en: Andre asks you to find out about Yvonne's future plans. Yvonne wants to get more inspiration for the graffiti and decides to head out to the generator gangway to witness the power restoration tests.

summary_c17m2_5d5_001.cn: 伊冯从灯光中获得了一些灵感，但似乎还是不太够。你提议再去矿脉源区看看。
summary_c17m2_5d5_001.en: Yvonne receives her inspiration from the lights but that still isn't enough. You recommend visiting the Origin Lodespring.

summary_c17m2_6_001.cn: 你带着伊冯来找阿丽娅，但对方不在。你们决定向其他人询问她的行踪。
summary_c17m2_6_001.en: You take Yvonne to meet Alia, but she is not around. You decide to ask around for her whereabouts.

summary_c17m2_7_001.cn: 你打听到今天要举行“送别仪式”，阿丽娅可能在照顾失去父母的孩子们，也可能被临时调走了。
summary_c17m2_7_001.en: You heard about the Send-Off ceremony. Alia is either caring for the children who lost their parents, or has been temporarily assigned elsewhere.

summary_c17m2_9_001.cn: 孩子们说，如果你们在游戏中获胜，他们就会告知阿丽娅的去向。伊冯拉着你一起扮演裂兽，玩起了捉迷藏。
summary_c17m2_9_001.en: The children say if you beat their game they will tell you where Alia went. Yvonne drags you in to act as manglerbeasts and play hide-and-seek with the children.

summary_c17m3_10_001.cn: 你们被防卫系统阻拦，伊冯决定另辟蹊径——启动传送带。
summary_c17m3_10_001.en: The defense system is in your way. Yvonne decides to create a shortcut — by activating the transport belt.

summary_c17m3_11_001.cn: 你们遇到了一扇会露出笑脸的门，它果然是伊冯的设计。
summary_c17m3_11_001.en: You run into a gate capable of giving a smiley. It was designed by Yvonne as well.

summary_c17m3_12_001.cn: 你们碰到了伊冯做的防御装置，需要设法通过面前的障碍。
summary_c17m3_12_001.en: You encounter defense systems that Yvonne made, and must find a way to overcome the obstacles.

summary_c17m3_13_001.cn: 伊冯想到了通行的办法，需要你在她进行准备的时候帮忙清理外面的天使。
summary_c17m3_13_001.en: Yvonne thinks about a way to pass through. She needs you to clear the Aggeloi outside while she prepares.

summary_c17m3_14_001.cn: 等待无人机搭建道路的间隙，你询问伊冯未来的打算。她表示自己并没想好，但作为终末地的干员，会听你的指挥，也希望你会在她遇到阻碍时支持她。
summary_c17m3_14_001.en: While waiting for the drones to repair the road, you ask Yvonne about her plans for the future. She tells you she has not figured it out but as an Endfield operator, she will heed your commands. Yvonne also hopes you will lend your support when she runs into problems.

summary_c17m3_15_001.cn: 伊冯正在此处取材，收集灵感时，忽然反问你未来的打算。而此时，出现了一群危险的天使……
summary_c17m3_15_001.en: Yvonne is gathering inspiration here when she suddenly asks you about your own plans for the future. Just then, a group of dangerous Aggeloi shows up...

summary_c17m3_17_001.cn: 伊冯邀请你跟她一起参与塔塔的复原工作，表示她、终末地的大家、塔塔会跟你一起抵达“遥远的目的地”……
summary_c17m3_17_001.en: Yvonne invites you to take part in her Tata Restoration Project. She tells you that she, Tata, and every Endfielder will join you and reach the "faraway destination" together...

summary_c17m3_18_001.cn: 电梯权限被锁，伊冯打算留下破解控制主板，拜托你去寻找工团的语音日志，以获取启动口令。
summary_c17m3_18_001.en: Elevator access has been locked. Yvonne decides to stay behind to hack the control panel and asks you to search for UWST audio logs to acquire the activation command.

summary_c17m3_19_001.cn: 伊冯向你介绍工团的设计风格与她自己的设计理念，她希望自己的造物能有更多人情味。
summary_c17m3_19_001.en: Yvonne introduces the UWST style of design as well as her own style to you. She wants her creations to feel more friendly and human.

summary_c17m3_1_001.cn: 伊冯将获得的灵感加入涂鸦，但她依旧觉得不够完美。她邀请你最后再去一个地方。
summary_c17m3_1_001.en: Yvonne adds the inspiration she acquired to her graffiti but still believes it is not yet perfect enough. She invites you to one final place.

summary_c17m3_20_001.cn: 工人们在语音日志里提到了新的启动口令——“超级迭代人”。
summary_c17m3_20_001.en: From the audio logs, the crew mates mention a new activation command: "Super Iterator."

summary_c17m3_2_001.cn: 你们从工人处听说，一些天使闯入了地下车间，伊冯表示可以帮忙解决。
summary_c17m3_2_001.en: The crew mates tell you that a few Aggeloi made it to the underground production floors. Yvonne is certain she can take care of them.

summary_c17m3_3d5_001.cn: 伊冯表示自己以前就在这里工作，想再去更下层的区域找找灵感。这时你们发现了天使的踪迹。
summary_c17m3_3d5_001.en: Yvonne tells you that she worked here before and she intends to head to the lower floors for inspiration. This is when you find traces of Aggeloid activity.

summary_c17m3_4_001.cn: 你们一起重启了电梯。聊天时，伊冯提到这个片区之前都是她一个人在用。
summary_c17m3_4_001.en: You restart the elevator together. During the dialog, Yvonne mentions that she was the only user of this entire area.

summary_c17m3_5_001.cn: 击败天使后，伊冯走到一扇门前，但踯躅不前。在你的鼓励下，她决定跟你一起进去。
summary_c17m3_5_001.en: After defeating the Aggeloi, Yvonne walks up to a door but hesitates. With your encouragement, she decides to go in with you.

summary_c17m3_6_001.cn: 这个房间是伊冯一开始研究塔塔的地方。她向你吐露了心声，告诉你颜料的秘密——那是她准备给塔塔做新涂装用的。
summary_c17m3_6_001.en: The room is where Yvonne first worked on Tata. She shares her feelings with you and the secret about the paint. She originally ordered the paint to give Tata a new coating.

summary_c17m3_7_001.cn: 伊冯表示自己没事了，你们准备离开此处。
summary_c17m3_7_001.en: Yvonne tells you she's alright. You prepare to leave the place.

summary_c17m3_8_001.cn: 从地下车间返回，你们碰到了法比安·柯林斯。伊冯表示会擦掉涂鸦，但对方却说大家很喜欢这幅有生机的作品，希望她能把涂鸦完成。
summary_c17m3_8_001.en: You reach the surface from the underground production floors and run into Fabian Collins. Yvonne tells him that she will wash away the graffiti, but Fabian informs her that everyone actually likes the lively work and hopes to see it complete.

summary_c17m3_9_001.cn: 伊冯表示自己会复原塔塔，但她的情绪依旧有些低落。在你的安慰下，伊冯打起精神，带着你前往她的实验室。
summary_c17m3_9_001.en: Yvonne tells you that she will restore Tata but she still feels a little sad. You comfort her and she gets back to her feet, and brings you to her lab.

summary_c6m1_17_001.cn: 乔万尼从碾骨氏族成员的口中套出了营地位置，并主动提出了一个冒进的团队作战计划，没想到一向谨慎的狼卫居然第一时间表示赞同。你明白，狼卫想进一步试探乔万尼。你决定继续配合狼卫，让乔万尼的“计划”顺利推进。
summary_c6m1_17_001.en: Giovanni manages to get the location of the camp from a Bonekrusher. He proposes a high-risk team combat operation. Wulfgard, known for being cautious, surprisingly agrees with Giovanni's plan. You know he is trying to test Giovanni. You decide to play along with Wulfgard's show and ensure the success of Giovanni's "plans".

summary_c6m1_18_001.cn: 击败驻守的碾骨氏族后，狼卫发现乔万尼身上的短刀似曾相识。从乔万尼口中得知，这是他以狼卫教的知识，专门为自己定制的一把刀。
summary_c6m1_18_001.en: After defeating the Bonekrushers guarding this place, Wulfgard notices something familiar about Giovanni's dagger. Giovanni tells him that he learned from Wulfgard's tricks and custom-crafted this dagger for himself.

summary_c6m1_1_001.cn: 来到矿区营地，洛茜将狼卫失联的事告诉了你，希望你可以帮她把狼卫带回来。为了尽快找到狼卫，洛茜将自己做的追踪器交给了你。
summary_c6m1_1_001.en: Upon arriving at the Mining Camp, Rossi tells you about Wulfgard's disappearance, hoping you could help bring him back. Eager to find him as soon as possible, she hands you a tracker she made herself.

summary_c6m1_24_001.cn: 你与狼卫在追回乔万尼的过程中落入陷阱。事后，狼卫向你致歉，并承认因顾念过往友情，他没能将乔万尼视作敌人加以提防，因此连累了你，这让他深感愧疚。最终，狼卫重新坚定了信念，与你一同寻找离开此地的方法。
summary_c6m1_24_001.en: You and Wulfgard try to chase down Giovanni but fall into a trap. Wulfgard apologizes to you and admits that he has been distracted by his old friendship, and failed to treat Giovanni as a proper enemy and maintain his vigilance. Since you also fall into the trap, Wulfgard feels extremely guilty. In the end, he manages to steel his resolve and work with you to find a way to leave the place.

summary_c6m1_29_001.cn: 战后，乔万尼突然现身，将落败的碾骨氏族头目杀死。狼卫揭穿了乔万尼的真面目。一番争辩后，乔万尼却声称他的背后另有主谋。自知已无法达成目的的乔万尼拒绝透露更多信息，并突然对你发起攻击，最终被狼卫杀死。
summary_c6m1_29_001.en: After the battle, Giovanni suddenly appears and kills the defeated Bonekrusher chief. Wulfgard exposes Giovanni for what he truly is. After a heated argument, Giovanni claims there is someone else acting from behind the scenes. But knowing that he has failed their mission, Giovanni refuses to reveal more and suddenly attacks you, only to be killed by Wulfgard.

summary_c6m1_32_001.cn: 在枢纽区的野外，你找到了已将乔万尼安葬的狼卫。他与你一同焚烧了这位故友的几件遗物，并向你讲述了其中的过往。之后，狼卫与你坦白了自己后续的计划，同时希望你将发生的一切视作两人共同的“秘密”。
summary_c6m1_32_001.en: You find Wulfgard who just laid Giovanni to rest at the outskirts of the Hub. Together, you burn the rest of Giovanni's belongings. Wulfgard tells you about their past. He also confides his subsequent plan, and hopes that you can keep the entirety of this encounter as a secret between the both of you.

summary_c6m1_3_001.cn: 经过一番追踪，你找到了狼卫。他将事情的前因后果告诉了你——狼群里出了叛徒。为了弄清楚内幕，狼卫认为自己不能就这样回去，必须追查到底。而为了实现对洛茜的承诺，你决定与狼卫同行。
summary_c6m1_3_001.en: You find Wulfgard after a while of tracking. He tells you about the entire event —— There are traitors in the Pack. Wulfgard feels he cannot simply return with this discovery, and feels extremely compelled to reveal the entire conspiracy. To fulfill your promise with Rossi, you decide to be part of Wulfgard's investigation.

summary_c6m1_6_001.cn: 打倒此地埋伏的碾骨氏族后，你与狼卫遇到了同为狼群一员的乔万尼。他似乎与狼卫关系匪浅。
summary_c6m1_6_001.en: After defeating the ambushing Bonekrushers, you and Wulfgard meet another member of the Pack — Giovanni. He seems pretty close to Wulfgard.

summary_c6m1_7_001.cn: 你们从伪装成碾骨氏族的乔万尼口中得知，他是来寻找疑似投靠碾骨氏族的托马索的——然而狼卫不久前才收到托马索的死讯。面对乔万尼真假难辨的说辞，你与狼卫默契地没有当场拆穿他的谎言，同意让他与你们同行。
summary_c6m1_7_001.en: Giovanni, disguised as a Landbreaker, tells you that he came here to find Tommaso, whom he suspects has joined the Bonekrushers — However, Wulfgard just recently received news of Tommaso's death. Giovanni's story seems untrustworthy, but you and Wulfgard tacitly choose not to call him out on his lies. Both of you agree to let Giovanni tag along.

summary_db01m1_11_001.cn: 阿奎多提议解析收集的数据，升级最基础的辅助探测技术，延长你在谷地像差中的滞留时间。
summary_db01m1_11_001.en: Aquito recommends deciphering the data collected and upgrading the most basic exploration support tech. This will extend your stay within the Valley's Aberrants.

summary_db01m1_12_001.cn: 阿奎多需要你重复先前实践过的方法，找到能量反应，解除阻碍，扫描“重点目标”。
summary_db01m1_12_001.en: Aquito needs you to repeat your previous attempt, find an energy reaction site, eliminate the obstacles, and scan a "key target".

summary_db01m1_13_001.cn: 帝江号上的谷地像差入口变成了“重点目标”的样子。阿奎多希望你返回谷地像差，确认已探索区域是否发生了变化。
summary_db01m1_13_001.en: The Valley's Aberrants portal aboard Dijiang has assumed the form of the "key target". Aquito hopes you can return to the Protocol Space and verify if the explored zones have undergone any changes.

summary_db01m1_14_001.cn: 阿奎多为你升级了辅助探测技术，她需要你返回谷地像差，确认升级的成果，并继续进行探索工作。
summary_db01m1_14_001.en: Aquito has upgraded an exploration support tech for you. She now needs you to return to Valley's Aberrants to verify the performance of the upgrade and explore more of the Protocol Space.

summary_db01m1_15_001.cn: 阿奎多确认到，谷地像差中只出现了你最近认知的事物。你需要加快探索的节奏。
summary_db01m1_15_001.en: Aquito has realized that the Valley's Aberrants only generates items and objects from your recent experiences. You must speed up your exploration efforts.

summary_db01m1_18_001.cn: 阿奎多告诉你，收集沉积结核或完成委托都可以为研究作出贡献，还能得到相应的奖励。
summary_db01m1_18_001.en: Aquito informs you that collecting precipitation nodules and completing commissions can help push the research progress and provide certain rewards.

summary_db01m1_1_001.cn: 高等源石物理研究专家阿奎多向你介绍，他们在帝江号上发现了一处奇特的协议空间，并将其命名为“谷地像差”。为了帝江号的安全，她希望你协助调查谷地像差。
summary_db01m1_1_001.en: Senior Originium Physicist Aquito tells you that her team found a special Protocol Space aboard Dijiang that they have named the "Valley's Aberrants". She hopes you can help investigate the Valley's Aberrants to ensure the safety of Dijiang.

summary_db01m1_3_001.cn: 阿奎多准备利用仪器主动影响谷地像差的入口，改变协议空间的状态，为你提供更多必要支援。
summary_db01m1_3_001.en: Aquito is preparing the device to actively change the Valley's Aberrants portal and transform the Protocol Space. The goal is to grant you the necessary support for exploring the place.

summary_db01m1_4_001.cn: 阿奎多发现了谷地像差反复“复原”的特性。她认为，如果充分利用这些特性，一定大有可为。
summary_db01m1_4_001.en: Aquito has discovered the repeated "restorative" property of the Valley's Aberrants. She believes this property can be leveraged to achieve something.

summary_db01m1_5_001.cn: 谷地像差的深度发生了巨大的波动，阿奎多将你紧急撤离了出来。与此同时，赛希报告，帝江号的动力舱段发生了一次异常能量波动。
summary_db01m1_5_001.en: Aquito has extracted you quickly after detecting strong fluctuations in the depths of the Valley's Aberrants. At the same time, Xaihi also reports strange energy fluxes in the engine room sections of Dijiang.

summary_db01m1_6_001.cn: 你们发现，谷地像差发生变故的根源很可能是北极极光圈——一处受超域严重影响的危险地带。
summary_db01m1_6_001.en: You discover that the root cause of changes to the Valley's Aberrants might be located in the north polar Aurora Circle. This hazardous region is severely affected by the Ætherside.

summary_db01m1_7_001.cn: 为了应对谷地像差易受干扰的特性，阿奎多准备了应对方案。她希望你在谷地像差尽可能深的地方，对最后的像差核心进行一次全面扫描。
summary_db01m1_7_001.en: Aquito has a solution to combat the tendency of Valley's Aberrants to external interference. She wants you to go as deep as you can in the Valley's Aberrants and perform a total scan of the final Aberrant Core.

summary_db01m1_8_001.cn: 阿奎多希望能继续探索谷地像差，将这个协议空间建设成终末地的“小世界”。
summary_db01m1_8_001.en: Aquito hopes to keep exploring the Valley's Aberrants and establish this Protocol Space as a "pocket realm" for Endfield.

summary_e0m2_1_001.cn: 你醒了过来，发现自己身处终末地工业的基地——帝江号内。在这里有一位名叫佩丽卡的少女，是终末地工业的监督。你似乎记得她的样貌，但是关于其他事情，你完全无法回想起来……
summary_e0m2_1_001.en: You wake up and find yourself on Dijiang, the base of Endfield Industries. You are greeted by Perlica, a young girl and Supervisor of the same company. Her face seems rather familiar to you, but you fail to recall anything about her...

summary_e0m2_4_001.cn: 佩丽卡第一次带你正式游览O.M.V.帝江号。
summary_e0m2_4_001.en: Perlica takes you on your first formal tour of OMV Dijiang.

summary_e0m2_5_001.cn: 终末地工业希望将协议核心部署到文明环带各处，从而完成“重启生命”的特殊使命。这一使命，来自你留下的“零号委托”。
summary_e0m2_5_001.en: Endfield's special mission, Reboot of Life, requires the deployment of Automation-Cores in various places of the Civilization Band. The mission itself is part of Zeroth Directive, issued by none other than yourself.

summary_e1m10_0d5_001.cn: 干员赛希希望你通过协议传送前往帝江号。与此同时，她还有许多工作需要向你报告。
summary_e1m10_0d5_001.en: Operator Xaihi hopes you can tele-protocol to Dijiang. The operator also has plenty of work to report to you.

summary_e1m10_1_001.cn: 来自寂语修会的赛希干员临时负责本次帝江号的修缮任务。目前，制造舱的受损程度最低，你可以从这里开始统筹工作。
summary_e1m10_1_001.en: Operator Xaihi from the Cabal of Tranquility is temporarily in charge of repairing OMV Dijiang. The Manufacturing Cabin is the least compromised. You may begin your work from this place.

summary_e1m10_2_001.cn: 通过操作台，你可以完成舱室的人员调配，或者制定生产规划。
summary_e1m10_2_001.en: Interact with the control panel to assign operators to various cabins or plan your production activities.

summary_e1m10_2d7_001.cn: 帝江号上的会客室已经可以使用。你能在这里处理收集到的线索，将线索交流所得的信用兑换成物资，或是在展示区展示自己的成就。
summary_e1m10_2d7_001.en: The Reception Room aboard Dijiang can now be used. You can organize clues collected at this place. Earn credits with Clue Exchange. Credits can be traded for resources. You can also showcase your achievements at the Display Section.

summary_e1m10_3_001.en: The Control Nexus lies before you.

summary_e1m10_4_001.cn: 总控中枢正在呼唤着你……等待着你。
summary_e1m10_4_001.en: The Control Nexus calls out to you... It has been waiting for you.

summary_e1m10_5_001.cn: 帝江号的控制权限被成功开启。
summary_e1m10_5_001.en: You successfully activate control authority level for OMV Dijiang.

summary_e1m10_6_001.cn: 佩丽卡向你解释了你们一直在面对的危险：超域。
summary_e1m10_6_001.en: Perlica introduces the danger you've been facing all along: the Æther.

summary_e1m10_7_001.cn: 聂菲斯是个危险的预兆。你安抚了担忧的佩丽卡，决心与终末地工业一同面对眼前的困难。
summary_e1m10_7_001.en: Nefarith is a dangerous sign of what is to come. You alleviate Perlica's concerns and decide to face the challenges together with Endfield Industries.

summary_e1m1_1_001.cn: 你与佩丽卡准备徒步前往枢纽区基地。
summary_e1m1_1_001.en: You and Perlica plan to reach the Hub Base on foot.

summary_e1m1_2_001.cn: 坠入枢纽区基地的锚点正在不断地制造天使。你们决定优先前往旧工厂区解决锚点。秦茳尺拜托你们寻找一位名叫安德烈的工程师，他为了保护工作成果，目前还未撤离。
summary_e1m1_2_001.en: An Ankhor fell into the Hub Base and it is constantly creating more Aggeloi. You decide to head to the Old Factory to eliminate the Ankhor. Director Qin also asks you to find an engineer named Andre who chose not to evac the premise just to protect a project of his.

summary_e1m1_3_001.cn: 你从秦茳尺那里了解到有关锚点的信息和基地损失的情况。
summary_e1m1_3_001.en: Director Qin gives you information about Ankhors and the extent of damage suffered by the Hub Base.

summary_e1m1_4_001.cn: 锚点扎入了地下。其核心存在于更下方的位置。佩丽卡与你准备前往旧工厂区的地下区域，摧毁锚点的核心。
summary_e1m1_4_001.en: The Ankhor has plunged deep into the building and its core is probably in the basement. You and Perlica prepare to enter the Old Factory basement to take out the Ankhor core.

summary_e1m1_4d2_001.cn: 利用此处种植的荞花，你可以临时制备治疗所需的药品原料——荞花粉末。
summary_e1m1_4d2_001.en: Use the buckflowers growing here to craft Buckflower Powder. This can be used directly or as an ingredient for making other medicines.

summary_e1m1_5_001.cn: 锚点被成功破坏。你们遇到了陈千语，解救了因保护原型机而被困的安德烈。在返回中控塔之前，安德烈还要检查一下原型机是否受损。
summary_e1m1_5_001.en: You successfully take out the Ankhor and meet Chen Qianyu. The operator swoops in and saves Andre who was trapped at the Old Factory while trying to save a prototype. You decide to return to the Control Tower, but Andre prefers to stay and check his prototype for damages.

summary_e1m1_6d1_001.cn: 锚点袭击发生的同时，大量裂地者渗透进了四号谷地枢纽区。
summary_e1m1_6d1_001.en: As the Ankhorfall struck, numerous Landbreakers infiltrated the Hub area of Valley IV.

summary_e1m1_6d2_001.cn: 陈千语正式加入了你和佩丽卡的队伍，终末地危机处理小组即将开始行动。
summary_e1m1_6d2_001.en: Chen Qianyu has formally joined your team. You, Perlica, and Chen are now the Endfield Crisis Team. It is time to roll out.

summary_e1m1_6d3_001.cn: 在你的坚持下，佩丽卡放下担忧，同意你参与行动。你们将前往指定地点，降下协议核心。
summary_e1m1_6d3_001.en: You persuade Perlica to set aside her worries and make you part of her mission team. You head to the designated location and deploy the Protocol Automation-Core.

summary_e1m2_10_001.cn: 协议共振塔被启动，枢纽区基地恢复了应急电力。接下来，你需要援助遭遇人为破坏的源石副产物中心。
summary_e1m2_10_001.en: The Protocol Resonance Tower has been activated. Emergency power has been restored at the Hub Base. Your next step is to offer support to the Originium Byproduct Processing Center (BPPC) that has been deliberately damaged by attackers.

summary_e1m2_1_001.cn: 你们救下了一名被裂地者包围的工团成员。在你们离开之时，他希望你们在路上留意一下他的两个兄弟。
summary_e1m2_1_001.en: You save a UWST crew mate surrounded by several Landbreakers. Before you leave, he tells you to look out for his two buddies.

summary_e1m2_2_001.cn: 你们救下了一名被俘的工团成员。他决定确认设施安全后返回。在你们离开之时，他希望你们留意他的两个兄弟，并让他们来找他。
summary_e1m2_2_001.en: You save a UWST crew mate captured by the Landbreakers. He decides to inspect the facilities before heading back to base. Before you leave, he asks you to look out for his two buddies and tell them to look for him.

summary_e1m2_3_001.cn: 你们救助了一名受伤的工团成员。他决定修好设施后再离开。他从裂地者的口中得知，这些敌人似乎是从北方过来的。
summary_e1m2_3_001.en: You save an injured UWST crew mate but he decides to repair the facilities before leaving. He managed to hear the Landbreakers mention that they came from the North.

summary_e1m2_5_001.cn: 裂地者们虽然霸占了预定部署区域，却没有急于掠夺附近的生存物资，十分反常。但眼下不是分析的时候，部署协议核心更加重要。
summary_e1m2_5_001.en: The Landbreakers have occupied the deployment area but they are not looting the place for essential resources. This seems odd. However, this is no time for analyzing their actions. Your priority is to deploy the Protocol Automation-Core.

summary_e1m2_5d5_001.cn: 你们清理了协议核心预定部署区域的各种障碍，随时可以进行协议核心的投放。
summary_e1m2_5d5_001.en: You clear all obstacles in the PAC deployment area. The PAC is ready for deployment anytime now.

summary_e1m2_9_001.cn: 你需要通过中继器把协议核心的电力输送至协议共振塔。
summary_e1m2_9_001.en: You must use Relay Towers to transmit power from the Protocol Automation-Core to the Protocol Resonance Tower.

summary_e1m3_10_001.cn: 你们顺利唤醒了武库工程师谢苗。他帮助你们补充了装备。
summary_e1m3_10_001.en: You successfully help arsenal engineer Semyon regain consciousness. In return, he gives you additional gear and equipment.

summary_e1m3_10d5_001.cn: 谢苗恢复了军械库的商店功能。
summary_e1m3_10d5_001.en: Semyon restores the trading feature of the arsenal.

summary_e1m3_13_001.cn: 安德烈顺利重启了TA-TA原型机。他从原型机的记录中发现，锚点袭击前，谷地要塞出现过神秘的未知信号。
summary_e1m3_13_001.en: Andre successfully reboots the TA-TA Prototype. He looks through the Prototype's datalogs and finds that an unknown and mysterious signal appeared at the Valley Fort before the Ankhorfall.

summary_e1m3_13d5_001.cn: 安德烈顺利重启了TA-TA原型机。他从原型机的记录中发现，锚点袭击前，谷地要塞出现过神秘的未知信号。
summary_e1m3_13d5_001.en: Andre successfully reboots the TA-TA Prototype. He looks through the Prototype's datalogs and finds that an unknown and mysterious signal appeared at the Valley Fort before the Ankhorfall.

summary_e1m3_14_001.cn: 眼下，中控塔大厅中央的通讯节点仍处于瘫痪状态，依仗你特殊的源石技艺似乎可以解决这个问题。佩丽卡仍旧担心着你的身体状态，但你决定尝试一下。
summary_e1m3_14_001.en: The Control Tower comms node in the middle of the main hall is not working, but your special Originium Arts might fix this problem. Perlica is worried about your health, but you decide to try it out.

summary_e1m3_15_001.cn: 谷地要塞显然已经遭到裂地者袭击。你决定采取行动，掌握主导权。在前往谷地要塞的路上，有一位终末地的“裂地者专家”能为你们提供支持。
summary_e1m3_15_001.en: It is obvious that the Valley Fort has been attacked by Landbreakers. You decide to act and seize the initiative. A "Landbreaker specialist" working for Endfield will provide you support on your way to the Valley Fort.

summary_e1m3_16_001.cn: 你们告别了秦茳尺，动身前往谷地要塞。
summary_e1m3_16_001.en: You say goodbye to Director Qin and prepare to head to the Valley Fort.

summary_e1m3_2_001.cn: 晶体外壳是各类机械设备最常用到的材料。你们需要搜集源矿，制备晶体外壳。
summary_e1m3_2_001.en: Origocrust is commonly used by various machines and facilities. You must gather some Originium Ore to make this material.

summary_e1m3_4_001.cn: 你已经熟悉了集成工业系统的基础操作方式。陈千语注意到了安德烈的慌张：原来，他将有关原型机的重要技术资料和一套自购零件遗落在了源石副产物中心。
summary_e1m3_4_001.en: You have familiarized yourself with the basic operations of the AIC Factory. Chen notices Andre's nervousness. Turns out the engineer accidentally left a set of parts and important technical documents for the Prototype in the Originium Byproduct Processing Center.

summary_e1m3_4d5_001.cn: 源石副产物中心一片狼藉，你准备使用扫描功能寻找更多有用的信息。
summary_e1m3_4d5_001.en: The Originium Byproduct Processing Center is a mess. You prepare to use the scanning feature in order to locate more useful clues.

summary_e1m3_5_001.cn: 你们解救了两位被困的工人。多亏了他们的及时应变，你们成功接收了他们保下的原型机零件与资料。除此之外，他们还交给了你们一些作战记录。
summary_e1m3_5_001.en: You rescue two trapped UWST crew mates. Their timely actions saved the Prototype parts and documents that they then give to you. The crew mates also give you some Combat Records.

summary_e1m3_5d7_001.cn: 裂地者似乎一反常态地盯上了“没用”的原型机。继续调查前，你们决定先将原型机零件与资料交还给安德烈。
summary_e1m3_5d7_001.en: The Landbreakers are after the seemingly "useless" Prototype, and such behavior is quite unexpected. Before you get back to the investigation, you decide to return the Prototype parts and documents to Andre.

summary_e1m3_6_001.cn: 晶体外壳需要大量源矿。安德烈为你准备了自动采矿设备——便携源石矿机，你需要前往附近的矿点安置它们。
summary_e1m3_6_001.en: You need plenty of Originium Ore to make Origocrusts. Andre has prepared an auto-mining facility — the Portable Originium Rig. You must go to a nearby mining spot to deploy the rig.

summary_e1m3_8_001.cn: 据安德烈介绍，梅梅需要的源石粉末可以通过粉碎机制备。
summary_e1m3_8_001.en: According to Andre's information, the Originium Powder that Maymay needs can be produced with a Shredding Unit.

summary_e1m3_9_001.cn: 终末地干员梅梅告诉你们，可以使用源石粉末制作炸药。除此之外，你还可以利用集成工业系统制作更多爆炸物。
summary_e1m3_9_001.en: Endfield operator Maymay tells that you can use Originium Powder to make bombs. You can also use the AIC Factory to make even more explosives.

summary_e1m4_1_001.cn: 通往谷地要塞的必经之路上，一支裂地者队伍处决了不遵守纪律的同伴。
summary_e1m4_1_001.en: A band of Landbreakers has taken over the only road to the Valley Fort. They are also executing their own people for lack of discipline.

summary_e1m4_3_001.cn: 你们与“裂地者专家”卡特洛·狼卫·卢皮诺顺利会合，准备修好大桥的控制设备后，一同前往谷地要塞。
summary_e1m4_3_001.en: You successfully rendezvous with the Landbreaker specialist named Catello Wulfgard Luppino. You make preparations to repair the devices for controlling the bridge and head to the Valley Fort.

summary_e1m4_4_001.cn: 你们需要利用协议核心恢复桥梁升降开关的电力。
summary_e1m4_4_001.en: You must use the PAC to restore power for lowering and raising the bridge.

summary_e1m5_0d5_001.cn: 远处的巨物是碾骨氏族的标志性建筑——巢雕。它产生的烟雾阻挡了你们前进的道路。
summary_e1m5_0d5_001.en: The giant structure in the distance is a denstack, an icon of power raised by the Bonekrushers. It is emitting a haze that blocks your way.

summary_e1m5_3_001.cn: 聂菲斯——碾骨氏族的领袖，似乎正是四号谷地混乱的始作俑者。被你们救助的男人名叫卡贾，他恳求你们救救他的妹妹阿吉。
summary_e1m5_3_001.en: Nefarith, leader of the Bonekrusher Clan and the suspected mastermind behind the chaos of Valley IV. The young man you rescued is named Karja. He begs you to save his sister Ginny.

summary_e1m5_4_001.cn: 你们在避难所见到了卡贾的妹妹阿吉，以及管理者索斯。阿吉的矿石病症状十分严重——储备的药物已经被用尽了。佩丽卡为她提供了罗德岛的矿石病抑制剂以缓解病症。
summary_e1m5_4_001.en: You arrive at the shelter and meet Karja's sister, Ginny, along with Soth, the leader of the shelter. Ginny has severe Oripathy but the shelter is out of suppressants. Perlica administers a dose of Rhodes Island medication on Ginny to soothe her symptoms.

summary_e1m5_5_001.cn: 使用抑制剂后，阿吉的状况明显有所好转。卡贾终于松了一口气。
summary_e1m5_5_001.en: The suppressants alleviate Ginny's conditions. Karja finally breathes a sigh of relief.

summary_e1m5_6_001.cn: 你们决定清理裂地者的营地，帮助难民们建立更安全的居所。
summary_e1m5_6_001.en: You decide to clear out the Landbreaker camp and help the refugees build a safer place to live.

summary_e1m6_2_001.cn: 裂地者被你们清理干净了。你利用集成工业系统在此处建造了一个据点。
summary_e1m6_2_001.en: You clear out the Landbreakers and deploy an outpost in this area using the AIC Factory.

summary_e1m6_5_001.cn: 作战设备可以帮助难民抵御裂地者。建造此类设备需要先利用源矿生产一些晶体外壳。通过次级核心的取货口，你可以远程获得仓库内的源矿。
summary_e1m6_5_001.en: Combat facilities can help the refugees defend themselves against Landbreakers. But to construct them, you will first need to get some Originium Ore to make Origocrusts. The Sub-PAC output ports can use belt-free transport to unload Originium Ore from your Depot.

summary_e1m6_7_001.cn: 你们成功抵御了裂地者的袭击。谷地通道的据点将成为难民的暂居处，为他们提供庇护。
summary_e1m6_7_001.en: You successfully defeat the Landbreaker attack. The outpost at the Valley Pass will become a camp for the refugees and protect them.

summary_e1m6_7d5_001.cn: 索斯让丹尼尔带领你们前往地下通风管道——你们可以通过那里前往裂地者的聚集地。
summary_e1m6_7d5_001.en: Soth asks Daniel to lead you to the underground ventilation shaft. You can now use this passage to head to the Landbreaker camp.

summary_e1m6_8_001.cn: 佩丽卡为你介绍了名为“协议空间”的奇异现象，你决定进入其中，尝试探索。
summary_e1m6_8_001.en: Perlica tells you about a mysterious phenomenon known as the Protocol Space. You decide to venture in and investigate.

summary_e1m7_1_001.cn: 你们要与难民们分别了。临行前，佩丽卡收到了来自阿吉的礼物——一幅她亲手画的画。
summary_e1m7_1_001.en: The time has come to say goodbye to the refugees. Ginny gives Perlica a present before you leave. The girl has made a lovely drawing.

summary_e1m7_2_001.cn: 你们在山洞里发现了侵蚀废料。即便在碾骨氏族的领地，这也是一件异常的事。
summary_e1m7_2_001.en: You find Blighted waste in the cave. This is rare, even in Bonekrusher territory.

summary_e1m7_3_001.cn: 碾骨氏族或许正在研究以危险的方式利用超域能量，动机不明。
summary_e1m7_3_001.en: The Bonekrushers seem to be investigating dangerous uses of Æther energy. Their motivations remain unknown.

summary_e1m7_3d8_001.cn: 你们准备破坏为大巢雕供能的小型巢雕。在开始行动前，聂菲斯的声音突然传来。
summary_e1m7_3d8_001.en: As you move to destroy the smaller denstacks powering the giant one, Nefarith's voice suddenly comes through.

summary_e1m7_4d7_001.cn: 裂地者看守的笼子内，一名身着工团制服的人在向你们呼救。
summary_e1m7_4d7_001.en: The Landbreakers are guarding a cage holding a prisoner wearing UWST uniform. She is calling out for help.

summary_e1m7_5_001.cn: 你们救出了被裂地者囚禁的工人肖娜。她看到马克跟着裂地者一起去了谷地要塞。
summary_e1m7_5_001.en: You save a UWST crew mate named Shawna from the hands of the Landbreakers. She saw Mark following the Landbreakers to the Valley Fort.

summary_e1m9_1_001.cn: 通往供能高地的大桥被聂菲斯破坏了，秦茳尺告诉你们：穿越源石研究园也可抵达供能高地，只是锚点坠落引发了大面积塌方，前往源石研究园的路暂时还无法通行。
summary_e1m9_1_001.en: Nefarith has blown up the bridge to the Power Plateau. Director Qin tells you that you can reach the Power Plateau by going through the Originium Science Park. However, an Ankhorfall has triggered a major landslide. The road to the Originium Science Park is still out.

summary_e1m9_1d7_001.cn: 佩丽卡似乎对有人能利用超域十分在意。
summary_e1m9_1d7_001.en: Perlica seems rather affected after witnessing someone capable of using the Æther.

summary_e1m9_2_001.cn: 多功能钻探器需要大量源矿作为燃料。你需要在工业发展规划升级相关工业技术，提高矿物采集效率。
summary_e1m9_2_001.en: The multi-purpose drill requires vast amounts of Originium Ore as fuel. Research the required AIC technology at the AIC Factory Plan to boost the efficiency of your mining operations.

summary_e1m9_3_001.cn: 集成工业系统的运维人员波可丝为你说明了协议采录桩的相关知识。
summary_e1m9_3_001.en: Pocus, the operations technician of the AIC Factory, shares various information about the Protocol Datalogger.

summary_e1m9_4_001.cn: 清障大队已经集合完毕，他们似乎遇到了一些麻烦。关于此事的具体信息，你可以询问工团的施工队长万尼科夫。
summary_e1m9_4_001.en: The landslide-clearing team has been assembled, but they seem to have a problem. Talk to the UWST construction crew captain Vannikov to know more.

summary_e1m9_5_001.cn: 工团的工人们缺乏基础的防护装备，你可以利用集成工业系统制造一些，提供给他们。
summary_e1m9_5_001.en: The UWST crew lacks basic personal protective equipment. Use the AIC Factory to assemble the equipment for the crew.

summary_e1m9_6_001.cn: 你可以在工业发展规划中研究“零件制造”并获得配件机，利用它制造一批工程车辆需要的定制零件。
summary_e1m9_6_001.en: You can research the AIC Factory Plan technology Parts Fitting to get a new type of facility — Fitting Units. Use them to make a batch of customized parts needed by the construction vehicle.

summary_e1m9_7_001.cn: 清障所需的工程车辆升级完毕。目前，四号谷地内仍有一些地方需要支援。
summary_e1m9_7_001.en: The construction vehicle for clearing the landslide has been upgraded. However, there are a few locations in Valley IV that still need your support.

summary_e2m1_1_001.cn: 清障所需的工程车辆已经完成部署。就在一切顺利进行时，意外发生了。
summary_e2m1_1_001.en: All engineering vehicles needed for clearance have been deployed. Just when everything is happening according to plan, an accident suddenly takes place.

summary_e2m1_2d5_001.cn: 超域爆发现象已经发生。TA-TA原型机似乎可以解决这场危机。你们准备前往通向源石研究园的通道，在那里与原型机会合。
summary_e2m1_2d5_001.en: Æther rupture has taken place. The TA-TA prototype might be the key to resolving this crisis. You're heading for the passage to the Originium Science Park and meet up with the Prototype there.

summary_e2m1_3_001.cn: 安德烈将升级成功后的TA-TA原型机带到了你们面前。你们将护送它前往供能高地，解决四号谷地的危机。
summary_e2m1_3_001.en: Andre brings the upgraded TA-TA Prototype to you. You must escort it to the Power Plateau and resolve the Valley IV crisis.

summary_e2m2_1_001.cn: 你们遇到了负责此片区域搜救工作的法比安·柯林斯。在得知终末地要去处理侵蚀灾害后，柯林斯拜托你们留意一下他的同事——艾莱扎，她正在前方接应受伤工人。不能离开岗位的法比安十分担心她的安危。
summary_e2m2_1_001.en: You meet Fabian Collins who is in charge of the SAR operations in this area. When Fabian learns that your team of Endfielders is going to handle the Blight disaster, he asks you to find his colleague, Aleeza. She's up ahead helping injured workers. Fabian is unable to leave his post, and is extremely worried about her safety.

summary_e2m2_3_001.cn: 侵蚀挡住了你们的去路，破坏侵蚀核心便能清除它们。但如果没有极大功率的设备长时间持续扫描，核心便无法现身。一筹莫展时，陈千语想起了安德烈的话——能应对超域灾害的原型机“塔塔”或许能对你们有所帮助。
summary_e2m2_3_001.en: The Blight is blocking your way. Destroying a Blight Core will cause a mass of Blight to dissipate. However, you can only manifest the Blight Core by continuously using an extremely powerful scanner. While you search in vain for a solution, Chen suddenly remembers what Andre mentioned. "Tata", a prototype designed to counter Ætherside disasters, might offer a solution.

summary_e2m2_3d5_001.cn: 陈千语启动了原型机“塔塔”，成功扫描出了侵蚀核心。只要破坏它，你们便可以继续前进了。只是，扫描过后，塔塔的温度异常升高了。
summary_e2m2_3d5_001.en: Chen activates the TA-TA Prototype and managed to reveal a Blight Core through scanning. Smash it to purge the Blight and progress through this place. However, performing the scan seems to have caused Tata to overheat abnormally.

summary_e2m2_4_001.cn: 你们救助了被侵蚀所困的艾莱扎·柯林斯——她正是法比安·柯林斯的妹妹。然而，公路被毁，你们不得不绕路前行。
summary_e2m2_4_001.en: You free Aleeza Collins, the younger sister of Fabian Collins, from the Blight. However, the road has been destroyed, forcing you to take a detour.

summary_e2m2_6d5_001.cn: 艾莱扎·柯林斯将源石实验园区的权限卡交给了你们。她告诉你们，想要通过园区，需要用到它。
summary_e2m2_6d5_001.en: Aleeza Collins gives you the access card for the Originium Science Park. She says you'll need it to get through the area.

summary_e2m3_1_001.cn: 源石实验园区的大门因断电无法启动，你们需要逐一检查附近为其供电的三台发电机。
summary_e2m3_1_001.en: The gate of the Originium Science Park cannot be opened as it is out of power. You must inspect three nearby generators that supply it with power.

summary_e2m3_3_001.cn: 源石实验园区的大门被成功开启。柯林斯兄妹带领人们撤离，而你们将前往更加危险的园区深处。
summary_e2m3_3_001.en: You successfully open the gate of the Originium Science Park. The UWST crew evacuates the site with the Collinses leading the way. You, however, must go deeper into the Park where danger lurks.

summary_e2m4_12_001.cn: 你们跟随伊冯的无人机，前往研究所的二楼。
summary_e2m4_12_001.en: You follow Yvonne's drone to 2F of the Research Center.

summary_e2m4_3_001.cn: 你发现可以利用协议技术使塔塔与协议通讯信号塔相连，这样便可扩大塔塔的扫描范围。信号塔就在不远处，你们需要从未被侵蚀堵塞的地下区域前往。
summary_e2m4_3_001.en: You realize that you can use Techno-Protocol to connect Tata to a Protocom Signal Tower and expand its scanning range. The signal tower is not too far away, but the only way to reach it is by going through the underground area not yet flooded by the Blight.

summary_e2m4_5_001.cn: 园区里的机关似乎出自伊冯之手。经过一系列升级改造，这些机关帮助许多人保住了性命。
summary_e2m4_5_001.en: Yvonne made many of the traps and defenses in the Science Park. Her upgrades and mods have saved the lives of many Park workers.

summary_e2m4_7_001.cn: 你们成功连接了塔塔与协议通讯信号塔，但塔塔的损伤似乎更严重了——它的外壳都被烧坏了。
summary_e2m4_7_001.en: You successfully connect Tata to the Protocom Signal Tower but the scan nearly totals Tata. The heat even melts through its casing.

summary_e2m5_1_001.cn: 你们跟随伊冯的指引前往她的实验室。
summary_e2m5_1_001.en: You follow Yvonne's guide and proceed to her lab.

summary_e2m5_2_001.cn: 你们在实验室内见到了伊冯，她正在调校替换零件的功率。你们需要将塔塔带到研究所后门的检修平台上才能修理。伊冯和你们一同出发，清理研究所大楼内的裂地者，前往平台。
summary_e2m5_2_001.en: You meet Yvonne at her lab. She happens to be adjusting the power output of the replacement parts. You must take Tata through the backdoor of the Research Center and use the repair platform to fix it. Yvonne agrees to come along. Clear out the Landbreakers in the Research Center and reach the platform.

summary_e2m5_3_001.cn: 你帮助伊冯选好了唱片，顺着话题，你们交流了组装塔塔时的想法。一段时间后，伊冯完成了准备工作。可以出发去检修平台了。
summary_e2m5_3_001.en: You help Yvonne choose her vinyl and discuss about her ideas when assembling data. After a while, Yvonne completes her prep work and prepares to set off for the repair platform.

summary_e2m5_5_001.cn: 维修成功了，塔塔恢复了精神。你们与伊冯告别，继续前进。
summary_e2m5_5_001.en: Tata is successfully repaired and regains its vigor. You leave Yvonne for now and continue with your mission.

summary_e2m6_11_001.cn: 你们和越医生交谈后得知，他负责矿区营地内的救治工作，而艾尔法斯此刻就在诊所内。
summary_e2m6_11_001.en: Medical Officer Yue tells you he oversees medical care at the Mining Camp and that Alfass is at the clinic right now.

summary_e2m6_13_001.cn: 你们来到洛茜的位置，她接回的探查队队员罗伊尔提到了源石树枝抵挡震荡波的情况，这提供了躲避震荡波的可能性。你们决定查明这一现象。罗伊尔想起詹娜奶奶在照料一棵活着的源石树苗，她一定知道更多。
summary_e2m6_13_001.en: You regroup with Rossi. The returning survey team member, Royle, mentions that Originium branches were able to block shockwaves, suggesting a possible method of defense. You decide to investigate this further. Royle recalls that Granny Jenner has been tending a living Originium sapling, so she might know more.

summary_e2m6_14_001.cn: 詹娜为你们讲述了矿脉源区的过往，被称为“星体”的巨型天使曾在四号谷地降临。四号谷地的人们选择引爆世代摇篮中的源石大树，以此消灭“星体”。与那棵源石大树有关的记忆，此刻在管理员脑内浮现……
summary_e2m6_14_001.en: Granny Jenner recounts the past of the Origin Lodespring. "Astarron", a giant Aggelos, once descended upon Valley IV and the Valley dwellers were forced to detonate the Great Originium Oak in the Cradle of Ages to destroy it. Now, memories tied to that tree has surfaced in the Endministrator's mind…

summary_e2m6_14d5_001.cn: 工团的孩子们发现了塔塔，并想和它一起玩。矿区营地内很安全，你们让它试着接纳孩子们。
summary_e2m6_14d5_001.en: UWST children notice Tata and want to play with it. With the Mining Camp secure, you encourage Tata to engage with them.

summary_e2m6_15_001.cn: 门卫马特维拦住了你们，矿区营地外的震荡波诡异且危险，在得到足够线索前不能贸然前进。
summary_e2m6_15_001.en: Matvei the gate guard stops you. The strange shockwaves outside the Mining Camp are too dangerous. You must find enough intel before you can head outside.

summary_e2m6_17_001.cn: 你们抵达了矿区医疗站，这里就是洛茜口中矿区营地的诊所。工团少女阿丽娅也在这里帮忙。你们和洛茜决定分头行动，积极收集线索。
summary_e2m6_17_001.en: You arrive at the Mining Area Clinic, the very one Rossi referred to as the Mining Camp's clinic. Alia is also helping out here. You and Rossi decide to fan out and gather as much intel as possible.

summary_e2m6_1_001.cn: 你们接到了伊冯的通信：她叮嘱你们照顾好塔塔，并告知矿脉源区也有协议通讯信号塔，可以借助塔塔升级的扫描功能消除侵蚀。
summary_e2m6_1_001.en: Yvonne contacts you, urging you to take good care of Tata. She also notes that the Origin Lodespring has Protocom Signal Towers and you can use Tata's enhanced scanning feature to eliminate the Blight.

summary_e2m6_5_001.cn: 在前往矿脉源区的路上，你们发现锚点竟然只形成了少量天使。佩丽卡推测前方可能潜伏着巨大威胁。一名叫阿丽娅的工团少女找到了你们，并发出了求助——支援一名遇到麻烦的狼群成员。
summary_e2m6_5_001.en: As you head toward the Origin Lodespring, you find that the Ankhors have generated far fewer Aggeloi than expected. Perlica suspects a serious threat lies ahead. A UWST crew mate named Alia rushes over and asks for your help — a Pack member is in trouble.

summary_e2m6_7_001.cn: 眼前的神秘少女似乎认识佩丽卡。经过一番交流，你们得知她是洛茜，一位与终末地有合作的狼群成员。她提到矿区医疗站有位叫作艾尔法斯的搜救队队员了解目前的情况，于是你们决定随她一同前往。
summary_e2m6_7_001.en: The mysterious girl seems to know Perlica. After a brief exchange, you learn her name is Rossi, and she's a Pack member working with Endfield. She says an SAR crew mate named Alfass at the Mining Area Clinic might know more about the current situation, so you decide to go there with her.

summary_e2m6_9_001.cn: 你们见到了艾尔法斯，他告诉你们他曾在世代摇篮附近见到一个疑似聂菲斯的女人，诡异的锚点和震荡波似乎都和她有关。你们有了一个可怕的猜想：聂菲斯难道可以控制锚点坠落的位置？
summary_e2m6_9_001.en: You meet with Alfass, and he tells you he once saw a woman resembling Nefarith near the Cradle of the Ages. The abnormal Ankhors and shockwaves may all be linked to her. A chilling thought comes to you: can Nefarith control where the Ankhors fall?

summary_e2m7_2_001.cn: 矿脉源区的锚点与这里的屏障相互关联。你们需要破坏剩余的锚点，解除屏障。
summary_e2m7_2_001.en: The Ankhor at the Origin Lodespring seems to be linked with the barrier. Neutralize the remaining Ankhors and see if you can dispel the barrier.

summary_e2m7_5_001.cn: 这些特殊的源石树枝似乎在回应着你。
summary_e2m7_5_001.en: These special Originium branches seem to be calling out to you.

summary_e2m7_5d5_001.cn: 你们救下了罗伊尔提到的探查队队员。他们被震荡波困在这里，依靠源石树枝坚持到了现在。他们同样提到了疑似聂菲斯的女人出现。为了答谢你们的帮助，他们决定使用吊车帮你们开路。
summary_e2m7_5d5_001.en: You save the survey team members that Royle mentioned. The shockwaves trapped them at this place and the Originium branches kept them intact. They also mentioned a woman who might be Nefarith. To thank you for saving them, they decide to use their crane and create a path for you.

summary_e2m7_6_001.cn: 最后一个锚点在运输区。
summary_e2m7_6_001.en: The last Ankhor is at the Logistics Area.

summary_e2m7_7_001.cn: 你需要将塔塔连接至协议信号塔，完成扫描。
summary_e2m7_7_001.en: Connect Tata to the Protocol Signal Tower and complete the scan.

summary_e2m7_8_001.cn: 最后一个锚点已被解决。你们准备返回世代摇篮入口，那里的屏障应该已经消失了。
summary_e2m7_8_001.en: The last Ankhor has been neutralized. The barrier should be gone. You prepare to head back to the entrance of the Cradle of the Ages.

summary_e2m8_4_001.cn: 巨型的天使被击败，在源石大树残骸的中央，一棵幼嫩的树苗破土而出。
summary_e2m8_4_001.en: The giant Aggelos is defeated. A tender sapling sprouted in the midst of the Great Originium Oak's remains.

summary_e2m8_5_001.cn: 这片于未愈的伤口处萌生的美景，也与你的过去息息相关。
summary_e2m8_5_001.en: The land is yet unhealed but a beauteous Originium geode has grown over the wounds. This may have something to do with your past.

summary_e2m8d5_1_001.cn: 前方危机四伏，你需要做足准备后再前进。
summary_e2m8d5_1_001.en: Danger lies ahead. Make sure you are fully prepared before advancing.

summary_e2m8d5_2_001.cn: 佩丽卡担心着你的安危。
summary_e2m8d5_2_001.en: Perlica is worried about your safety.

summary_e3m1_1_001.cn: 你们抵达了供能高地，此处是四号谷地的能源中心。聂菲斯所引发的危机源头近在咫尺，你们下定决心，准备迎接这段旅途最后的挑战。
summary_e3m1_1_001.en: You arrive at the Power Plateau, the energy producing center of Valley IV. The epicenter of the disaster caused by Nefarith is near. You steel yourselves and prepare to face the final challenge of this journey.

summary_e3m1_1d5_001.cn: 源石发电站——四号谷地开拓的象征已被裂地者占领，你们必须穿过这里，找到抵达超域试验场的路。
summary_e3m1_1d5_001.en: The Originium Power Plant, symbol of humanity's pioneering efforts in Valley IV, has been captured by the Landbreakers. You must go through this place to reach the Æther Test Site.

summary_e3m1_2_001.cn: 进入源石发电站，你们发现周围布满了战斗过的痕迹，许多设施已经被破坏，一些裂地者徘徊在门口。你们击败裂地者后，收到了未知男性的联络。
summary_e3m1_2_001.en: Inside the Originium Power Plant, you find signs of battle all around. Many of the facilities have been damaged, and several Landbreakers roam near the gate. After defeating them, you receive a radio message from an unfamiliar male voice.

summary_e3m1_4_001.cn: 与克劳的通信中断后，你们商议了一番，决定前往他提供的位置一探究竟。
summary_e3m1_4_001.en: After the radio call with Crowe, you hold a short discussion. You then decide to head to the location he provided to continue your investigations.

summary_e3m2_1_001.cn: 在和工团研究员安格鲁的交谈中，他声称自己正按照克劳的计划，做着与裂地者同归于尽的准备。你们连忙叫停了这一行为，并从他口中获得了克劳的准确位置。
summary_e3m2_1_001.en: You talk to UWST scientist Angro. He claims he's following Crowe's plans to take as many Landbreakers with him as he can. You quickly put a stop to his actions and acquire Crowe's precise location from him.

summary_e3m2_2_001.cn: 你们找到了克劳，他讲述了自己原本的计划——炸毁整个供能高地，与碾骨氏族同归于尽。在发现你们带着塔塔后，克劳改变了主意，决定支持终末地的计划。
summary_e3m2_2_001.en: You find Crowe, and he reveals his original plan — to blow up the entire Power Plateau and go down with the Bonekrushers. But your arrival with Tata convinces him to abandon that plan and support Endfield's mission.

summary_e3m3_11_001.cn: 克劳准备使用工团的应急手段——“烙铁指令”，呼叫附近战区的军事支援。所需的发信器和权限钥匙卡遗落在源石发电站中，克劳派出了学徒前去回收，但他们至今未归。克劳希望你们帮忙带回这些学徒，并找到对应物品。
summary_e3m3_11_001.en: Crowe plans to use the Utjug Order to request support from nearby warzones. The required signal emitter and authorization keycard were left in the Originium Power Plant. He sent his apprentices to retrieve them, but they haven't returned. He asks for your help to bring back both the apprentices and the items.

summary_e3m3_4_001.cn: 你们解救了与裂地者对峙的工团技术员邓恩，他是克劳派出回收权限钥匙卡的学徒。你们得到了带着血迹的权限钥匙，并从他口中得知另一位学徒克莱维尔前往了发电站内的实验室。
summary_e3m3_4_001.en: You rescue Dean, a UWST technician who was fending off Landbreakers. He's one of the apprentices Crowe sent to retrieve the authorization keycard. You obtain the bloodstained keycard and learn that another apprentice — Clavell — went toward the lab inside the Power Plant.

summary_e3m3_5_001.cn: 被困在实验室内的克莱维尔告诉你们，他在回收发信器的途中遭遇了裂地者，被迫将其一同锁在了实验室中。此刻，裂地者正在实验室内大肆破坏。为了解除危机，你们决定消灭一门之隔的裂地者。
summary_e3m3_5_001.en: Clavell, trapped inside the lab, tells you he ran into a Landbreaker while retrieving the signal emitter and was forced to lock the door. The Landbreaker is now tearing through the lab. You decide to take down the threat rampaging on the other side of the door.

summary_e3m3_8_001.cn: 在操作间转交“烙铁指令”相关的装置后，众人一起来到了源石发电站外。克劳决绝地启动了发信器，连通了工团的战区指挥部。战区指挥部希望你们使用信标定位火力打击位置，工团会提供远程火力支援。
summary_e3m3_8_001.en: You hand over the Utjug Order devices in the control room and head outside the Originium Power Plant. Crowe activates the signal emitter without hesitation, establishing contact with the UWST Warzone Command. The Command requests that you use beacons to mark strike targets — UWST will provide long-range fire support.

summary_e3m4_3_001.cn: 阻挡你们的机关似乎与吸入雾气后能看见的符号有所关联，佩丽卡提议尝试利用这些雾气和符号，找到破解机关的办法。
summary_e3m4_3_001.en: Breathing in the haze lets you see certain symbols that seem to be associated with the mechanisms blocking your way. Perlica recommends using the haze and symbols to find a way through the mechanisms.

summary_e3m4_6_001.cn: 超域试验场门前，你们下定了决心要关闭悬在头顶的裂隙，而塔塔是其中的关键。在准备充分后，该做出最后的了断了。
summary_e3m4_6_001.en: At the gates of the Æther Test Site, you resolve to seal the rift looming overhead — and Tata is the key. With everything in place, it's time for the final showdown.

summary_e3m6_101_001.cn: 你们赢得了胜利，但也失去了塔塔。秦茳尺希望你和参与决战的同伴返回枢纽区基地。
summary_e3m6_101_001.en: Victory is yours, but you have lost Tata. Director Qin hopes you can return to the Hub Base together with those who fought in the last battle.

summary_e3m6_102_001.cn: 你和战后归来的众人在枢纽区基地相聚，享受来之不易的胜利。
summary_e3m6_102_001.en: You and the people who fought in the battle meet up in the Hub Base. Together, you enjoy the hard-won victory.

summary_e3m6_105_001.cn: 秦茳尺向你汇报了四号谷地的状态。虽然道阻且长，但四号谷地终将恢复安宁。
summary_e3m6_105_001.en: Director Qin gives you a summary of the current situation in Valley IV. The road ahead is long and difficult, but peace will eventually return.

summary_e3m6_11_001.cn: 面对重回和平的四号谷地，你和佩丽卡重新确认了行动的决心，一起感受片刻的安宁。
summary_e3m6_11_001.en: Peace is returning to Valley IV. Both you and Perlica reaffirm each other's commitment to the mission and enjoy the brief moment of serenity.

summary_e4m1_101_001.cn: 伊冯侦测到了一个微弱的超域能量信号。你们需要利用塔塔在协议通讯信号塔里留下的扫描日志，帮助伊冯排除干扰。
summary_e4m1_101_001.en: Yvonne has detected a faint Æther energy signal. You'll need to use the scanning log Tata recorded in the Protocom Signal Tower to help her filter out the interference.

summary_e4m1_102_001.cn: 你得知罗丹似乎并没有被彻底击败。而与终末地合作的“猎人”莱西娅突然出现，证明超域的威胁已经变得越来越近。
summary_e4m1_102_001.en: You learn that Rhodagn is not completely defeated. A "hunter" named Lycia who has been working with Endfield makes a sudden appearance. These incidents show that you are getting closer to the Æther threat.

summary_e4m1_2_001.cn: 伊冯开始了超域能量的数据分析，她还利用协议通讯信号塔的数据制造了一枚临时试验组件。在利用它消除真正的侵蚀前，你们还需要对它做一些测试。
summary_e4m1_2_001.en: Yvonne has begun analyzing the Æther energy data readings. She also makes a test component using data you acquired from the Protocom Signal Towers. You must test out this component before using it to clear actual Blight.

summary_e4m1_3_001.cn: 在伊冯启动侵蚀模拟装置后，你们开始测试试验组件的扫描功能，看看能否通过它找出侵蚀核心。
summary_e4m1_3_001.en: Yvonne activates the Blight simulator. You begin testing the component's scanning feature and see if it can find the Blight Core.

summary_e4m1_4_001.cn: 伊冯定位了超域能量的活动位置。你们将前往供能高地的源石发电站寻找该信号。
summary_e4m1_4_001.en: Yvonne has located the source of the active Æther energy. Head to the Originium Power Plant on the Power Plateau to track the signal.

summary_e4m1d5_1_002.cn: 文明环带的三位代表向你报告了几乎与四号谷地事件同时出现的超域异象。基于《环带公约》，文明环带恢复了你与终末地工业的特别权限。
summary_e4m1d5_1_002.en: The three representatives from the Civilization Band report Æther anomalies to you, which occurred almost exactly at the same time as the Valley IV incident. Given the terms dictated by the Band Accord, the Civilization Band has restored a special authority level to you and to Endfield Industries.

summary_e4m1d5_6_001.cn: M3给你带来了有关聂菲斯的新消息：武陵城附近发现了与她有关的超域能量活动迹象。必须在聂菲斯造成更多破坏前阻止她。
summary_e4m1d5_6_001.en: M3 brings you news about Nefarith. Æther activity signatures linked to her have been found near Wuling City. You must stop Nefarith before she causes more destruction.

summary_e4m2_1_001.cn: 你们见到了洁尔佩塔。在佩丽卡与她确认情况后，你们准备共同前往封存处，尝试回收石棺。

summary_e4m2_3_001.cn: 多亏了洁尔佩塔的源石技艺，石棺安然无恙。你们需要将石棺带回帝江号。佩丽卡事先准备好了传送信标，她将与你一同寻找合适的投放位置。

summary_e4m2_4_001.cn: 信标展开完成。你们告别了陈千语与洁尔佩塔，带着石棺返回了帝江号。

summary_e4m2_5_001.cn: 佩丽卡希望你准备完毕后就来找她。

summary_e4m2_6_001.cn: 设备调试完毕，你躺入了石棺内。

summary_e4m2_7_001.cn: 你告诉佩丽卡自己并没能恢复记忆。担忧之余，她希望你先去休息。如果你有需要，随时可以在帝江号的舰桥处找到她。

summary_e4m2_9_001.cn: 你曾教会过佩丽卡许多——她向你诉说着你们的过去与她的担忧。尽管记忆仍未恢复，但你却未曾动摇过自己的信念，怀疑过自己的使命。你将一如既往地跨越苦难，与佩丽卡——与终末地并肩而行，抵达那联结一切的终焉之地。

summary_e5m1_10_001.cn: 你们清醒后遇到一个神秘的女孩，在对峙中陈千语突然认出了对方。原来她名叫汤汤，是清波寨的大当家。你和陈千语决定商量一下接下来该怎么办。
summary_e5m1_10_001.en: You meet a mysterious girl when you wake. During the stand-off, Chen suddenly recognizes the girl — Tangtang. She is now the chieftain of Qingbo Stockade. Chen and you decide to discuss about your next step.

summary_e5m1_1_001.cn: 帝江号上，你们分析了获取的情报，认为聂菲斯和碾骨氏族正向武陵方向转移。菲奥娜已经准备好了着陆程序，你们决定即刻出发，支援武陵城。
summary_e5m1_1_001.en: You analyze the gathered intel aboard Dijiang, and believe that Nefarith and her Bonekrushers are moving towards Wuling. Fiona has prepared the landing protocol. You decide to set off at once to support Wuling City.

summary_e5m1_5_001.cn: 你们成功着陆，却发现由于事故，着陆点和计划产生了偏差。所幸你们仍在武陵范围内，接下来的路只能自己走了。曾在武陵城生活过的陈千语自告奋勇，带着你们寻找渡水的动力竹筏。
summary_e5m1_5_001.en: You successfully make your landing but an accident has caused the landing point to deviate from the planned coordinates. Though you are still within the Wuling region, there is quite a bit of walking to do. Chen Qianyu has lived in Wuling before, so she volunteers to take you around and find a powered raft to navigate the waters.

summary_e5m1_6_001.cn: 你们在渡口邂逅了一名自称“阿达希尔”的旅行者，他正因读不懂炎国文字而无法启动竹筏。你们看他没有恶意，决定帮他一把。
summary_e5m1_6_001.en: You meet a traveler named Ardashir at the ferry point. He can't activate the raft as he doesn't know how to read Yanese. Since Ardashir looks friendly enough, you decide to help him out.

summary_e5m1_7_001.cn: 你们走下竹筏，眼前是一片茂密的竹林，阿达希尔先走一步，你们也决定穿过竹林前往武陵城。
summary_e5m1_7_001.en: You alight from the raft and see a dense bamboo grove before you. Ardashir takes his leave. You also decide to pass through the grove to reach Wuling City.

summary_e5m1_9d5_001.cn: 即将走出竹林时，阿达希尔突然叫住了你。他问了你一个意味深长的问题。你的回答没有任何犹豫，阿达希尔注视着你离去的身影，脸上留下了复杂的表情。
summary_e5m1_9d5_001.en: Ardashir suddenly calls out to you when you are about to leave the grove. He asks you a deep question. You answer without hesitation and exit the grove, leaving the young man with an uncertain look on his face as he sees you off.

summary_e5m2_11_001.cn: 佩丽卡发觉裂地者此次的行动方式和四号谷地时的截然不同，推测他们还有什么不为人知的计划。汤汤确认大桨平安无事后，招呼你们一起去修桥。
summary_e5m2_11_001.en: Perlica notices that the Landbreakers are behaving very differently from how they acted in Valley IV. She suspects that they might have some secret plans. Meanwhile, after confirming that Da Jiang is safe, Tangtang asks you and your team to help repair the bridge.

summary_e5m2_16_001.cn: 你们帮助清波寨解除了危机，收获了更多的信任。此时石牙告诉你们，还有一批寨民被困在了小礁附近。
summary_e5m2_16_001.en: You help Qingbo Stockade overcome the crisis and earn their trust. Just then, Stonefang tells you that another group of residents is trapped near the small reef.

summary_e5m2_1_001.cn: 你和陈千语核对情况后，决定先不轻举妄动。和汤汤打过交道的陈千语提出了一个办法——将计就计。
summary_e5m2_1_001.en: You and Chen Qianyu agree that it's best not to make any sudden moves for now. Drawing on her past run-ins with Tangtang, Chen proposes an idea — beat her at her own game.

summary_e5m2_20_001.cn: 众人齐心协力解救了寨民，汤汤感慨如果早点认识你们多好。阮一觉得汤汤见到你们后开心了许多。汤汤遵守约定，告诉你们修好前方的水车就可以打开通往武陵城的路。
summary_e5m2_20_001.en: With everyone working together, the trapped Stockade residents are safely rescued. Tangtang lets out a wistful sigh, wishing she had met you sooner. Ruan Yi remarks that Tangtang has been in much better spirits since crossing paths with you. As promised, Tangtang tells you once the waterwheels ahead are repaired, the path to Wuling City will be clear.

summary_e5m2_2_001.cn: 你和陈千语一唱一和，声称自己希望跟着汤汤混，借此报复武陵城。汤汤在奉承之下相信了两人。陈千语提议先找到同伴佩丽卡，以便更好地帮助汤汤对付武陵城巡卫，汤汤想也不想就答应了下来。
summary_e5m2_2_001.en: You and Chen put on a show, saying you want to stick with Tangtang to get back at Wuling City. Tangtang quickly falls for your flattery and starts trusting you. Chen suggests finding Perlica first so you can better help Tangtang against Wuling watchguards. Without a second thought, Tangtang agrees immediately.

summary_e5m2_3_001.cn: 你们找到了佩丽卡，此时的她正在和汤汤的哥哥——阮一对峙。在汤汤的一番解释下，佩丽卡和阮一暂时中止了剑拔弩张的架势。汤汤趁机把阮一拉到了一旁说起悄悄话来。
summary_e5m2_3_001.en: You find Perlica and she is locked in a standoff with Tangtang's older brother, Ruan Yi. After Tangtang explains the situation, the tension eases and both Perlica and Ruan Yi lower their guard. Tangtang then pulls Ruan Yi aside for a private conversation.

summary_e5m2_4_001.cn: 你和陈千语向佩丽卡说明了当前的情况，在分析局势后，佩丽卡认为需要找到方法尽快抵达武陵城。此时汤汤也已决定利用你们帮清波寨做事，提出只要帮忙，她就可以助你们前往武陵城。
summary_e5m2_4_001.en: You and Chen explain everything to Perlica. After analyzing the situation, she agrees that the top priority is finding a way to reach Wuling City as soon as possible. At the same time, Tangtang has also made up her mind — if you are willing to help out around Qingbo Stockade, she'll return the favor by helping you get to Wuling City.

summary_e5m3_0d5_001.cn: 汤汤声称自己很欣赏你们，还给了你们“汤汤券”作为信物。对于你决定继续前往武陵城“解决恩怨”一事，汤汤大为赞许，欣然同行。
summary_e5m3_0d5_001.en: Tangtang is impressed with your work and even gives you Tangtang Certs as a token of her appreciation. She also approves of your goal of "settling the biz" at Wuling City and happily decides to tag along.

summary_e5m3_1_001.cn: 汤汤从弭弗手中逃走，这位武陵巡卫队的队长认出了你们的身份，打算向庄方宜汇报你们的情况。
summary_e5m3_1_001.en: Tangtang escapes from Mi Fu, but the Captain of the Wuling Watchguards recognizes you. She decides to report to Zhuang Fangyi about your situation.

summary_e5m3_3_001.cn: 汤汤的爆破行为影响了储备站的防御工事。你们看着紧闭的大门，意外发现竟是终末地和宏科院曾经合作的产品，佩丽卡提到只需要让轴承保持转动就可以打开门。闻言，弭弗似乎想起了什么，让你们跟她走。
summary_e5m3_3_001.en: Tangtang's demolition has affected the defense works of the Field Logistics Depot. You look at the tightly shut gate and accidentally discover that it was jointly produced by Endfield and HAS. Perlica mentions that you can open the gate by keeping the main bearings operable. Mi Fu hears this and seems to remember something. She asks you to follow her.

summary_e5m3_4_001.cn: 弭弗带你们进入储藏室，众人在杂物中发现了一台射流无人机。
summary_e5m3_4_001.en: Mi Fu brings you to a storage room filled with random things, including a jet drone.

summary_e5m3_5_001.cn: 你们成功打开了通路，与公务在身的弭弗告别，准备前往武陵城见庄方宜。
summary_e5m3_5_001.en: You successfully opened up a way and say goodbye to Mi Fu as she still has work to do. You then prepare to head to Wuling City to meet Zhuang Fangyi.

summary_e6m1_10_001.cn: 你们在息壤沙盘上看到了武陵面临的侵蚀潮威胁。庄方宜坦承，如今武陵城的息壤储备撑不过三个月。唯有集成工业系统建成后，依靠量产息壤才能替武陵城解围。
summary_e6m1_10_001.en: The Xiranite sandbox shows the threat of the Blight Tide looming over Wuling. Zhuang Fangyi admits that the city's current Xiranite reserves will not last more than three months. In order to save Wuling, the Automated Industry Complex must be completed for Xiranite mass production.

summary_e6m1_11_001.cn: 当你触碰了办公室中的粒子束后，你感觉到了息壤对你的亲和。庄方宜向你解释，息壤技术的诞生本就和你有关。
summary_e6m1_11_001.en: You touch the particular formation in the office and feel the Xiranite resonate with you. Zhuang Fangyi explains that the very birth of Xiranite technology has been tied to you from the start.

summary_e6m1_12_001.cn: 庄方宜为你留下了一块未开发的区域用于部署协议核心。此外，她也希望你能够回忆起一些武陵城的人或事。
summary_e6m1_12_001.en: Zhuang Fangyi has reserved an undeveloped area for you to deploy the PAC. Additionally, she hopes you can recall some of the people and events of Wuling City.

summary_e6m1_13_001.cn: 你们发现，武陵城外发生了紧急情况，巡卫正在协助平民撤回城内的安全区域。
summary_e6m1_13_001.en: You discovered that an emergency has occurred outside Wuling City. The watchguards are helping civilians evacuate to safety.

summary_e6m1_2_001.cn: 你们惊讶于在天师桩阵列上空出现的庄方宜，而她似乎也注意到了你的存在。在庄方宜的授意下，无人机迎宾客前来迎接你们前往总桩与她见面。
summary_e6m1_2_001.en: To your surprise, you spot Zhuang Fangyi flying above the Tianshi Pillar array. She seems to have noticed you too. Moments later, a drone receptionist, dispatched under her authorization, arrives to greet you and invites you to proceed to the Main Pillar to meet her.

summary_e6m1_3_001.cn: 进入受天师桩阵列保护的武陵城之后，安全的环境让你们紧张许久的心情终于得以放松。陈千语也对阔别已久的武陵城充满了期待。
summary_e6m1_3_001.en: Entering Wuling City under the protection of the Tianshi Pillar array, the tense weight that had lingered for so long finally began to lift. Chen Qianyu's eyes lit up — after all these years, she was here again.

summary_e6m1_4_001.cn: 迎宾客带领你们来到总桩之下，弭弗已经在此等待。她引导你们前往庄方宜办公室。
summary_e6m1_4_001.en: The receptionist bot leads you to the Main Pillar, where Mi Fu is already waiting. She then escorts you to Zhuang Fangyi's office.

summary_e6m1_7_001.cn: 庄方宜重整衣装后，在办公室迎接你们的到来。她对你的失忆状态极为关心。从交谈中得知，似乎在多年以前，你们就已经短暂相识。
summary_e6m1_7_001.en: After adjusting her attire, Zhuang Fangyi welcomes you into her office. She's visibly concerned about your memory loss, and during the conversation, it becomes clear that the two of you had a brief encounter many years ago.

summary_e6m1_9_001.cn: 你和庄方宜站在窗前，远眺了城外的侵蚀潮。武陵城外危机四伏，你们也与庄方宜分享了有关聂菲斯和阿达希尔的情报。
summary_e6m1_9_001.en: You and Zhuang Fangyi stand by the window and gaze out at the Blight Tide beyond the city. Danger lurks all around the outskirts of Wuling. You also share intel concerning Nefarith and Ardashir with Zhuang Fangyi.

summary_e6m2_11_001.cn: 连通试验田的水渠因为意外塌方无法正常提供用水。为了避免试验田受影响，你们决定用集成工业系统的设备解决麻烦。
summary_e6m2_11_001.en: The canal connected to the test plots has collapsed due to an unexpected landslide. Water supply has been disrupted. You decide to fix this issue by using the facilities of the AIC Factory.

summary_e6m2_13_001.cn: 水泵和给水器安置完毕之后，彦宁主动向我们提供了可以自动连接周围息壤电力设备的息壤中继器和供电桩。
summary_e6m2_13_001.en: Having deployed the Fluid Pump and Fluid Supply Unit, Yan Ning eagerly provides you with Xiranite Relays and Xiranite Pylons that can automatically connect nearby Xiranite power facilities.

summary_e6m2_14_001.cn: 利用集成工业系统顺利解决了水渠的麻烦后，你们决定陪同彦宁天师前去深度读数异常区域。
summary_e6m2_14_001.en: After fixing the canal with the AIC Factory, you decide to accompany Tianshi Yan to the area with abnormal Depth readings.

summary_e6m2_3_001.cn: 你们按照庄方宜所说，与她安排的向导——少年巡卫黎风会合，由他带领你们前往预留的工业用地。
summary_e6m2_3_001.en: Following Zhuang Fangyi's instructions, you meet up with the guide (Lifeng) she arranged. He will lead you to the designated industrial site.

summary_e6m2_5_001.cn: 跟随黎风前往部署集成工业系统的途中，你们偶遇了在此收集数据的彦宁和白霜。众人闲谈间，威胁突然出现……
summary_e6m2_5_001.en: While Lifeng leads you to the AIC Factory deployment site, you run into Yan Ning and Bai Shuang who are collecting data. While talking to them, danger suddenly makes an unexpected appearance...

summary_e6m2_6_001.cn: 你们惊讶于在天师桩阵列内也出现了天使，这说明武陵城的实际情况已经很糟糕。天师彦宁带着她的学生白霜继续设法遏制侵蚀灾害，而黎风则带领你们前往目的地。
summary_e6m2_6_001.en: You're surprised to see Aggeloi inside the Tianshi Pillar array. This reveals just how dire the situation in Wuling City has become. Tianshi Yan Ning and her student Bai Shuang continue to hold back the Blight, while Lifeng leads you toward your destination.

summary_e6m2_7_001.cn: 你们降下了协议核心，准备正式开始武陵的工业计划。
summary_e6m2_7_001.en: You deploy the PAC and make preparations to start the Wuling AIC Factory Plan.

summary_e6m2_8_001.cn: 彦宁天师通过采集的数据判断出武陵城的息壤储备情况比她所知的更不乐观，也因此对把所有麻烦都扛在肩上的庄方宜十分不满。为了尽快实现息壤的量产，庄方宜邀请你们前往息壤中心实验室帮忙。
summary_e6m2_8_001.en: Upon analyzing the collected data, Tianshi Yan concludes that Wuling City's Xiranite reserve is in worse shape than she expected — much to her frustration, especially with Zhuang Fangyi for trying to shoulder everything on her own. In order to accelerate the mass production of Xiranite, Zhuang Fangyi invites you to assist at the Xiranite Central Laboratory.

summary_e6m2_9_001.cn: 黎风为你们指出一条前往息壤中心实验室的近路，他希望有朝一日能够去帝江号学习。在出发之前，陈千语提醒你，之后可以前往选剑局挑选装备。
summary_e6m2_9_001.en: Lifeng points out a shortcut to the Xiranite Central Laboratory and hopes that one day he can train aboard Dijiang. Before setting off, Chen reminds you that you can later visit the Hongshan Swordmancers to choose your gear.

summary_e6m3_10_001.cn: 庄方宜难得在你面前露出些慵懒的神色，她期许着这一路上的经历能让你对武陵的看法发生些许改变。与此同时，喧闹声逐渐变大，难得的天桩表演就要开始了。
summary_e6m3_10_001.en: In a rare moment, Zhuang Fangyi shows you her relaxed expression. She hopes the experience has somewhat changed your views about Wuling. The city streets become increasingly boisterous and lively. The carefully rehearsed sky pole performance is about to begin.

summary_e6m3_11_001.cn: 庄方宜已经从你的行动中得到了令她满意的答案，她向你分享了她的过去，还有武陵城的过去。
summary_e6m3_11_001.en: Your actions gave Zhuang Fangyi a satisfactory answer. She tells you about the past of Wuling and herself.

summary_e6m3_14_001.cn: 所有人都屏气凝神期待着实验的最后结果，成功的那一刻，你和庄方宜都舒了一口气。在等待息壤生产设备蓝图的时间里，庄方宜邀请你参观息壤中心实验室。
summary_e6m3_14_001.en: With bated breaths, everyone waits for the results of the test run. Both you and Zhuang give sighs of relief when it finally works. While waiting for the blueprints of Xiranite production facilities, Zhuang takes you on a tour of the Xiranite Central Laboratory.

summary_e6m3_15_001.cn: 前往资料室的途中，你和庄方宜偶遇了吴静薇。庄方宜拒绝了吴静薇帮忙取资料的好意，亲自陪管理员去找科考站落成以来的报告资料。
summary_e6m3_15_001.en: While en route to the data room, you and Zhuang Fangyi run into Wu Jingwei. Zhuang refuses Wu's friendly offer of looking for the data. Instead, she accompanies you herself to find reports documenting the events after the completion of the Science Station.

summary_e6m3_16_001.cn: 在你浏览过资料室的文件之后，庄方宜很好奇你对武陵城的看法，可她似乎没有得到想要的回答。交谈之后，她决定带你去实验室外看看。
summary_e6m3_16_001.en: After reading the files in the data room, Zhuang Fangyi curiously asks you about your views about Wuling City. However, your answer fails to satisfy her. After a short discussion, she decides to take the tour outside the lab.

summary_e6m3_17_001.cn: 佩丽卡传来消息，息壤生产设备的蓝图已经准备完毕。你与庄方宜暂别后，准备出发前往集成核心区域和佩丽卡会合。
summary_e6m3_17_001.en: Perlica informs you that blueprints for the Xiranite-producing facility are completed. You part ways with Zhuang Fangyi for now and prepare to make your way to Perlica at the Core AIC Area.

summary_e6m3_2_001.cn: 你们进入息壤中心实验室时，陈千语一通意外操作，让她的鬼脸被录入了系统之中。
summary_e6m3_2_001.en: While entering the Xiranite Central Laboratory, Chen fumbles around and accidentally records her silly face in the system.

summary_e6m3_3_001.cn: 庄方宜和息壤中心实验室的天师们正在对数据进行校准，实验因为意外反复失败。在出现新的麻烦后，你打算协助庄方宜完成实验。
