summary_e6m3_3_001.en: Zhuang Fangyi and the Tianshi of the Xiranite Central Laboratory are calibrating the data. The test has repeatedly failed due to the accident. You decide to help Zhuang complete the testing before new issues start to appear.

summary_e6m3_4_001.cn: 你与庄方宜偶然路过城里盛开的梨花，她突然提起，武陵的第一盆梨花就是你送给这座城市的礼物。一位年轻的天师突然跑来告诉你们，有一台演出用的天桩在方兴衢上方丢了，庄方宜决定拉着你去追逐天桩。
summary_e6m3_4_001.en: You and Zhuang Fangyi pass by a blooming pear tree in the city. She suddenly mentions that the very first pear tree of the city was your gift for the city. A young Tianshi suddenly runs in and informs you that a sky pole for a performance was lost at Fangxing Avenue. Zhuang decides to drag you along and retrieve the device.

summary_e6m3_5_001.cn: 庄方宜拉着你找到了信号丢失的天桩，但天桩又朝着方兴衢的方向飞走了。
summary_e6m3_5_001.en: Zhuang Fangyi drags you along to find the disconnected sky pole. However, the drone suddenly starts flying towards Fangxing Avenue.

summary_e6m3_6_001.cn: 你和庄方宜遇到了正在哭泣的小橡。小橡指出了天桩离开的方向，庄方宜约定送他一个商会联动限定款龙泡泡。
summary_e6m3_6_001.en: Zhuang Fangyi and you run into a weeping child named Xiao Xiang. The boy tells you where the sky pole flew, and Zhuang Fangyi promises to give him an exclusive Chubby Lung from the TGCC crossover event.

summary_e6m3_7_001.cn: 天桩在方兴衢附近被热情的路人合力围堵，但依旧让其逃脱，向火锅店的方向飞去。
summary_e6m3_7_001.en: Eager passersby of Fangxing Avenue try their best to intercept the sky pole, but the drone still manages to escape and make its way towards a hot pot eatery.

summary_e6m3_9_001.cn: 失控的天桩落入火锅之中，却又突然重启引发一阵骚动。最后天桩撞上路灯，终于消停了下来。
summary_e6m3_9_001.en: The out-of-control sky pole flies into a hot pot. It then reboots itself and flies around some more. The sky pole then rams itself into a lamp post, finally ending the debacle.

summary_e6m4_11_001.cn: 弭弗与破潮之像已经开始交战，你们终于赶到，一同迎战敌人。
summary_e6m4_11_001.en: Mi Fu has started fighting the Tidalklast. You finally arrive to fight this enemy.

summary_e6m4_12_001.cn: 你们解决了破潮之像，但弭弗却在战斗中受了些伤，汤汤因此也对弭弗格外关照。
summary_e6m4_12_001.en: You defeat the Tidalklast but Mi Fu gets injured in the fight. Because of this, she receives plenty of attention from Tangtang.

summary_e6m4_13_001.cn: 你们成功重启了观测站，而弭弗受伤的事情却让汤汤的情绪低落。汤汤似乎还有其他事情瞒着你们。
summary_e6m4_13_001.en: You successfully restart the monitoring center. However, Mi Fu's wounds make Tangtang a little sad. Tangtang seems to be hiding something from you.

summary_e6m4_14_001.cn: 你们准备回武陵城时，汤汤叫住了你。她主动提出想要借助集成工业系统来解决清波寨遇到的麻烦。在得到你们的保证后，她兴奋地回寨子做准备，而你们也决定先行回去见庄方宜。
summary_e6m4_14_001.en: You prepare to return to Wuling City. Tangtang calls out to you and proposes using the Endfield AIC Factory to solve the problems at Qingbo Stockade. After securing your promise, an excited Tangtang runs back to the Stockade to get the preparations underway. You also decide to head back and meet with Zhuang Fangyi.

summary_e6m4_15_001.cn: 你们回到庄方宜的办公室，重新理清了眼下的局面，虽然威胁依然藏在暗中，但你们会与武陵共同面对。
summary_e6m4_15_001.en: You return to Zhuang Fangyi's office and organize what you found out about the situation. Although the threat still lurks in the shadows, you will face it together with Wuling.

summary_e6m4_18_001.cn: 你们准备出发，前去查看观测站的情况。
summary_e6m4_18_001.en: You prepare to set off and investigate the situation at the monitoring center.

summary_e6m4_1_001.cn: 彦宁希望你尽快部署息壤生产线，解武陵燃眉之急。
summary_e6m4_1_001.en: Yan Ning hopes that you can deploy the Xiranite production line ASAP to resolve the Wuling urgency.

summary_e6m4_22_001.cn: 彦宁天师希望你们能够用息壤控流节点，来验证集成工业系统生产的首批息壤的功效。
summary_e6m4_22_001.en: Tianshi Yan Ning hopes you can use the Xiranite flow control node to verify the effectiveness of the first batch of Xiranite produced by the AIC Factory.

summary_e6m4_2_001.cn: 你们借助息壤控流节点消除了侵蚀后，突然收到了庄方宜的紧急通信。
summary_e6m4_2_001.en: After eliminating the Blight with the Xiranite flow control node, you suddenly receive an emergency call from Zhuang Fangyi.

summary_e6m4_4_001.cn: 你们前去与弭弗会合的时候，却意外见到了被捕的汤汤。汤汤与弭弗打赌输了之后，不得不协助弭弗解决麻烦，与你们共同前往观测站。
summary_e6m4_4_001.en: You meet up with Mi Fu and run into Tangtang who has just been arrested. Tangtang loses a bet and reluctantly agrees to help Mi Fu and travel with you to the monitoring center to solve the issue.

summary_e6m4_8_001.cn: 观测站内的天使——破潮之像，似乎是很大的威胁。弭弗决定先行前往确认情况，而你们则是从正面通过。
summary_e6m4_8_001.en: Tidalklast, the Aggelos at the monitoring center, seems like a powerful threat. Mi Fu intends to take point and scout ahead. You decide to approach from the front side.

summary_e6m4_9_001.cn: 你们好不容易追上弭弗，但破潮之像的威胁也愈发严重。弭弗试图尽快解决危机，决定自行前往。
summary_e6m4_9_001.en: You finally catch up to Mi Fu but the Tidalklast poses a serious threat. Mi Fu tries to address this crisis by confronting the entity on her own.

summary_e6m5_1_001.cn: 你们前往清波寨的时候，恰好在半路撞上了汤汤。她谎称是来接应你们，其实是想连通阻断了道路的桥梁。
summary_e6m5_1_001.en: While heading towards Qingbo Stockade, you run into Tangtang. She tries to tell you that she is here to pick you up. In truth, she is thinking about repairing the broken bridge.

summary_e6m5_2_001.cn: 回到清波寨，你们受到了寨民的热情欢迎，并在他们的支持下开始筹备集成工业系统的建设。
summary_e6m5_2_001.en: The residents of Qingbo Stockade warmly welcome your return. With their support, you prepare the construction of the AIC Factory.

summary_e6m5_3_001.cn: 寨民对你们的帮助表达了感谢，汤汤马上又要动身去解决寨里的其他麻烦。与此同时，阿达希尔似乎也谋划着什么……
summary_e6m5_3_001.en: The Stockade residents thank you for your help. Tangtang prepares to leave and solve another Stockade problem. Meanwhile, Ardashir seems to be plotting something...

summary_f1m10_1_001.cn: 维拉告诉你生态种植区被裂地者洗劫一空，她现在急需一些苦叶椒。你告诉她会去野外帮她采集一些。
summary_f1m10_1_001.en: Vera tells you that the Eco-Farm was completely looted by Landbreakers but she desperately needs some tartpeppers. You tell her that you will try to gather some from the wilderness.

summary_f1m10_7_001.cn: 维拉告诉你，要想收获作物，还需要精心培育。将来如果你想种植无法用种植机生产的作物，可以随时带着种子来这里。
summary_f1m10_7_001.en: Vera says the plots must receive tender loving care for a good harvest. You can always return to this place to grow crops that cannot be grown with the Planting Unit, as long as you have the seeds.

summary_f1m10_8_001.cn: 维拉感谢你帮她寻找苦叶椒来应急，但她还希望找到种子重新开始种植。你可以用集成工业系统的采种机采集种子，也可以在自称是“植物学家”的维尔莫林处购买。
summary_f1m10_8_001.en: Vera is grateful for the tartpeppers you gathered but she now wants some seeds to grow them again. You can either use the AIC Factory Seed-Picking Unit to pick seeds from the tartpeppers; or find Wellmorin, the self-professed botanist and buy some from him.

summary_f1m10d1_1_001.cn: 农业天师田悯告诉你由于种子遗失与人手不足，实验作物试点区的种植计划濒临崩溃，他希望你帮忙种植一些作物。
summary_f1m10d1_1_001.en: Nongye Tianshi Tian Min informs you that due to seed loss and insufficient manpower, the planting plan in the Agricultural Test Site is on the verge of collapse. He requests your assistance in cultivating some crops.

summary_f1m10d1_6_001.cn: 顺利将作物种植在实验作物试点区后，你向田悯说明了情况，他在惊喜之余向你提及了作物需水量大的情况，最后你打算用终末地研发的洒水机解决这个难题。
summary_f1m10d1_6_001.en: After successfully planting the crops in the Agricultural Test Site, you report the progress to Tian Min. Delighted yet concerned, he mentions the crop's high water demands. You decide to resolve the issue using the Sprinkler from Endfield.

summary_f1m18d1_2_001.cn: 为了阻碍天师洪波参与复合式农场的建设，浪头要求你们挑战他设置的“三大难”。
summary_f1m18d1_2_001.en: Lang Tou wants to stop Tianshi Hong Bo from taking part in building the farm complex, and thus challenges you to best his Three Super Dares.

summary_f1m18d1_3_001.cn: 洪波靠着巧劲在“第一难”中战胜了浪头。
summary_f1m18d1_3_001.en: Hong Bo uses a technique and defeats Lang Tou in the First Dare.

summary_f1m18d1_4_001.cn: “第二难”要考验“身手”，你需要在时限内用任意方式碰到河佬。
summary_f1m18d1_4_001.en: The Second Dare is a trial of agility. You must touch He Lao within the time limit, regardless of the method used.

summary_f1m18d1_5_001.cn: 在进行“第三难”前，浪头选择仓皇逃走。青芜似乎发现了说服浪头的机会，希望你尽快跟去。
summary_f1m18d1_5_001.en: Lang Tou suddenly decides to flee before the Third Dare. Qingwu thinks she found a chance to convince Lang Tou and hopes you can catch up to him.

summary_f1m18d1_6_001.cn: 浪头不慎让孩子的风筝掉入了侵蚀污染区。为了安抚孩子，他不得不请求你们帮忙取回风筝。
summary_f1m18d1_6_001.en: Lang Tou accidentally caused a child's kite to fall into a Blighted zone. He needs your help to retrieve the kite and appease the sad child.

summary_f1m18d1_7_001.cn: 取回风筝后，浪头仍旧不愿承认你们通过了“第三难”，但也不再阻拦天师们继续施工。
summary_f1m18d1_7_001.en: Despite retrieving the kite, Lang Tou refuses to let you pass the Third Dare. However, he steps out of the way and lets the Tianshi get on with the construction work.

summary_f1m20_1_001.cn: 跟随陈千语来到选剑局后，你们见到了连晓雾，她向你们展示了装备精锻的方法。
summary_f1m20_1_001.en: After following Chen Qianyu to Hongshan Swordmancers, you meet Lian Xiaowu, who demonstrates gear artificing techniques.

summary_f1m20_2_001.cn: 跟随陈千语来到选剑局后，你们遇到了武陵选剑局的负责人连晓雾，她向你们展示了装备精锻的方法。
summary_f1m20_2_001.en: You follow Chen Qianyu to the Hongshan Swordmancers and meet Lian Xiaowu, who demonstrates gear artificing techniques.

summary_f1m20_3_001.cn: 你学会了装备精锻。连晓雾告诉你们，虽然精锻强化可能不会一次成功，但在多次尝试下，也必然能够完成装备的精锻强化。
summary_f1m20_3_001.en: You have learned gear artificing. Lian Xiaowu reminds you that your first artificing attempt might not succeed, but doing it again and again will completely artifice your gear eventually.

summary_f1m22_1_001.cn: 帝江号需要你协助升级总控中枢。升级后，你将可以建造更多舱室，或进一步升级已有的舱室。
summary_f1m22_1_001.en: You are required to upgrade the Control Nexus of Dijiang. This lets you construct more cabins or upgrade existing cabins.

summary_f1m22_4_001.cn: 新的舱室顺利开始运作。另外，会客室的情报交流功能也已经成功恢复。
summary_f1m22_4_001.en: The new cabin is now operational. The Clue Exchange function of the Reception Room is also restored.

summary_f1m24_1_001.cn: 这位名叫邦妮的干员告诉你，仓储节点因裂地者的攻击开启了安全模式，需要你的权限重新解锁。她还提到，现在可以将仓储节点接入集成工业系统了。
summary_f1m24_1_001.en: Operator Bonnie reports the depot node activated safety protocols during the Landbreaker assault and requires your authorization to resume operations. She also notes the node is now ready for integration with the AIC.

summary_f1m24_2_001.cn: 你重新解锁了仓储节点，但邦妮发现，许多Delta型机器人由于超域灾害的影响失联，无法进行调度。她告诉你，可以通过提升仓储节点的操作等级，获得高级操作权限，完成运输。
summary_f1m24_2_001.en: You successfully reactivate the depot node, but Bonnie discovers that many Delta Bots have gone offline due to the Ætherside disaster and cannot be dispatched. She explains that by elevating the node's operations level, you can obtain advanced authority privileges to resume transport operations.

summary_f1m24d1_1_001.cn: 你提升了仓储节点的操作等级，获得了邦妮的感谢。
summary_f1m24d1_1_001.en: You increased the operations level for the depot node. Bonnie is grateful.

summary_f1m3_1_001.cn: 你找到了终末地工业的物资调度员“幸运萝卜”。得到授权之后，物资调度员会使用调度券采买和贩售商品，协调地区内部供需。
summary_f1m3_1_001.en: You've found Endfield's Stock Redistributor, "Lucky Carrot." Once authorized, she will use stock bills to purchase and sell goods, coordinating supply and demand within the area.

summary_f1m3_3_001.cn: “幸运萝卜”告诉你，你还可以投入更多调度券来升级物资调度系统。
summary_f1m3_3_001.en: Lucky Carrot informs you that investing more stock bills will upgrade the stock redistribution system.

summary_f1m3d1_1_001.cn: “幸运萝卜”为你介绍了“稳定需求物资”和“弹性需求物资”的区别。另外，如果能在其他区域投入调度券，就能进一步增加供货种类。
summary_f1m3d1_1_001.en: Lucky Carrot explains the difference between staple goods and elastic goods. Additionally, investing stock bills in other areas will further expand the variety of goods available.

summary_f1m4d1_1_001.cn: 难民暂居处突然多了许多伤员，你们决定帮助阿吉分发物资。
summary_f1m4d1_1_001.en: Many injured people have suddenly arrived at the Refugee Camp. You decide to help Ginny distribute the supplies.

summary_f1m4d1_5_001.cn: 由于伤员突然增加，难民暂居处的物资变得捉襟见肘。更让人担心的是，卡贾似乎去了裂地者出没的地方。
summary_f1m4d1_5_001.en: Supplies of the Refugee Camp are running out due to the sudden influx of the sick and wounded. Another worrying issue is that Karja seems to have run off to areas where Landbreaker bands have been seen.

summary_f1m4d1_7_001.cn: 索斯不愿意放弃救助更多人的机会，他拿出了自己的配给，并希望你去工人之家联系一位叫罗曼的工人。
summary_f1m4d1_7_001.en: Soth wants to save more people and refuses to give up. He offers his own rations for the injured, and asks if you can contact a crew mate named Roman at the Worker Dorms.

summary_f1m4d1_8_001.cn: 罗曼准备亲自去难民暂居处提供帮助，他希望你们协助他凑齐用于比对的植物样本，并取回培育室的应急经验笔记。
summary_f1m4d1_8_001.en: Roman is personally heading to the camp to teach the residents how to identify edible plants. He needs your help to gather some plants for his lessons and pick up his notes on food processing from the cultivation chamber.

summary_f1m4d1_9_001.cn: 在多方帮助下，难民暂居处的物资危机得到了缓解。
summary_f1m4d1_9_001.en: Your actions and those of helpful allies successfully alleviate the supplies shortage at the Refugee Camp.

summary_f1m4d2_1_001.cn: 阿杜似乎发现了幸存者活动的迹象，想要一些干粮好去探察。但索斯认为阿杜只是找借口骗取物资，没有同意分配。
summary_f1m4d2_1_001.en: Dewey has probably found signs of other survivors. He needs some rations to confirm this finding. However, Dewey's request gets turned down as Soth believes that he is just looking for an excuse to get more supplies.

summary_f1m4d2_2_001.cn: 你和陈千语找到了准备独自行动的阿杜。尽管两手空空，但阿杜仍然要坚持行动。
summary_f1m4d2_2_001.en: Despite being unarmed and unprepared, Dewey remains determined to proceed alone, until you and Chen intervene.

summary_f1m4d2_5_001.cn: 阿杜向你解释了他执意冒险的理由：他想偿还工人们对他恶行的宽容。
summary_f1m4d2_5_001.en: Dewey tells you why he risked his own life to save the UWST crew mates. Turns out the crew mates have forgiven him for his misdemeanors.

summary_f1m4d2_6_001.cn: 安德烈应斯托布的需求，为难民暂居处带来了运输机器人。斯托布打算在暂居处协助处理工作，并给阿杜一个当学徒的机会。
summary_f1m4d2_6_001.en: Andre has responded to Staub's request and brought a fleet of logistics robots to the Refugee Camp. Staub intends to stay, help out with the construction, and offer Dewey an apprenticeship.

summary_f1m4d3_1_001.cn: 卡贾希望你帮忙调查几位援助者的喜好，以便提供合适的礼物。
summary_f1m4d3_1_001.en: Karja needs your help to investigate the preferences of those who helped the camp. He wants to prepare fitting gifts for them.

summary_f1m4d3_2_001.cn: 罗曼已经把烹饪当成了自己的乐趣。不过，因为长期操劳，他经常会肌肉酸痛，也许为他准备一些草药会是个好主意。
summary_f1m4d3_2_001.en: Roman treats the culinary arts as his passion. The chef does suffer from chronic muscle pain due to long hours of work. A herbal remedy might be good for him.

summary_f1m4d3_3_001.cn: 你没有找到安德烈，但陈千语说他始终在废寝忘食地工作。或许一些帮助提神的礼物会是不错的选择。
summary_f1m4d3_3_001.en: You fail to find Andre but Chen tells you that he is a workaholic. A gift that keeps people alert and awake sounds like a fitting choice.

summary_f1m4d3_4_001.cn: 难民暂居处的居民们似乎打算办一个庆祝会来表达对各位协助者的感谢。卡贾请求你协助他准备给罗曼和安德烈的礼物。
summary_f1m4d3_4_001.en: The refugees want to thank those who helped by throwing a party. Karja would like your help with Roman and Andre's gifts.

summary_f1m4d3_4d5_001.cn: 卡贾与难民暂居处的众人举行了一场小小的庆祝仪式。安德烈和罗曼收到了谢礼，众人也为你准备了礼物。
summary_f1m4d3_4d5_001.en: Karja and the residents at the refugee camp held a small celebration. Andre and Roman received gifts of gratitude, and the crowd prepared a present for you too.

summary_f1m4d3_5_001.cn: 索斯送了你一个难民暂居处自制的罐头，它包含着所有人的努力。
summary_f1m4d3_5_001.en: Soth gives you a handmade can from the Refugee Camp, filled with the efforts of all.

summary_f1m4d3_6_001.cn: 阿杜给你的礼物是一份录像。斯托布打算为阿杜申请减轻惩罚，同时继续指导他正确的谋生技术。
summary_f1m4d3_6_001.en: Dewey's gift for you is a recording. Staub petitions for leniency in Dewey's case, while vowing to teach him legitimate survival skills.

summary_f1m4d3_7_001.cn: 卡贾打算独自启程寻找失联的父母，众人纷纷决定施以援手。尽管这里只是临时的居所，却也已经成了真正的、温馨的家。
summary_f1m4d3_7_001.en: Karja wants to set off on his own to find his lost parents. Plenty of people decide to lend him a helping hand. Although the place is just a temporary shelter, it has become a true home and a tight-knit community for everyone.

summary_f1m5_1_001.cn: 丹尼尔正在为难民暂居处缺少人力来组织防御而发愁。就在此时，裂地者再次向据点发起了进攻。
summary_f1m5_1_001.en: Daniel is worried about the lack of fighters to defend the Refugee Camp. Meanwhile, the Landbreakers launch another attack on the outpost.

summary_f1m5_2_001.cn: 愈发壮大的难民暂居处随时可能再次受到入侵者袭击。你们建议升级已设置的区域防护系统，利用它完成防御工作。
summary_f1m5_2_001.en: The Refugee Camp is growing but it is also becoming a prime target for the local raiders. You suggest upgrading the existing area defense system to fight off the enemies.

summary_f1m5_3_001.cn: 区域防护系统测试完毕，它将为难民暂居处提供安全保障。
summary_f1m5_3_001.en: Area Defense has been tested. This will provide safety and security for the refugee camp.

summary_f1m6_1_001.cn: 赛希为你介绍了总控中枢扩容升级的相关细节。升级之后，不仅制造舱可以获得优化的机会，还可以建设新种类的舱室：培养舱。
summary_f1m6_1_001.en: Xaihi introduces the details of Control Nexus expansions. Upgrades will provide opportunities for optimizing your Manufacturing Cabin and add a new type of cabin: Growth Chambers.

summary_f1m6_2_001.cn: 赛希为你介绍了培养舱的用途：它可以培养并收获菌类质料、晶植质料和矿物质料。
summary_f1m6_2_001.en: Xaihi introduces the functions of the Growth Chamber. You can use it to grow and harvest various fungal matter, vitrified plants, and rare minerals.

summary_f1m6_3_001.cn: 培养舱已经开始顺利运作。将来，它还可以进一步扩大产线规模和生产范围。
summary_f1m6_3_001.en: The Growth Chamber is now cultivating materials as intended. It can be expanded in the future to grow additional types of materials and increase its production volume.

summary_f1m7d1_1_001.cn: 佩丽卡、陈千语和你来到了约定会合的地点，但并没有看到克劳，而是发现了正在和长耳兽玩耍的艾尔黛拉。她是佩丽卡请来支援的，她表示会带你们去找克劳。
summary_f1m7d1_1_001.en: Perlica, Chen Qianyu, and you rendezvous at the marked location, but Crowe isn't there. Instead, you find Ardelia playing with a long-ear nearby. Perlica has asked her to support this mission. Ardelia tells you that she will take you to Crowe.

summary_f1m7d1_2_001.cn: 克劳告诉了你们工团的重建计划，要在这里设置一个重建指挥部，并建造一座特殊的大型地质探针，以便展开重建工作。为此，需要你们投下次级核心，为计划提供条件。
summary_f1m7d1_2_001.en: Crowe tells you about the UWST rebuilding project. It includes a Reconstruction Headquarters at this location, as well as a specialized large geological probe to support the project. Hence, deployment of an Endfield Sub-PAC is essential for the UWST undertaking.

summary_f1m7d1_4_001.cn: 重建指挥部的研究工作需要用到几种类型的土壤样本，克劳拜托你们把土壤样本带回来。
summary_f1m7d1_4_001.en: Reconstruction research requires multiple soil types. Crowe requests your team retrieve these critical samples.

summary_f1m7d1_5_001.cn: 你们来到采集土壤样本的位置，这里有一位克劳的学徒——克莱维尔。细心的他已经拿到了土壤样本，并准备将其带回去。
summary_f1m7d1_5_001.en: You find Crowe's apprentice, Clavell, at the sample site already securing the soil samples for transport.

summary_f1m7d1_6_001.cn: 你们在采集土壤样本的地点遇到了克劳的另一位学徒——邓恩，他正焦躁地看着陷入故障的传输管道一筹莫展。你们得知他是希望赶在故障恶化前拿走样本，但还是错过了时机。你们决定帮他带回样本。
summary_f1m7d1_6_001.en: You run into Crowe's other apprentice, Dean, frustratedly staring at a malfunctioning transfer pipe. He'd hoped to retrieve the samples before the system failed completely, but missed the window. Your team steps in to recover the samples for him.

summary_f1m7d1_7_001.cn: 你们把土壤样本拿给了克劳，他在众人面前宣布了一个惊人的决定——将地质探针的建造工作全权交给邓恩和克莱维尔负责。
summary_f1m7d1_7_001.en: You give the soil samples to Crowe. He makes a shocking announcement to the entire crowd —— Dean and Clavell are given complete authority and full responsibilities for the construction of the geological probe.

summary_f1m7d2_1_001.cn: 你们来到重建指挥部，却发现担任指挥工作的邓恩和克莱维尔正在赌气。艾尔黛拉解释了现状，两人因重建计划的观点不同产生了冲突。
summary_f1m7d2_1_001.en: You arrive at the Reconstruction Headquarters. Turns out that project leaders Dean and Clavell are angry at each other. Ardelia explains the situation to you. Their disagreements stem from differences in their perspectives on the reconstruction project.

summary_f1m7d2_2_001.cn: 你们找到了邓恩，他正在找一只长耳兽，你们决定帮一帮他。
summary_f1m7d2_2_001.en: You find Dean searching for a long-ear and decide to lend him a hand.

summary_f1m7d2_3_001.cn: 你们帮邓恩找到了长耳兽，他向你们坦言自己激进的行事风格也是为了早点找到保护生态的方向，和克莱维尔的想法并不冲突。
summary_f1m7d2_3_001.en: After helping Dean locate the long-ear, he confides in your team. His aggressive methods stem from desperation to find ecological solutions faster, not opposition to Clavell's careful approach.

summary_f1m7d2_4_001.cn: 你们找到了克莱维尔，他正在找一个档案箱，你们决定帮一帮他。
summary_f1m7d2_4_001.en: You find Clavell searching for a box of documents and decide to help him.

summary_f1m7d2_5_001.cn: 你们帮助克莱维尔找到了档案箱，他坦言其实邓恩的方案也是有效的，二人不存在实质性的冲突。
summary_f1m7d2_5_001.en: With the box of documents recovered, Clavell admits with uncharacteristic candor that Dean's methodology has merit. Their conflict was never fundamental, just divergent paths toward the same ecological salvation.

summary_f1m7d2_6_001.cn: 克莱维尔和邓恩讨论后决定提升重建指挥部的规模。此时，艾尔黛拉拿出了一份已经设计好的图纸。二人兴冲冲地投入到了工作中，你们也需要利用集成工业系统帮助他们提升效率。
summary_f1m7d2_6_001.en: After a discussion, Clavell and Dean decide to expand the Reconstruction Headquarters. Ardelia thus takes out a pre-designed blueprint. The UWST project leads eagerly commit themselves to the work. You must also use the AIC Factory to help improve the efficiency of the outpost expansion.

summary_f1m7d3_1_001.cn: 克劳告诉你们，邓恩和克莱维尔不知所踪。目前地质探针的建造进度堪忧，他希望你们可以找到二人，并将他们带回来。
summary_f1m7d3_1_001.en: Crowe tells you that Dean and Clavell have gone missing. Progress for the geological probe is also less than ideal. He hopes you can find the two and bring them back to the outpost.

summary_f1m7d3_2_001.cn: 你们发现了邓恩留下的地图，推测他可能在寻找供能单元。
summary_f1m7d3_2_001.en: You find a map left by Dean and suspect he's searching for a power supply unit.

summary_f1m7d3_3_001.cn: 你们找到了邓恩，他告诉你们克莱维尔被天使困在了悬崖边。
summary_f1m7d3_3_001.en: You find Dean and he says Clavell is trapped by Aggeloi near the cliff.

summary_f1m7d3_4_001.cn: 你们成功救出了克莱维尔，刚刚获救的他却又和邓恩吵了起来。在艾尔黛拉的劝说下，两人才决定先回重建指挥部。
summary_f1m7d3_4_001.en: You successfully save Clavell. However, he immediately starts an argument with Dean. Ardelia mediates the argument and convinces them to return to the Reconstruction Headquarters first.

summary_f1m7d3_5_001.cn: 两位学徒回到了重建指挥部，却发现之前失败的能源方案成功运行了，似乎是有人暗中帮忙。
summary_f1m7d3_5_001.en: The two apprentices return to the Reconstruction Headquarters, and are surprised to find their failed energy supply plan working successfully. Someone seems to be helping them in secret.

summary_f1m7d4_1_001.cn: 你们找到了克劳和艾尔黛拉。克劳向你们表明了自己的想法，他希望克莱维尔和邓恩能在这次工作中独当一面，而不是过度依赖他人的帮助。
summary_f1m7d4_1_001.en: You meet Crowe and Ardelia. Crowe shares his idea with you. He wants Clavell and Dean to truly act on their own this time, instead of relying on help from other people.

summary_f1m7d4_2_001.cn: 你们找到了邓恩和克莱维尔，其中邓恩正在修改勘察单元的关键参数，但遇到了机器故障，你们决定帮助他们。
summary_f1m7d4_2_001.en: You find Dean mid-adjustment of the surveillance unit's core parameters, only to be thwarted by sudden mechanical failure. You decide to help them.

summary_f1m7d4_4_001.cn: 两位学徒提出了新的问题，放置生物样本的样本仓无法正常使用，而里面放置的错误生物样本也需要替换，你们决定帮助他们。
summary_f1m7d4_4_001.en: The pair report a new issue. The biological specimen chamber has malfunctioned, and the currently stored samples are contaminated. You decide to help out.

summary_f1m7d4_7_001.cn: 邓恩和克莱维尔又因为刚才的险情吵了起来，此时克劳出现，严厉地训斥了他们。在安排好二人后续的分工后，众人决定一起前去启动地质探针。
summary_f1m7d4_7_001.en: Dean and Clavell start arguing about the crisis they faced earlier. Crowe appears, gives them a harsh lesson, and assigns various jobs to them. Everyone then decides to activate the geological probe together.

summary_f1m7d4_9_001.cn: 大型地质探针正式启动，众人站在重建的新起点前畅谈未来。
summary_f1m7d4_9_001.en: The large geological probe formally activates. A new phase has begun for the reconstruction project. Everyone talks casually about the future.

summary_f1m9d1_1_001.cn: 你们抵达基建前站，入口处聚集着一群前来避难的人，其中的一位乌萨斯尤为引人注目。在一番寒暄后，这位名叫“大潘”的宏山人将负责人诺夫曼的所在地告知了你们。
summary_f1m9d1_1_001.en: You arrive at the Infra-Station. Refugees have gathered near the entrance. An Ursus attracts your attention. You chat with him and find out that he is Da Pan from Hongshan. He also tells you the whereabouts of the site monitor, Noffman.

summary_f1m9d1_2_001.cn: 基建前站的负责人诺夫曼希望能救回三名失联的工团成员，却因为肩负职责而难以抽身。你们在了解情况后，决定帮助诺夫曼寻找失联人员。
summary_f1m9d1_2_001.en: Noffman, the monitor of the Infra-Station, needs help to rescue three UWST crew mates who went missing. He cannot be part of this SAR operation due to other responsibilities. Having learned about the situation, you decide to help Noffman and look for the missing crew.

summary_f1m9d1_3_001.cn: 回到基建前站，你们将线索中断的情况告知了诺夫曼。在大潘的安慰下，诺夫曼重新振作，决定借助终末地集成工业系统的力量，尽快完成基建前站的建设。
summary_f1m9d1_3_001.en: Back at the Infra-Station, we told Noffman the trail had gone cold. Da Pan steadied him; Noffman found resolve, vowing to harness the Endfield Automated Industry Complex's might to rush its completion.

summary_f1m9d2_1_001.cn: 你们在一名重伤裂地者身边找到了工团的设备，而对方声称设备是自己捡来的。尽管无法判断裂地者是否在撒谎，失联工人们仍然有较大生还可能。
summary_f1m9d2_1_001.en: You find UWST equipment next to a heavily wounded Landbreaker, but the LB claims that he salvaged it earlier. You cannot tell if the LB is lying, but there is a good chance that the missing crew mates might still be alive.

summary_f1m9d2_2_001.cn: 你们找到了诺夫曼，他正因为一无所获而沮丧不已，得知你们的收获后才略感欣慰。之后大潘赶来，一行人打算借助终末地的滑索运送伤员。
summary_f1m9d2_2_001.en: You find Noffman. He is feeling bad about another unsuccessful SAR operation. Your finding got his spirits up again. Da Pan then joins the discussion. The team decides to use the Endfield zipline to help transport the wounded.

summary_f1m9d2_3d5_001.cn: 伤员全部运送完毕，诺夫曼向你们表达了感谢，但他依然牵挂着失联的工友们。在大潘的鼓励下，诺夫曼重新打起精神，投身于基建前站的建设工作中。
summary_f1m9d2_3d5_001.en: You successfully move the injured personnel. Noffman is thankful but he is still thinking about the missing crew mates. With Da Pan's encouragement, the young man manages to get back to his feet and commits himself to the construction of the Infra-Station.

summary_f1m9d3_1_001.cn: 回到基建前站，你们发现现场一片混乱，而作为负责人的诺夫曼此时却不知去向。
summary_f1m9d3_1_001.en: Back at the Infra-Station, chaos reigns. Noffman, its chief, is nowhere to be found.

summary_f1m9d3_2_001.cn: 你们找到了大潘，打算协助他们在瞭望塔上安装信号接收器。
summary_f1m9d3_2_001.en: You find Da Pan, and decide to help the crew install a signal receiver on the watch tower.

summary_f1m9d3_3_001.cn: 你们前往总控中心，诺夫曼正因为设备故障而濒临崩溃。但在大潘的帮助下，诺夫曼重新稳定了情绪，和大潘展开了紧急拆卸工作，你也参与到了其中。
summary_f1m9d3_3_001.en: You head to the Control Center. Noffman is having a nervous breakdown due to equipment failure. Da Pan helps the young lad get back to his senses. Together, the three of you initiate emergency dismantling work.

summary_f1m9d3_3d5_001.cn: 此时突发意外，大潘因此受伤，而关键时刻诺夫曼挺身而出，打算去拆最后一个施术单元。
summary_f1m9d3_3d5_001.en: A sudden accident happens and injures Da Pan. In this crucial moment, Noffman steps up and volunteers to dismantle the last Arts Unit.

summary_f1m9d3_4_001.cn: 诺夫曼成功拆下了最后的施术单元，所有拆卸工作完成，一行人打算返回基建前站。
summary_f1m9d3_4_001.en: Noffman successfully removed the final Arts Unit. With all dismantling complete, you plan to go back to the Infra-Station.

summary_f1m9d3_5_001.cn: 返回基建前站，工人们对诺夫曼等人获得的成果夸赞不已。
summary_f1m9d3_5_001.en: You are back at the Infra-Station and the workers are full of praise for Noffman and his team's accomplishments.

summary_f1m9d4_1_001.cn: 你们找到诺夫曼，得知他尝试搜索了三名失联人员的设备，却始终无果。但在这之后，你们忽然发现了一个信号。
summary_f1m9d4_1_001.en: You find Noffman and learn that he attempted to search for the equipment of the three missing crew mates. The search has been fruitless, but you suddenly receive a signal out of the blue.

summary_f1m9d4_2_001.cn: 你们将三名失联人员大概率生还的消息带给了正打算卸任负责人一职的诺夫曼。为了将三人救回，诺夫曼决定展开新一轮的搜救，并再次请求你们的帮助。
summary_f1m9d4_2_001.en: Noffman is about to resign from his role as site monitor when you bring him news that the three missing crew mates might still be alive. Noffman decides to rescue the MIA crew mates by initiating another SAR operation. Once again he asks you for help.

summary_f1m9d4_3_001.cn: 诺夫曼打算通过启动四个信号放大器来为信号接收器增幅，从而对接收到的信号进行精准定位。
summary_f1m9d4_3_001.en: Noffman plans to boost the signal receiver by activating four signal amplifiers, thereby achieving precise positioning of the received signal.

summary_f1m9d4_4_001.cn: 信号放大器全部上线，诺夫曼开始进行信号搜索，在众人的共同努力下，终于成功确定了失联工人的位置。
summary_f1m9d4_4_001.en: All amplifiers are online. Noffman begins tracing the signal. With the help of the crew, he successfully locates the missing crew mates.

summary_f1m9d4_5_001.cn: 你们在信号发出的位置找到了三名失联工人。三人坦白了他们主动切断信号的原因，并对诺夫曼付出的不懈努力表达了感谢，最终与你们一同返回了基建前站。
summary_f1m9d4_5_001.en: You find the three missing crew mates at the source of the signal. The crew mates confide their reasons for severing their signals. They express their heartfelt gratitude towards Noffman and his incessant efforts. Together, you return to the Infra-Station.

summary_gm01m10_1_001.cn: 你遇到了焦急的罗莎。她的恋人罗马诺滞留在了裂地者占领的区域，因此她请求你前去寻找恋人的踪迹。
summary_gm01m10_1_001.en: Rosa is extremely worried. Her lover, Romano, is trapped in Landbreaker territory. She asks if you could go there and find her love.

summary_gm01m10_2_001.cn: 你将手表交还给罗莎。罗莎表示会继续寻找自己的爱人，并带他回去。
summary_gm01m10_2_001.en: You return the watch to Rosa. She intends to keep looking for her love and bring him home.

summary_gm01m10_3_001.cn: 你遇到了罗马诺，他告诉了你另一个故事：罗莎并不是他的恋人，还在他的手表上安装了定位器。他拒绝回去，并且请你把手表带回给罗莎。
summary_gm01m10_3_001.en: You meet Romano and he gives you another story. Rosa isn't his lover and she secretly planted a tracker in his watch. The man refuses to head back and asks you to return the watch to Rosa.

summary_gm01m11_1_001.cn: 工团研究员奥列格正在犯愁，他负责饲养的源石虫逃出了研究室。了解情况后，你决定帮助他。
summary_gm01m11_1_001.en: Oleg the UWST scientist is in trouble. The Originium Slugs he raised have escaped his lab. After learning about this, you decide to help him.

summary_gm01m12_1_001.cn: 终末地干员瑟斯顿发现枢纽区有一处碾骨氏族遇袭的现场。你决定和他一同调查这起有些异常的事件。
summary_gm01m12_1_001.en: Endfield Operator Thurston has discovered an attack site involving the Bonekrusher Clan in the Hub area. You've decided to investigate this unusual incident together.

summary_gm01m12_2_001.cn: 瑟斯顿在枢纽区也发现了一处碾骨氏族遇袭的现场。
summary_gm01m12_2_001.en: Thurston has found another Bonekrusher attack site in the Hub area.

summary_gm01m12_3_001.cn: 瑟斯顿认出了现场死亡的碾骨行刑人：“断头台”盖比，一个不好对付的战士。然而，这样的人却被人利落地解决了。
summary_gm01m12_3_001.en: Thurston recognizes the dead Bonekrusher Executioner at the scene: "Guillotine" Gabbi, a notoriously tough fighter. Yet someone took him down with clean efficiency.

summary_gm01m12_7_001.cn: 你和瑟斯顿认为，“断头台”盖比正在替人执行某种指令，但被叫“影子”的袭击者迅速地解决了。
summary_gm01m12_7_001.en: You and Thurston believe "Guillotine" Gabbi was carrying out orders for someone when the attacker called "Shadow" swiftly eliminated him.

summary_gm01m12_8_001.cn: 你和瑟斯顿认为，“断头台”盖比正在替人执行某种指令，但被叫“影子”的袭击者迅速地解决了。
summary_gm01m12_8_001.en: You and Thurston believe "Guillotine" Gabbi was carrying out orders for someone when the attacker called "Shadow" swiftly eliminated him.

summary_gm01m13_1_001.cn: 终末地干员瑟斯顿发现阿伯莉采石场有一处碾骨氏族遇袭的现场。你决定和他一同调查这起有些异常的事件。
summary_gm01m13_1_001.en: Endfield Operator Thurston has discovered an attack site involving the Bonekrusher Clan in the Aburrey Quarry area. You've decided to investigate this unusual incident together.

summary_gm01m13_2_001.cn: 瑟斯顿在阿伯莉采石场也发现了一处碾骨氏族遇袭的现场。
summary_gm01m13_2_001.en: Thurston has found another Bonekrusher attack site in the Aburrey Quarry area.

summary_gm01m13_3_001.cn: 瑟斯顿发现，现场死去的碾骨焰术师正是知名的危险分子“鬼火”维奇尔。
summary_gm01m13_3_001.en: Thurston realizes the deceased Bonekrusher Pyromancer is the notorious dangerous individual "Will-o-Wisp" Vichir.

summary_gm01m13_4_001.cn: 瑟斯顿认为，杀死“鬼火”的袭击者曾经乔装成维护工人等待对方抵达此处，此人可能十分了解“鬼火”和他的计划，提前进行了伏击。
summary_gm01m13_4_001.en: Thurston believes the attacker who killed "Will-o-Wisp" had disguised themselves as a maintenance worker, lying in wait for their target. This person likely knew "Will-o-Wisp" and his plans intimately, setting up an ambush in advance.

summary_gm01m13_5_001.cn: 瑟斯顿认为，杀死“鬼火”的袭击者曾经乔装成维护工人等待对方抵达此处，此人可能十分了解“鬼火”和他的计划，提前进行了伏击。
summary_gm01m13_5_001.en: Thurston believes the attacker who killed "Will-o-Wisp" had disguised themselves as a maintenance worker, lying in wait for their target. This person likely knew "Will-o-Wisp" and his plans intimately, setting up an ambush in advance.

summary_gm01m14_1_001.cn: 终末地干员瑟斯顿发现矿脉源区有一处碾骨氏族遇袭的现场。你决定和他一同调查这起有些异常的事件。
summary_gm01m14_1_001.en: Endfield Operator Thurston has discovered an attack site involving the Bonekrusher Clan in the Origin Lodespring area. You've decided to investigate this unusual incident together.

summary_gm01m14_2_001.cn: 瑟斯顿在矿脉源区也发现了一处碾骨氏族遇袭的现场，但你们需要先解决阻碍你们进入现场的侵蚀。
summary_gm01m14_2_001.en: Thurston has found another Bonekrusher attack site in the Origin Lodespring area, but you'll need to deal with the Blight blocking access first.

summary_gm01m14_3_001.cn: 你与瑟斯顿怀疑，现场倒下的裂地者不是在战斗中死亡。
summary_gm01m14_3_001.en: You and Thurston suspect the fallen Landbreakers at the scene didn't die in combat.

summary_gm01m14_6_001.cn: 瑟斯顿认为，现场死去的裂地者为“血眼”撒萨罗以及追随他的团伙。这个以团结著称的群体至此遭到了灭顶打击。
summary_gm01m14_6_001.en: Thurston believes the fallen Landbreakers at the scene are "Bloodeye" Sazaro and his loyal followers. The group, known for their solidarity, has now been utterly crushed.

summary_gm01m14_7_001.cn: 瑟斯顿认为，现场死去的裂地者为“血眼”撒萨罗以及追随他的团伙。这个以团结著称的群体至此遭到了灭顶打击。
summary_gm01m14_7_001.en: Thurston believes the fallen Landbreakers at the scene are "Bloodeye" Sazaro and his loyal followers. The group, known for their solidarity, has now been utterly crushed.

summary_gm01m15_1_001.cn: 终末地干员瑟斯顿发现供能高地有一处碾骨氏族遇袭的现场。你决定和他一同调查这起有些异常的事件。
summary_gm01m15_1_001.en: Endfield Operator Thurston has discovered an attack site involving the Bonekrusher Clan in the Power Plateau area. You've decided to investigate this unusual incident together.

summary_gm01m15_2_001.cn: 瑟斯顿在供能高地也发现了一处碾骨氏族遇袭的现场，但你们需要先找到进入现场的方法。
summary_gm01m15_2_001.en: Thurston has found another Bonekrusher attack site in the Power Plateau area, but you'll need to find a way into the scene first.

summary_gm01m15_3_001.cn: 瑟斯顿认出了死亡的裂地者精英：“火山”查查，碾骨氏族最有影响力的几个领袖之一。他曾经拥有庞大的势力，和罗丹有不小的摩擦。
summary_gm01m15_3_001.en: Thurston recognizes the dead Landbreaker elite: "Volcano" Chacha, one of the most influential leaders of the Bonekrusher Clan. He once commanded substantial forces and had significant friction with Rhodagn.

summary_gm01m15_5_001.cn: 瑟斯顿认为“火山”遭到了“影子”的背叛，还受到了其他盟友的背弃。
summary_gm01m15_5_001.en: Thurston believes "Volcano" was betrayed by "Shadow" and abandoned by other allies.

summary_gm01m15_7_001.cn: 瑟斯顿认为“火山”遭到了“影子”的背叛，还受到了其他盟友的背弃。
summary_gm01m15_7_001.en: Thurston believes "Volcano" was betrayed by "Shadow" and abandoned by other allies.

summary_gm01m16_1_001.cn: 工团研究员林奈和琼正在寻找一瓶丢失的重要药剂。林奈在裂地者袭击时丢失了这瓶药剂，它可能落在了转运枢纽或公路边的工作平台。交谈过后，你决定帮助他们。
summary_gm01m16_1_001.en: UWST scientists Linnaeus and Joan are trying to find a bottle of important medicinal sample that went missing. Linnaeus lost the bottle during the Landbreaker attack and it might be somewhere near the Transport Nexus or the work platform along the road. You decide to help them.

summary_gm01m16_2_001.cn: 林奈的药剂被裂地者吃掉了大半，无法继续实验。他需要寻找一种稀有真菌重新制备药剂。琼提议利用她的长耳兽的追踪能力来寻找真菌。尽管这个方法存在风险，但他们仍然决定尝试，并请求你帮忙追踪长耳兽。
summary_gm01m16_2_001.en: Linnaeus is out of research materials as the Landbreakers ate most of his medicine. He can only prepare another sample with a rare fungus. Joan recommends using her long-ears' tracking abilities to find the fungus. Though risky, the scientists agree to give it a try and ask if you can help track the long-ears.

summary_gm01m16_5_001.cn: 两次尝试都取得了成功，琼十分高兴，希望尽快将药剂喂给长耳兽，林奈却对此有些担忧。从他们的交谈中，你隐约感觉到他们之间的关系似乎不仅仅是普通的同事那么简单。
summary_gm01m16_5_001.en: Both trials are successful. Joan is overjoyed and really wants to feed the medicine to the long-ears. Linnaeus, on the other hand, sounds a little worried. From their conversation, you sense the two are more than just ordinary colleagues.

summary_gm01m16_6_001.cn: 你为林奈带回了稀有真菌，他非常激动，决定答谢你。在他去准备谢礼时，你质问琼是否觊觎林奈的药剂。由于你掌握了证据，琼承认她确实需要林奈的药剂来完成自己的研究。
summary_gm01m16_6_001.en: You bring the rare fungus to an ecstatic and grateful Linnaeus. While he goes off to prepare a gift, you question Joan if she has ulterior motives for Linnaeus's medicine. Since you have the evidence, Joan confesses that she needs Linnaeus's meds to complete her own research.

summary_gm01m16_7_001.cn: 林奈对琼确实有好感。对于接下来该如何处理两人的关系，他想要听听你的建议。
summary_gm01m16_7_001.en: Linnaeus has feelings for Joan. He wants your advice on how to move things forward.

summary_gm01m17_1_001.cn: 被困的人是终末地的现场技术支持干员布龙泽。起初，他因你自行修理机器人而生气，但在得知你就是管理员后，误会解除了。
summary_gm01m17_1_001.en: The trapped person happens to be Endfield site support technician Bronzer. He is initially infuriated that you repaired the robots without permission, but simmers out when he learns that you are the Endmin.

summary_gm01m17_2_001.cn: 被困的人是终末地的现场技术支持干员布龙泽。起初，他因你自行修理机器人而生气，但在你的耐心劝说下，他平静了下来。
summary_gm01m17_2_001.en: The trapped person happens to be Endfield site support technician Bronzer. He is initially infuriated that you repaired a robot on your own, but your patient diplomacy got him to simmer down.

summary_gm01m17_3_001.cn: 被困的人是终末地的现场技术支持干员布龙泽，他来此是为了维修机器人。当你主动提出帮助他一起修理时，他拒绝了。但他随即发现自己的控制终端出了故障，不得不请求你的协助。
summary_gm01m17_3_001.en: The trapped person happens to be Endfield site support technician Bronzer. He came here to fix damaged robots. You offer to help him but he refuses. He then realizes his control terminal is broken and has no choice but to ask for your help.

summary_gm01m17_4_001.cn: 布龙泽向你表达了感谢。当他得知你遇到了他的弟弟库珀后，显得有些担心，说要赶紧回去。临走前，他告诉你以后可以在工人之家找到他。
summary_gm01m17_4_001.en: Bronzer thanks you. When he learns that you met his younger twin Copper, he looks worried and decides to head back at once. Before he leaves, he tells you that you can find him at the Worker Dorms.

summary_gm01m17_5_001.cn: 被困的人是终末地的现场技术支持干员布龙泽，他来此是为了维修机器人。当你主动提出帮助他一起修理时，他拒绝了。但他随即发现自己的控制终端出了故障，不得不请求你的协助。
summary_gm01m17_5_001.en: The trapped person happens to be Endfield site support technician Bronzer. He came here to fix damaged robots. You offer to help him but he refuses. He then realizes his control terminal is broken and has no choice but to ask for your help.

summary_gm01m17_6_001.cn: 布龙泽向你表达了感谢。临走前，他告诉你以后可以在工人之家找到他。
summary_gm01m17_6_001.en: Bronzer thanks you. Before he leaves, he tells you that you can find him at the Worker Dorms.

summary_gm01m1_1_001.cn: 你偶遇了工团成员瓦利亚，并打算帮他打开源石副产物中心大楼的门。
summary_gm01m1_1_001.en: You meet UWST crew mate Vallia and agree to open the gate of the Originium Byproduct Processing Center main building for him.

summary_gm01m1_2_001.cn: 你和瓦利亚发现总控开关因触发了保护机制而导致大楼断电。想要重启总控开关，则需要将悬浮箱子移动至感应开关上。
summary_gm01m1_2_001.en: Vallia and you notice that the main switch activated its safety and disconnected the entire building from the power grid. To re-activate the main switch, you must move the floating crates to the pressure switches.

summary_gm01m1_3_001.cn: 大楼的电力系统正在恢复，但生产系统的主电源无法打开。瓦利亚拜托你去二层看看有没有其他故障。
summary_gm01m1_3_001.en: Power is being restored to the building. However, the production system power mains cannot be switched on. Vallia asks if you can go to the second floor and see what is wrong.

summary_gm01m1_4_001.cn: 你在源石副产物中心大楼二层遇到了躲在这里的工作人员兰姆。他为了停下大楼的生产系统，留下来关闭了主电源，但由于他对关闭后重置为初始状态的系统不够熟悉，难以完成重启，你决定出手相助。
summary_gm01m1_4_001.en: You meet Rammu who has been hiding at the second floor of the Originium BPPC building. To stop the production system, he chose to stay behind and switched off the mains. However, this also reset the entire system to its default settings. Rammu does not know how to reset the mains. You decide to help.

summary_gm01m1_5_001.cn: 瓦利亚告诉你，生产系统主电源已经成功开启了。你则将兰姆及时关闭电源的事迹告知了他，他对此深感庆幸，同时也向你表达了谢意。
summary_gm01m1_5_001.en: Vallia tells you that the production system power mains are back online. You tell him about Rammu and how he timely shut down the power. Vallia is extremely grateful and expresses his gratitude.

summary_gm01m22_4_001.cn: 你遇到了未撤离的工团研究员哈珀，他告诉你这里的研究资料无法调出，不能交给你。
summary_gm01m22_4_001.en: You run into UWST scientist Harper who has not evacced the place. He informs you that no one, including you, is authorized to move research data out of the place.

summary_gm01m22_6_001.cn: 你再次找到了哈珀，告诉他你已经通过他的工作日志得知了真相，他最终还是把资料交给了你。
summary_gm01m22_6_001.en: You find Harper again and tell him that you found out the truth from his work diary. The scientist finally decides to give you the data.

summary_gm01m22_8_001.cn: 你遇到了未撤离的工团研究员哈珀，他告诉你这里的研究资料无法调出，不能交给你。但你已经通过他的工作日志得知了真相……
summary_gm01m22_8_001.en: You run into UWST scientist Harper who has not evacced the place. He informs you that no one, including you, is authorized to move research data out of the place. But you already read his work diary and know why he said all that...

summary_gm01m3_1_001.cn: 一个叫莱昂的工团巡查员请求你帮忙修复升降平台。无法正常使用的升降平台不但影响到了他的工作，据说还影响到了他的健康。
summary_gm01m3_1_001.en: Leon, a UWST patrol crew mate, needs your help to repair a platform lift. The man claims that the broken lift is affecting both his work and his health.

summary_gm01m6_1_001.cn: 你在断裂的公路附近遇到了工团的救援队队员赫尔曼。营救工作遇到了困难，他正在发愁。
summary_gm01m6_1_001.en: You met Hermann, a UWST Search and Rescue (SAR) crew mate, near the shattered highway. Hermann's SAR mission just encountered a major obstacle.

summary_gm01m6_2_001.cn: 被营救的工团运输人员斯科特向你讲述了自己的遭遇，并拜托你帮忙解决天使。
summary_gm01m6_2_001.en: You save UWST trucker Scott and he tells you about the accident. He also asks you to take out the Aggelos.

summary_gm01m7_1_001.cn: 你与瑟斯顿仍然好奇“影子”布兰娜被攻击的原因。此时，狼卫发来联系，表示自己似乎发现了“影子”的活动踪迹。
summary_gm01m7_1_001.en: Both you and Thurston remain curious about why "Shadow" Brenna was attacked. Just then, Wulfgard contacts you, indicating they may have picked up traces of "Shadow's" recent activity.

summary_gm01m7_3_001.cn: 没等你们顺利问出什么，“影子”布兰娜便因为伤势发作而去世了。
summary_gm01m7_3_001.en: Before you could successfully interrogate her, "Shadow" Brenna succumbed to her injuries and passed away.

summary_gm01m7_5_001.cn: 你们发现，聂菲斯果断地利用并抛弃了同样不完全忠诚的“影子”布兰娜。至此，所有对聂菲斯不利的潜在威胁都被她逐一拔除。
summary_gm01m7_5_001.en: You discover that Nefarith decisively used and then discarded the incompletely loyal "Shadow" Brenna. By now, she has systematically eliminated every potential threat against her.

summary_gm01m7_7_001.cn: 没等你们顺利问出什么，“影子”布兰娜便因为伤势发作而去世了。
summary_gm01m7_7_001.en: Before you could successfully interrogate her, "Shadow" Brenna succumbed to her injuries and passed away.

summary_gm01m8_1_001.cn: 被困的人是终末地的现场技术支持干员库珀。他是循着机器人的故障信号而来的。库珀告诉你，这些机器人在躲避裂地者时受损严重，现在能维修的只剩一个了。你决定帮他修理这个机器人。
summary_gm01m8_1_001.en: The Landbreakers prisoner happens to be Endfield site support technician Copper. He came to this place by tracking distress calls of malfunctioning robots. Most of the robots were heavily damaged and only one seems reparable. You decide to help.

summary_gm01m8_2_001.cn: 库珀告诉你，在其他地方可能还有这种故障机器人。若你修好了它们，可以去工人之家找他领取报酬。
summary_gm01m8_2_001.en: Copper tells you about broken robots at other places. If you see one, get them repaired and talk to Copper at the Worker Dorms for rewards.

summary_gm01m8_3_001.cn: 被困的人是终末地的现场技术支持干员库珀，他是布龙泽的双胞胎弟弟。他告诉你，这些机器人在躲避裂地者时严重受损，现在能维修的只剩一个了。你决定帮他修理机器人。
summary_gm01m8_3_001.en: The Landbreaker prisoner turns out to be Endfield site support technician Copper, who is also Bronzer's younger twin. He tells you that many robots were heavily damaged while trying to escape from the Landbreakers and only one seems reparable. You decide to help.

summary_gm01m9_1_001.cn: 你偶遇了工团工人英格，她发现反应炉的异常情况后赶来，正尝试进入醇化合物工厂。但工厂大门打不开，于是她计划炸墙而入。
summary_gm01m9_1_001.en: You meet a UWST crew mate named Ingol. She rushed to this place in response to a reactor malfunction and is trying to get into the Kohl Plant. The gate refuses to open, so she intends to blast a hole in the wall.

summary_gm01m9_3_001.cn: 检查了醇化合物工厂的内部情况后，英格告诉你反应炉上方的通风井被凝胶堵住了。英格尝试关闭反应炉，但发现它的控制系统失灵了。你让她不要着急，并决定前去查看情况。
summary_gm01m9_3_001.en: After checking the situation in the Kohl Plant, Ingol tells you that the ventilation shaft above the reactor is clogged by a gel. She tries to shut down the reactor but the control systems have failed. You tell her not to worry and decide to inspect the shaft itself.

summary_gm01m9_4_001.cn: 通风井已经恢复了正常。你回去找到英格。她告诉你现在醇化合物工厂的危机正在被逐步解决，但杰里米还是联系不上。
summary_gm01m9_4_001.en: The ventilation shaft is now working. You return to talk to Ingol. She tells you that the Kohl Plant crisis is slowly getting fixed, but is concerned that she still cannot contact Jeremy.

summary_gm02m10_1_001.cn: 你询问了在池边徘徊的可疑天师阿宝，原来他是在附近寻找爷爷留下的宝藏，你决定帮助他将池里的水抽干。
summary_gm02m10_1_001.en: You approach the suspicious Tianshi named Bao. Turns out, he's searching for a treasure his grandpa left somewhere nearby. You decide to help him drain the pond water.

summary_gm02m10_2_001.cn: 阿宝得知水池下的宝藏原来是爷爷杜曲生留下的陈年秘酒。虽然没能发大财，但他实现了寻宝心愿，对此，他向你表示了感谢。
summary_gm02m10_2_001.en: Bao realizes the treasure under the pond is an old batch of brew left by his grandfather, Du Qusheng. While it isn't a fortune, he is grateful for your help nonetheless.

summary_gm02m10_3_001.cn: 阿宝分析，想要打开天井院底部的大门，需要先找到三个“钥匙”，激活门前的三道机关。
summary_gm02m10_3_001.en: Bao's analysis indicates that to open the gate at the bottom of the courtyard, you must first locate three "keys" to activate the three mechanisms in front of it.

summary_gm02m10_4_001.cn: 阿宝分析，想要打开天井院底部的大门，需要先找到三个“钥匙”，激活门前的三道机关。
summary_gm02m10_4_001.en: Bao's analysis indicates that to open the gate at the bottom of the courtyard, you must first locate three "keys" to activate the three mechanisms in front of it.

summary_gm02m10_5_001.cn: 阿宝分析，想要打开天井院底部的大门，需要先找到三个“钥匙”，激活门前的三道机关。你已经集齐了所有“钥匙”。
summary_gm02m10_5_001.en: Bao's analysis indicates that to open the gate at the bottom of the courtyard, you must first locate three "keys" to activate the three mechanisms in front of it. You have now found all the "keys."

summary_gm02m4_1_001.cn: 在生态实验站附近，你遇到了一位名叫林轲的天师学徒，他正在进行天师桩的启动测试。但帮他设置辅桩的同学却因故缺席，你决定帮助他完成测试。
summary_gm02m4_1_001.en: You encounter a Tianshi disciple named Lin Ke near the Ecological Research Station, who is conducting a startup test on the Tianshi Pillar. However, the classmates assisting him with the auxiliary pillars are absent due to unforeseen circumstances. You decide to help him complete the test.

summary_gm02m4_5_001.cn: 顺利启动所有辅桩后，你将结果告知了林轲。林轲的天师桩启动测试终于进入最终阶段。
summary_gm02m4_5_001.en: You tell Lin Ke about the successful results after activating all auxiliary pillars. Lin Ke's Tianshi Pillar startup test has now reached its final phase.

summary_gm02m4_6_001.cn: 林轲成功完成了这次的天师桩启动测试，他的课题终于得以继续推进，你也为他送上了祝福。
summary_gm02m4_6_001.en: Lin Ke successfully completes his Tianshi Pillar startup test. He can finally continue with his project now, and you offer him your blessings.

summary_gm02m5_1_001.cn: 你在武陵城居民区遇到了正为地下阵列稳定桩检修工作为难的新任天师方泽，答应她帮忙一起完成检修工作。
summary_gm02m5_1_001.en: You find Fang Ze, Wuling's new Tianshi in the Residential Area, wrestling with stabilizing rod repairs in the underground array. Offering your aid, you join the maintenance effort.

summary_gm02m6_1_001.cn: 水渠异动的流言不断扩散，导致居民们不敢用水。惊慌的居民景洪为你们介绍了大致的情况，并建议你们向一旁的天师学徒厉衡进一步询问。
summary_gm02m6_1_001.en: Rumors of the canal's disturbances spread, leaving residents terrified to use water. Jing Hong, a panicked local briefs you and points to Li Heng, a Tianshi disciple for further investigation.

summary_gm02m6_2_001.cn: 厉衡表示自己从没见过水渠的异常，这些流言都是迷信。但为了安抚害怕的居民，他拜托你们去检查两处水渠。
summary_gm02m6_2_001.en: Li Heng dismisses the rumors as superstition. To ease fears, he requests inspections at two canal sites.

summary_gm02m6_3_001.cn: 和厉衡交谈后，你们发现，这些装置是他的课程作业，在水下损坏后造成了水渠的异动，但此时他指出，自己没有在选剑局附近的水渠里放装置，那里的异动却最厉害……你们决定再去看看。
summary_gm02m6_3_001.en: After talking to Li Heng, he admits the devices are his prototypes that caused disturbances, but not the ones near HS.Swords. The worst disturbances are where he didn't deploy them... You decide to investigate further.

summary_gm02m6_4_001.cn: 厉衡扫描了水渠，看到里面堆满了其他天师学徒的课程作业。原来现在是考试季，许多同学跟他一样，用水渠做实验。
summary_gm02m6_4_001.en: Li Heng scans the canal. Turns out it's just clogged with other disciples' prototypes. Exam season has turned the waterways into a junkyard.

summary_gm02m7_1_001.cn: 你在选剑局里遇到一位叫锡锭子的学徒，得知他正在为身后的小剑桩而苦恼，你决定试着帮他启动一下。
summary_gm02m7_1_001.en: In HS.Swords, you find a disciple named Tin Ingot, troubled by the small sword pell behind him. You decide to help him out.

summary_gm02m7_3_001.cn: 见你升起了小剑桩，锡锭子兴奋地拜托你帮他通过测试。
summary_gm02m7_3_001.en: Having witnessed you successfully raise the sword pell, Tin Ingot now eagerly begs your help to pass his trial.

summary_gm02m7_4_001.cn: 你成功升起了巨剑桩，锡锭子正打算庆祝，却被连晓雾的远程通信打断，她将锡锭子狠狠教育了一通。
summary_gm02m7_4_001.en: Just as Tin Ingot is about to whoop in triumph at the central pell's ascent, Lian Xiaowu's holographic reprimand shatters the celebration. Her scolding so fierce, even nearby birds take flight.

summary_gm02m8_1_001.cn: 尚进和莫余两位天师正在争吵，原来他们缺少息壤进行三到钟的激活工作，你答应帮助他们，提供足够的息壤，激活钟上的符文组件。
summary_gm02m8_1_001.en: Tianshi Shang Jin and Tianshi Mo Yu are arguing because they lack enough Xiranite to activate the Bell of Three Presences. You agree to help them by providing sufficient Xiranite to activate the runes on the bell.

summary_gm02m8_5_001.cn: 你提供了足够的息壤，成功激活了三到钟，两位天师都很感谢你。
summary_gm02m8_5_001.en: You supplied enough Xiranite to fully activate the bell. Both Tianshi are relieved and grateful.

summary_m1m6_1_001.cn: 在野外探索时，你遇到一处异象。菲奥娜告诉你，这是一个即将失控的能量淤积点。她请求你清理这个能量淤积点，并提醒你在行动之前要做好充分的准备。
summary_m1m6_1_001.en: You come across an anomaly while exploring the wilderness. According to Fiona, it is an Energy Alluvium about to go out of control. She asks you to clean it up but also reminds you to be fully prepared before approaching it.

summary_sm1l1m10_3_001.cn: 你得知，集成工业研究所的分管负责人希茜似乎向着停车场的方向去了。
summary_sm1l1m10_3_001.en: AIC-RC Manager Cynthia probably went to the parking lot.

summary_sm1l1m10_5_001.cn: 你们偶遇了两名避难者，他们告诉你一桩传闻：这里是“终末地”进行实验研究的地方——附近出没的天使就是“终末地”的杰作。在辟谣之前，你决定先找到希茜。
summary_sm1l1m10_5_001.en: You run into two refugees and they share a rumor about how this place was an Endfield test site and the local Aggeloi were the results of Endfield experiments. You decide to talk to Manager Cynthia before busting the rumors.

summary_sm1l1m10_8_001.cn: 你和希茜没有找到天使聚集的实际原因。但针对终末地的流言等待着平息，你决定等回到枢纽区基地后与避难者们谈谈。
summary_sm1l1m10_8_001.en: You and Cynthia fail to find out why the Aggeloi are gathering. However, rumors about Endfield must be addressed. You decide to head back to the Hub Base and have a talk with the refugees.

summary_sm1l1m10_9_001.cn: 经过了你的亲自澄清，曾被你救下的避难者们很快便解除了对终末地的误会。
summary_sm1l1m10_9_001.en: You personally explain the situation to the people. The refugees whom you saved before quickly dispel their concerns and misunderstandings about Endfield.

summary_sm1l1m11_1_001.cn: 你顺利地为秦茳尺分担了一部分工作，但她的日程依然很满。灾后重建是个漫长的过程，未来还有更多事情需要你们一同面对。
summary_sm1l1m11_1_001.en: You've taken some weight off Qin Jiangchi's shoulders, but her duty roster stays crimson. Rebuilding after catastrophe takes years, and you'll be sharing every battle ahead.

summary_sm1l1m1_13_001.cn: 在一所裂地者占据的房屋外，你找到了工团被抢走的多功能播报器。但为了自己与菲奥娜的耳朵着想，你不得不想办法将它关闭。
summary_sm1l1m1_13_001.en: You found the looted general purpose broadcaster outside a house occupied by the Landbreakers. You also have to figure out a way to switch it off to protect Fiona's sanity, as well as that of your own.

summary_sm1l1m1_14_001.cn: 回到源石副产物中心，你将“工作提效智能终端”与找到的物资交还给了负责人萨特，但却从萨特那里得知，被抢走的物资中还有部分胶棉炸药未被找到……
summary_sm1l1m1_14_001.en: You return to the Originium BPPC and give both the Smart Performance Booster and the recovered supplies to UWST monitor Satyr. The monitor then tells you about gel-cotton explosives that went missing as well...

summary_sm1l1m1_1_001.cn: 你上前询问后得知，这位名叫“乔斯特”的基地警卫正在研究一块被裂地者画上图案的石头，他很想破解其中的奥秘。最终，你在菲奥娜的提醒下决定尝试扫描这块石头……
summary_sm1l1m1_1_001.en: You talk to a base security officer named Jouster. He is investigating a piece of rock suspected to be covered with Landbreaker graffiti, and he is interested in its secrets. Fiona then advises you to scan the rock...

summary_sm1l1m1_2_001.cn: 完成扫描后，石头上确实出现了图案，但仍然没法看清全貌。
summary_sm1l1m1_2_001.en: The scan reveals some glyphs on the rocks but you cannot see all of them.

summary_sm1l1m1_3_001.cn: 在乔斯特的提议下，你决定前往源石副产物中心——那里不久前遭到了裂地者的袭击，现场或许会有关于裂地者行动的线索。
summary_sm1l1m1_3_001.en: You follow Jouster's advice and go to the Originium Byproduct Processing Center (BPPC). The place was recently attacked by Landbreakers and there might be several clues on breaker activities.

summary_sm1l1m1_7_001.cn: 你从工团在源石副产物中心的负责人——萨特那里了解了裂地者袭击的详情。得知你打算追查那群裂地者的去向，萨特希望你能帮忙把被裂地者抢走的“工作提效智能终端”带回来。
summary_sm1l1m1_7_001.en: You talk to Satyr, the UWST monitor of the Originium Byproduct Processing Center (BPPC). He gives you details about the Landbreakers. When Satyr learns that you intend to track down the Landbreakers, he hopes you can recover the Smart Performance Booster that the raiders looted from his site.

summary_sm1l1m2_1_001.cn: 你回到了之前去过的裂地者营地，在疑似重启的巢雕前发现了一名正处于癫狂状态的裂地者。通过他的只言片语，你推断出巢雕的雾气与碾骨氏族的涂鸦印记可能存在某种关联。
summary_sm1l1m2_1_001.en: You return to the Landbreaker Camp you visited and find a mad landbreaker standing near a re-activated denstack. From his insane ramblings, you figure out that the haze emitted by the denstacks may have something to do with the Bonekrusher graffiti.

summary_sm1l1m2_3d8_001.cn: 你在山洞深处找到了一些工团被抢的物资。遗憾的是，这里依然没有那些丢失的胶棉炸药。
summary_sm1l1m2_3d8_001.en: You find the looted UWST supplies deep inside the cave. Unfortunately, the gel-cotton explosives are still nowhere to be found.

summary_sm1l1m2_4_001.cn: 在山洞中，你遇到了被裂地者关进铁笼中的警卫乔斯特。在向你描述自己被抓的经过后，乔斯特提出了他对枢纽区基地附近裂地者涂鸦的猜测，并将他个人用于研究的记录本送给了你。
summary_sm1l1m2_4_001.en: You find security officer Jouster locked in a cage within the cave. Jouster tells you how he was captured and shares his ideas about the Landbreaker graffiti found near the Hub Base. He then gives you a notebook with his research notes.

summary_sm1l1m4_1_001.cn: 枢纽区基地的物流主管因为四号谷地发生的事忙得无法抽身。她想拜托你与埃里克松商贸公司的人洽谈合作的相关事宜。你可以凭借自己的判断，将合作方的信息记录到档案当中。
summary_sm1l1m4_1_001.en: The logistics director of Hub Base is too busy cleaning up the aftermath of the Valley IV incident. She wonders if you can negotiate with an agent of Erikssohn Trading House. Use your judgment and gather records about Erikssohn's agent.

summary_sm1l1m4_2_001.cn: 你见到了埃里克松商贸的高级业务员哈特曼。按照约定，你需要铺设一组滑索架，为他安排产品演示。
summary_sm1l1m4_2_001.en: You meet Hartmann, a senior sales rep of Erikssohn Trading House. According to the agreement, you must deploy a zipline pylon and give the agent a product demo.

summary_sm1l1m4_3_001.cn: 哈特曼对滑索非常满意，决定立刻与终末地签约。准备签约时，他发现合同落在了车里，哈特曼前去取回合同，与你们约定在枢纽区基地入口会合。
summary_sm1l1m4_3_001.en: Hartmann is very pleased with the zipline and decides to sign a contract with Endfield. However, he then realizes that he left his contract in the car. Hartmann runs off to retrieve the contract and tells you to meet with him at the Hub Base entrance.

summary_sm1l1m4_4_001.cn: 哈特曼受了严重的伤，狼卫建议利用附近的植物为他止血。
summary_sm1l1m4_4_001.en: Hartmann is severely injured. Wulfgard recommends using local plants to stop the bleeding.

summary_sm1l1m4_5_001.cn: 哈特曼告知你们，他遭遇了裂地者的袭击，合同也被劫走。他关于裂地者的描述令狼卫有所怀疑——那不像是裂地者会说的话。狼卫建议在事故现场调查一下。
summary_sm1l1m4_5_001.en: Hartmann tells you he was attacked by Landbreakers and they also took his contract. However, Wulfgard becomes suspicious of Hartmann's description of the Landbreakers and the words they said. He recommends investigating the site of the attack.

summary_sm1l1m4_6_001.cn: 狼卫认为事故更像是文明环带的“文明人”所为。
summary_sm1l1m4_6_001.en: Wulfgard believes the accident was a setup by Banders pretending to be Landbreakers.

summary_sm1l1m4_7_001.cn: 在狼卫的暗示下，你并未向哈特曼透露更多信息。哈特曼无奈地表示与终末地的交易需要推迟了。
summary_sm1l1m4_7_001.en: Wulfgard secretly asks you to hide your findings from Hartmann. The agent has no choice but to delay the deal with Endfield.

summary_sm1l1m5_1_001.cn: 你们见到了自称来自埃里克松商贸公司的业务员亚历山大。他表示自己不认识哈特曼，并称哈特曼是“诈骗犯”。另一位自称汉斯的业务员表示自己近日也深受“诈骗犯”所害。在签约前，你打算先记录下亚历山大的信息。
summary_sm1l1m5_1_001.en: You meet with Aleksandr who claims to be an agent of Erikssohn Trading House. He claims to know nothing about Hartmann and tells you that he might be a "scammer". Another agent named Hans who happens to be passing by also tells you how he became a recent victim. Before signing the contract, you decide to make a file of Agent Aleksandr.

summary_sm1l1m5_2_001.cn: 哈特曼匆匆赶来拦住你。他与亚历山大互相指责对方是诈骗犯。哈特曼拿出公司的终端，准备证明亚历山大并不存在于埃里克松商贸的员工名册中。
summary_sm1l1m5_2_001.en: Hartmann rushes over to stop you. He and Aleksandr then mutually accuse each other as scammers. Hartmann shows you his company's handyterm to prove that Aleksandr is not on the list of Erikssohn employees.

summary_sm1l1m5_3_001.cn: 亚历山大承认自己耍了小手段——他其实是克莱韦思环塔贸易公司的员工。亚历山大表示埃里克松商贸经营不善，与其和哈特曼签约，不如选择自己。他给了你一份来自克莱韦思环塔商贸公司的合同。
summary_sm1l1m5_3_001.en: Aleksandr admits that he used some tricks and reveals that he is actually working for Clavis TGCC Trading. He then tells you that Erikssohn is doing very poorly and offers you a contract from Clavis, claiming that partnering with his company will be a wiser choice.

summary_sm1l1m6_1_001.cn: 佩丽卡根据线索推测：亚历山大很可能在假冒克莱韦思环塔贸易公司的员工。你让狼卫跟着亚历山大，探寻亚历山大所隐瞒的事情。
summary_sm1l1m6_1_001.en: Perlica's intel suggests that Aleksandr may be masquerading as an employee of Clavis as well. You tell Wulfgard to shadow Aleksandr and try to find out what the agent is hiding.

summary_sm1l1m6_2_001.cn: 亚历山大确实曾经是克莱韦思环塔贸易公司的员工，汉斯似乎也并非是单纯路过。可以肯定的是，哈特曼被抢劫的事确实有亚历山大的参与。你们决定再去哈特曼被抢劫的地点看看。
summary_sm1l1m6_2_001.en: Aleksandr is a former employee of Clavis and Hans was not just passing by. It is quite certain that Aleksandr played a role in the attack on Hartmann. You decide to investigate the site of the attack again.

summary_sm1l1m6_4_001.cn: 汉斯背后的门德斯工业是哈特曼遇袭事件的幕后主导，目的是让亚历山大实行他自己的计划。你们决定与这三位业务员谈谈。
summary_sm1l1m6_4_001.en: Hans and his employer Mendez Manufacturing are the mastermind behind the attack on Hartmann. Their aim is to get Aleksandr to carry out his plans. You decide to have a chat with the three agents.

summary_sm1l1m6_5_001.cn: 面对铁证，临阵逃跑的汉斯和其背后的门德斯工业难逃其咎。哈特曼见到亚历山大可怜的模样也产生了恻隐之心。但是，终末地该继续与谁合作的决定权仍在你的手上。
summary_sm1l1m6_5_001.en: You reveal solid evidence. Though Hans flees the scene, he and his employer Mendez Manufacturing will have to answer for their actions. Hartmann also becomes sympathetic to Aleksandr's plight. Regardless, you still get to decide whom Endfield should work with.

summary_sm1l1m6_7_001.cn: 你回去找到了终末地工业的枢纽区基地的物流主管莎曼，告诉了她自己的抉择。
summary_sm1l1m6_7_001.en: You return to Salman, the logistics director of Endfield Industries at Hub Base, and inform her of your choice.

summary_sm1l1m7_1_001.cn: 四号谷地的危机刚刚平息，秦茳尺的工作繁多，抽不开身。你看到她忙碌的样子，决定替她分担一些工作。
summary_sm1l1m7_1_001.en: The Valley IV crisis has been recently averted but Director Qin is getting overwhelmed by work. You decide to help her share some of the burden.

summary_sm1l1m8_1_001.cn: 旧工厂区的工作人员莱科与莱雅想拜托你关闭不稳定的源石精炼炉。
summary_sm1l1m8_1_001.en: Lykor and Laeya are workers at the Old Factory. They need your help to shut down an unstable Originium Refining Unit.

summary_sm1l1m8_4_001.cn: 灾难对莱雅的冲击太大，让她不敢再接近现场。安抚过莱雅后，莱科决定自己一个人带你进去操作。
summary_sm1l1m8_4_001.en: The disaster has severely traumatized Laeya and she is too scared to enter the site itself. After comforting her, Lykor decides to take you into the place on his own so that you can perform the repairs.

summary_sm1l1m8_5_001.cn: 克服恐惧跟上你们的莱雅迅速找到了症结所在。她负责处理坏掉的控制终端，你需要将另外一个控制终端的电源关掉。
summary_sm1l1m8_5_001.en: Laeya overcomes her fears and catches up with you. She then identifies the source of the problem and takes it upon herself to fix the broken terminal. You must help her by shutting off the power to the other terminal.

summary_sm1l1m8_6_001.cn: 成功关停设备后，莱雅重新找回了勇气。塔卫二上仍然存在许多威胁，只有铭记使命、互相支持，才能在危难中坚持下来。
summary_sm1l1m8_6_001.en: Laeya rediscovers her courage after successfully switching off the facility. Many threats still exist on Talos-II. Only those who remember their duty and work with each other can endure these dangers.

summary_sm1l1m9_14_001.cn: 你解决了物资与药品的燃眉之急，但那些留在工人们心中的创口还需要时间来修复。
summary_sm1l1m9_14_001.en: You have solved the shortage of supplies and medication. The wounds of the mind, however, will need some time to heal.

summary_sm1l1m9_15_001.cn: 埃里克对自己无法帮助工人们恢复情绪感到沮丧。你和卢告诉他，很多事情只能交给时间。
summary_sm1l1m9_15_001.en: Eric feels sad when he realizes there is nothing he can do to help his crew feel better. You and Lou tell him that only time can mend the wounds.

summary_sm1l1m9_1_001.cn: 埃里克与卢向你介绍了工人之家恢复工作的情况。你打算和埃里克一起了解工人们的实际需求。
summary_sm1l1m9_1_001.en: Eric and Lou update you on the Worker Dorms repairs. You figure it's best to tag along with Eric and hear the workers out directly.

summary_sm1l1m9_2_001.cn: 你了解到，目前这里医疗物资短缺的问题较为棘手。
summary_sm1l1m9_2_001.en: The shortage of medical supplies is a serious problem.

summary_sm1l1m9_3_001.cn: 工团的老人威尔伯告诉你，工团物流站站长埃斯顿受伤了，他曾叮嘱过威尔伯有一批物资近期会到，但不知为何一直没有消息。
summary_sm1l1m9_3_001.en: UWST veteran Wilbur informs you that UWST logistics station monitor Eston has been wounded. Eston told Wilbur to expect incoming supplies, but they never arrived.

summary_sm1l1m9_4_001.cn: 名叫斯坦利的孩子告诉你，他想要听些音乐。
summary_sm1l1m9_4_001.en: A boy named Stanley hopes to listen to some music

summary_sm1l1m9_5_001.cn: 你和埃里克认为，目前工人们的需求主要集中在药品和物资两个方面。
summary_sm1l1m9_5_001.en: Medicine and supplies are the two most pressing needs of the crew.

summary_sm1l2m1_0d5_011.cn: 得知干员弧光发出了援助请求，你们决定找她本人问问情况。
summary_sm1l2m1_0d5_011.en: You learn that Operator Arclight sends out a request for help. You decide to talk to her and ask about the situation.

summary_sm1l2m1_1_001.cn: 前方等待你们的人不是弧光，而是卡贾。原来，难民暂居处的米娅失踪了，是卡贾拜托弧光联系终末地寻求帮助。弧光已经沿着米娅涂改过的裂地者涂鸦前去寻找了，你们决定也顺着这个线索找下去。
summary_sm1l2m1_1_001.en: You expect to meet with Arclight but Karja shows up instead. Turns out that Mia of the refugee camp has gone missing and he asked Arclight to call Endfield for help. Arclight has already started the search by tracking down Landbreaker graffiti that Mia drew over. You decide to follow the same clues.

summary_sm1l2m1_2_001.cn: 你们在最后的涂鸦前发现了米娅的笔，地面上残留着打斗的痕迹。这里曾经是碾骨氏族的领地，你们需要小心前进。
summary_sm1l2m1_2_001.en: You find Mia's brush at the last graffiti as well as signs of fighting. A Bonekrushers "lab" is up ahead. You decide to proceed carefully.

summary_sm1l2m1_3_001.cn: 你们见到了弧光，她在山壁上发现了一处暗门。佩丽卡建议你做一次扫描，以寻找打开暗门的机关。
summary_sm1l2m1_3_001.en: You meet Arclight. She has found a secret door in the rock wall. Perlica suggests performing a scan to reveal the door opening mechanism.

summary_sm1l2m1_4_001.cn: 弧光的源石技艺对机关无效。问题似乎出在源石电路上，你尝试使用自己的的力量修复开门机关。
summary_sm1l2m1_4_001.en: Arclight's Originium Arts fail to work on the mechanism. You suspect the problem lies in the Originium circuitry, so you attempt to use your powers to repair the door switch.

summary_sm1l2m2_10_001.cn: 你们终于离开了地牢，重见天日。众生长地与弧光给你留下了深刻的印象。在未来的日子里，作为游人与终末地干员的她，还会与你再次相遇。
summary_sm1l2m2_10_001.en: You left the cave and returned to the surface. Arclight and the Hannabit Circuit have left you quite an impression. You have a feeling that the Songseeker and Endfield Operator Arclight will cross paths with you again.

summary_sm1l2m2_11_001.cn: 你们护送米娅与扎克等人回到难民暂居处。米娅与家人重逢的场景令所有人动容，扎克一行人也找到了新的家园，准备开启全新的生活。
summary_sm1l2m2_11_001.en: You escort Mia, Zach, and the other refugees to the refugee camp. Mia's reunion with her family is especially touching. Zach and his friends also receive a new home and prepare themselves for new lives ahead of them.

summary_sm1l2m2_2_001.cn: 你们找到了米娅，迷路的她被几位“哥哥姐姐”搭救了。根据米娅的描述，救她的人目前处境十分危险，你们决定尽快寻找到他们。
summary_sm1l2m2_2_001.en: You find Mia. She told you she got lost but was rescued by several grown-ups. From what Mia said, you deduce that those who rescued her are in danger. You decide to locate them quickly.

summary_sm1l2m2_3_001.cn: 你们在一个牢房里找到了搭救米娅的人。其中一人名叫扎克，他告诉你们，对面路上的小房间里应该有开启铁门的钥匙。
summary_sm1l2m2_3_001.en: You find the people who rescued Mia in one of the cells. A nomad named Zach tells you to find the cage key from the room on the opposite side of the road.

summary_sm1l2m2_4_001.cn: 弧光可以制作热能刀切开牢门，你们需要搜集一些制作会用到的金属元件。
summary_sm1l2m2_4_001.en: Arclight can craft a thermal lance for cutting through the cage door. Collect some metal components needed for the crafting.

summary_sm1l2m2_5_001.cn: 似乎有裂地者袭来，你们需要掩护弧光进行“热指头”的制作。
summary_sm1l2m2_5_001.en: SCENE: Landbreakers might be attacking. You must protect Arclight while she's crafting the hot finger.

summary_sm1l2m2_7_001.cn: 扎克一行人感谢了你们的救命之恩。你们决定把他们带回难民暂居处。
summary_sm1l2m2_7_001.en: Zach and his group thank you for the rescue. You make the call to escort them back to the refugee camp.

summary_sm1l2m2_8_001.cn: 担忧的逃难者仍对四号谷地的危险心有余悸，弧光告诉对方会带他们去安全的难民暂居地。
summary_sm1l2m2_8_001.en: People are still worried and fearful of the crisis that struck Valley IV. Arclight assures them she will take them to a secure shelter.

summary_sm1l2m3_1_001.cn: 你们救出了一位名叫瓦茨的神秘人物。他的行李被裂地者夺去，在将其寻回之前，瓦茨不打算离开。
summary_sm1l2m3_1_001.en: You save a mysterious prisoner named Waitz. His luggage has been seized by the Landbreakers. Waitz does not intend to leave until he recovers all of them.

summary_sm1l2m3_2_001.cn: 你们找回了瓦茨丢失的行李，但他的失物不止一件，他打算自行寻找剩余的部分。
summary_sm1l2m3_2_001.en: Waitz's recovered belongings now sit secured, but the job's only half-done. He insists on tracking down the remaining items himself.

summary_sm1l2m3_3_001.cn: 你们再次找到了瓦茨，决定帮助他从裂地者手中找回遗失的货物。
summary_sm1l2m3_3_001.en: You find Waitz once again and decide to help reclaim his cargo,

summary_sm1l2m3_4_001.cn: 你们追回了一些货物，瓦茨认为剩余的部分可能被裂地者藏进了山洞。
summary_sm1l2m3_4_001.en: You recover part of the cargo. Waitz suspects the Landbreakers have stashed the remainder in the caverns ahead.

summary_sm1l2m3_5_001.cn: 瓦茨称，他丢失的货物里有一些对四号谷地至关重要的物品，可以拯救许多危难中的生命。
summary_sm1l2m3_5_001.en: Those crates held more than goods. They carry Valley IV's survival.

summary_sm1l2m3_7_001.cn: 你终于发现，瓦茨所谓“至关重要的物品”实际上是一组应急物资。得知四号谷地发生意外，他第一时间准备了物资，志愿前来提供帮助。
summary_sm1l2m3_7_001.en: You finally realize that Waitz's cargo of utmost importance is just a batch of emergency supplies. After learning of the crisis in Valley IV, he prepped a batch of supplies, brought them here on his own, and volunteered to give help.

summary_sm1l2m3_8_001.cn: 你帮瓦茨找回了所有物资，他希望能与四号谷地还在运作的管理机构合作，将它们分发出去。
summary_sm1l2m3_8_001.en: You help Waitz recover all the supplies. He wishes to work with various organizations in Valley IV to distribute his provisions.

summary_sm1l2m4_3_001.cn: 你找到的裂地者“宝藏”正是工团丢失的胶棉炸药。在联系萨特前来回收后，事情总算告一段落。
summary_sm1l2m4_3_001.en: The Landbreakers' "treasure trove" you find happens to be the missing UWST gel-cotton. You call Satyr to collect his explosives and conclude the mission.

summary_sm1l3m1_0d2_001.cn: 这道门通往阿伯莉采石场。
summary_sm1l3m1_0d2_001.en: This gate leads to the Aburrey Quarry.

summary_sm1l3m1_1_001.cn: 你见到了陈千语。此处与阿伯莉采石场还有些距离，你们需要寻找进入采石场的方法。
summary_sm1l3m1_1_001.en: You meet Chen Qianyu not too far from the Aburrey Quarry. You must find a way to get inside the place.

summary_sm1l3m1_2_001.cn: 你们见到了阿伯莉采石场的负责人拉蒙，他想寻找失联的工友。但道路被毁，你们需要先维修好采石场的大型起重机才能连通道路。你决定先去看看起重机供电中枢的情况。
summary_sm1l3m1_2_001.en: You meet the Aburrey Quarry monitor Ramon. He wants to find fellow crew mates who went offline. However, many paths in the quarry have been destroyed. The super lifting crane must be repaired to access various locations. You decide to look at the power nexus of the super crane.

summary_sm1l3m2_10_001.cn: 佩妮告诉你们：跳到吊臂上方，从附近的维修通道下去后再调整吊臂的角度，就能搭出一条通往深层管理区的路了。
summary_sm1l3m2_10_001.en: Penny tells you to jump to the top of the crane arm, head down via the maintenance shaft close by, then turn the arm to the proper angle to create a path to the Deep Management Post.

summary_sm1l3m2_11d1_001.cn: 通讯中传来异响，在吊臂上方待命的工团救援小组似乎遇到了什么麻烦。
summary_sm1l3m2_11d1_001.en: You hear strange noises through your handyterm. The UWST SAR crew standing by the crane arm seems to be in trouble.

summary_sm1l3m2_12_001.cn: 你与陈千语决定立即前去查看工团救援小组的情况。
summary_sm1l3m2_12_001.en: You and Chen decide to check if the UWST SAR Crew is alright.

summary_sm1l3m2_1_001.cn: 维修起重机的供电中枢还需要用到起重机改造时使用的图纸，采石场旧址——“联络区”的档案库内，应该还保留着它。你与陈千语需要利用起重机的吊舱前往联络区。
summary_sm1l3m2_1_001.en: You need the schematics once used when modifying the super crane power nexus. A copy should be kept at the Archives in the Listening Post (which used to be the Old Quarry). You and Chen must use the super crane lifting cage to reach the Listening Post.

summary_sm1l3m2_3_001.cn: 被搭救的工团成员米菈惦记着未完成的重要工作，她也需要前往档案库，陈千语邀请她与你们同行。
summary_sm1l3m2_3_001.en: You save Mila, a UWST crew mate, but she intends to complete her important job. Since she is also going to the Archive, Chen invites her to join your team.

summary_sm1l3m2_4_001.cn: 米菈仍有工作需要完成。你们研读图纸后与她告别，准备返回吊运中枢。
summary_sm1l3m2_4_001.en: You finish reading the schematics and prepare to return to the Lifter Central. Mila decides to stay behind and finish her job.

summary_sm1l3m2_6_001.cn: 起重机被成功重启了。你察觉到了拉蒙的异样：原来，阿伯莉采石场即将被关闭，采石场的大家都有些依依不舍。在这最后的时间里，他希望可以让更多人好好告别，安全离开——这便是他能做到的最好的“收尾工作”了。
summary_sm1l3m2_6_001.en: You successfully reactivate the super crane but notice something strange about Ramon. Turns out that the Aburrey Quarry will be shutting down and the quarry crew seems very attached to this site. Ramon hopes the crew can leave the place and say their farewells safely. This is his final closing job for this place.

summary_sm1l3m2_7_001.cn: 你与陈千语决定前往采石作业区。
summary_sm1l3m2_7_001.en: You and Chen decide to go to the Quarry Site.

summary_sm1l3m2_8_001.cn: 有声音阻止了你们前进——一位老妇人劝你们别走这条不太好走的路。
summary_sm1l3m2_8_001.en: You suddenly hear an old lady warning you not to take the more difficult path.

summary_sm1l3m2_9_001.cn: 老妇人名叫佩妮——正是拉蒙一直在寻找的人。她认出了你们来自终末地。得知你们要去深层管理区，佩妮爽快地为你们带路。
summary_sm1l3m2_9_001.en: The old lady, Penny, is the one that Ramon has been looking for. She knows you are Endfielders and when she hears you are headed towards the Deep Management Post, she happily agrees to lead the way.

summary_sm1l3m3_1_001.cn: 工团的救援人手短缺，你们决定出手相助。工团救援人员交给了你们一张电梯钥匙卡，利用它便可通过电梯深入深层管理区实施救援了。
summary_sm1l3m3_1_001.en: You decide to help the understaffed UWST SAR Crew. The SAR crew mates give you an elevator key card. The elevator will take you down into the Deep Management Post for the SAR mission.

summary_sm1l3m3_2_001.cn: 你们营救了几名工团成员。其中一名叫菲莉丝的工友告诉你们，只要修好一旁的备用电梯，他们便可直接撤离回地面了。
summary_sm1l3m3_2_001.en: You rescue several UWST crew mates. One of them, Phyllis, tells you that you can simply repair the backup elevator nearby. The elevator will take everyone directly to the surface.

summary_sm1l3m3_2d4_001.cn: 菲莉丝并非深层管理区的工作人员，她来到此地是为了寻找有关阿伯莉采石场的资料，并试图从中找到一些能避免采石场被关停的方法。
summary_sm1l3m3_2d4_001.en: Phyllis is not a crew mate of the Deep Management Post. She came to this place looking for data about the Aburrey Quarry as she is trying to find ways to prevent the Quarry from getting shut down.

summary_sm1l3m3_3_001.cn: 众人终于重见天日。拉蒙联络你们返回吊运中枢。
summary_sm1l3m3_3_001.en: You and the crew return to the surface. Ramon contacts you and you return to Lifter Central.

summary_sm1l3m3_4_001.cn: 拉蒙感谢了你们。米菈、佩妮和菲莉丝也回来了，陈千语建议你过去看看。
summary_sm1l3m3_4_001.en: Ramon thanks you for your help. Mila, Penny, and Phyllis have returned. Chen asks if you can go and meet them.

summary_sm1l3m3_5_001.cn: 原来，佩妮早已为阿伯莉采石场的众人争取了更好的待遇。她甚至递交了申请，包括起重机在内的许多设备可以与大家一同搬迁到新的采石场。
summary_sm1l3m3_5_001.en: Penny has been fighting for better pay for the Aburrey Quarry crew. She even submitted an application to move the fleet of machinery, including the super crane, to the new quarry.

summary_sm1l3m3_5d3_001.cn: 佩妮希望自己的徒弟们有着属于自己的道路。
summary_sm1l3m3_5d3_001.en: Penny wants her apprentices to start their own careers properly.

summary_sm1l5m1_10_001.cn: 似乎不是这位拍展示照的男士。
summary_sm1l5m1_10_001.en: Hmm. I'm afraid our businessman taking display photos ... isn't the journalist we're looking for.

summary_sm1l5m1_11_001.cn: 似乎不是这位借用眼镜的小姑娘。
summary_sm1l5m1_11_001.en: The girl wearing someone else's glasses is not the one.

summary_sm1l5m1_12_001.cn: 似乎不是这位要与人私奔的女士。
summary_sm1l5m1_12_001.en: The eloping lady is probably not the one.

summary_sm1l5m1_13_001.cn: 眼前这位可疑的女士，正是“那名记者”——拉奎尔·琼斯。你们联系了艾莱扎·柯林斯，准备与她会合。
summary_sm1l5m1_13_001.en: This suspicious lady happens to be Raquel Jones, the journalist you are looking for. You call Aleeza Collins to meet up with you.

summary_sm1l5m1_14_001.cn: 拉奎尔拒绝立刻离开四号谷地，艾莱扎·柯林斯将她带回工团看管。艾维文娜决定问问在环塔商会的记者朋友是否有能说服拉奎尔的办法。有消息之后，她会来联系你。
summary_sm1l5m1_14_001.en: Raquel refuses to leave Valley IV immediately. Aleeza Collins has no choice but to bring her back to the UWST camp where she will be detained. Avywenna decides to ask if her TGCC journalist friends can persuade Raquel to head back. She will give you a call once she makes progress.

summary_sm1l5m1_1_001.cn: 一位疑似来自环塔商会的记者一直在扰乱工团的工作。法比安·柯林斯拜托终末地从中调停，将对方送离四号谷地。这名记者正在难民暂居处内，艾莱扎·柯林斯已经前去调查情况了。
summary_sm1l5m1_1_001.en: A suspicious journalist from the TGCC is disrupting work at a UWST site. Fabian Collins asks if Endfield can help escort the Bander out of Valley IV. The reporter is currently hiding in the Valley Pass Camp. Aleeza Collins has already gone ahead to investigate.

summary_sm1l5m1_3_001.cn: 你遇见了一位信使装扮的卡特斯女性，她叫艾维文娜，就职于终末地，是这次与你一同行动的搭档。
summary_sm1l5m1_3_001.en: You meet a Cautus messenger named Avywenna. She is an Endfielder and your partner for this mission.

summary_sm1l5m1_4_001.cn: 艾维文娜推测那名记者是一位戴眼镜的菲林女性。考虑到她或许会变装，其他的信息暂时无法确定。
summary_sm1l5m1_4_001.en: Avywenna believes the Bander journalist is a Feline woman with glasses. Other pointers cannot be verified as the journalist is reputedly a master of disguise.

summary_sm1l5m1_5_001.cn: 这名菲林男性因为拍照，与工团的人起了矛盾，但似乎只是普通的小纠纷。
summary_sm1l5m1_5_001.en: A Feline man got into an altercation with a UWST crew mate for taking photographs, but the incident feels like a common argument.

summary_sm1l5m1_6_001.cn: 这名菲林女性正戴着眼镜玩耍，但她的视力似乎是正常的。
summary_sm1l5m1_6_001.en: A Feline Woman is playing around with glasses but her eyesight seems to be normal.

summary_sm1l5m1_7_001.cn: 这名菲林女性的行为鬼鬼祟祟，但她看上去非常紧张，似乎在等待谁。
summary_sm1l5m1_7_001.en: You see a suspicious Feline Lady. She looks very nervous and seems to be waiting for someone.

summary_sm1l5m1_8_001.cn: 这名菲林女性看上去平平无奇，但气质与这里格格不入。她似乎在记录着什么。
summary_sm1l5m1_8_001.en: This Feline woman appears pretty ordinary but her actions do not look very local. She seems to be taking notes of various things.

summary_sm1l5m2_1_001.cn: 拉奎尔逃走了。在你和艾维文娜准备前往寻找她的时候，一个陌生的号码联络上了艾维文娜。
summary_sm1l5m2_1_001.en: Raquel has escaped. You and Avywenna are preparing to go after her when the Cautus messenger receives a mysterious call.

summary_sm1l5m2_6_001.cn: 遗落的终端似乎表明了拉奎尔被裂地者掳走的可能性。现在追踪这群裂地者的去向还来得及。
summary_sm1l5m2_6_001.en: The lost handyterm seems to suggest that Raquel has been captured by the Landbreakers. You still have time to catch up to these LBs and rescue the Bander journalist.

summary_sm1l5m2_7_001.cn: 你们成功搭救了拉奎尔。她惊惧之余，似乎也有了新的灵感。她表示这次会乖乖听话。
summary_sm1l5m2_7_001.en: You successfully save Raquel. Though terrified by the ordeal, she seems to have acquired a new inspiration. The journalist promises to behave this time.

summary_sm1l5m2_8_001.cn: 终末地的干员护送拉奎尔离开了四号谷地。艾维文娜圆满完成了任务，与你告别。
summary_sm1l5m2_8_001.en: A team of Endfielders escorts Raquel safely away from Valley IV. Avywenna concludes her mission and says goodbye.

summary_sm1l6m1_1_001.cn: 矿区营地药物短缺的情况严重，药物很可能是在运输过程中出了意外。一位名叫莉莉卡的女孩需要急救，佩丽卡决定为小女孩先使用应急的便携药物。
summary_sm1l6m1_1_001.en: The Mining Camp is extremely short on medication. The Endfield medical supplies probably met an accident during transportation. A girl named Lilica is in desperate need of help. Perlica decides to administer some emergency portable medication.

summary_sm1l6m1_2_011.cn: 你们把莉莉卡送到病床上，还发现了莉莉卡口中“莫莉姐姐”的证件。
summary_sm1l6m1_2_011.en: You help Lilica to her bed and find an ID belonging to Molly — someone Lilica mentioned.

summary_sm1l6m1_3_001.cn: 莫莉是一名优秀的工团成员，她似乎在调查药物丢失一事。你认为，当务之急是找到那些不知去向的药物。
summary_sm1l6m1_3_001.en: Molly is an outstanding UWST crew mate and she seems to be investigating the missing medical supplies. You decide that the top priority is to locate the lost medication.

summary_sm1l6m1_4_001.cn: 一个来自工团的求救信号自废弃的气候监测站传来。那里早已成为裂地者的领地。你决定跟随求救信号前往气候监测站。
summary_sm1l6m1_4_001.en: You receive a UWST distress call from an abandoned meteorological station. The place has been occupied by the Landbreakers for a while. You decide to trace the call and head to the facility.

summary_sm1l6m1_5_001.cn: 几名工团成员潜入气候监测站寻回药物的时候，遭遇了裂地者。莫莉为了帮三位工友殿后，没能成功逃离裂地者的追捕。你们决定跟随带路的工团成员前去解救莫莉。
summary_sm1l6m1_5_001.en: Several UWST crew mates attempted to sneak into the meteorological station to recover the medical supplies. Unfortunately, they encountered the Landbreakers. Molly covered the retreat of three crew mates but ended up being captured by the raiders. You decide to follow the UWST crew into the facility and rescue Molly.

summary_sm1l6m1_6_001.cn: 菲奥娜发来了该区域的图纸，她提到有一处废弃的下水管道很适合潜入。你们告别了带路的工团成员，准备从下水管道潜入气候监测站。
summary_sm1l6m1_6_001.en: Fiona sends you the plans and layouts of this area. She mentions an abandoned sewer line that is perfect for sneaking into the meteorological station. You tell the UWST crew to head back and prepare yourself for the infiltration mission.

summary_sm1l6m2_1_001.cn: 你们看到莫莉正在被裂地者审问，莫莉没有回答，而是质问对方药品的位置。
summary_sm1l6m2_1_001.en: You see Landbreakers interrogating Molly, but she refuses to answer. Instead, she questions them about the location of the medical supplies.

summary_sm1l6m2_3_001.cn: 你们需要想办法避开侵蚀，离开这里。
summary_sm1l6m2_3_001.en: You must find a way through the Blight and leave this place.

summary_sm1l6m2_4_001.cn: 莫莉与裂地者谈判，试图劝他们还回药物。裂地者轻蔑地拒绝了她，并粗暴地毁坏了药物。此时，佩丽卡与你及时出现，与裂地者对峙。
summary_sm1l6m2_4_001.en: Molly tries to negotiate with the Landbreakers and offers herself in exchange for the medical supplies. The Chief rejects her outright and violently smashes the supplies. You and Perlica arrive at the scene and face off the LB brute.

summary_sm1l6m2_5_001.cn: 佩丽卡告知你还有部分药物可以回收利用。莫莉谢过你们，表示自己需要独自一个人走走。
summary_sm1l6m2_5_001.en: Perlica tells you that part of the medical supplies can still be salvaged. Molly thanks you and says she prefers being left alone for now.

summary_sm1l6m2_6_001.cn: 你们从越医生那里得知，莫莉自己申请了处分。佩丽卡传来消息：新一批药物很快便可以启运了。
summary_sm1l6m2_6_001.en: Molly applies for administrative punishment while Perlica sends you news. Delivery of the second batch of medical supplies will begin shortly.

summary_sm1l6m2_7_001.cn: 你们又见到了莫莉，她对重回基层岗位后的生活适应良好，但裂地者的生存法则还是对她的理念造成了冲击。
summary_sm1l6m2_7_001.en: You meet Molly again. She seems to be taking her demotion to a crew mate pretty well. However, the Landbreakers' rule of survival severely challenged her beliefs and ideals.

summary_sm1l6m3_17_001.cn: 你们赶往营地西北边的大门，发现詹娜正与马特维争执。你及时劝服了詹娜，阿丽娅也出言安抚了她的情绪，将她送回家中。
summary_sm1l6m3_17_001.en: You rush to the northwestern gate and find Jenner arguing with Matvei. You manage to convince Jenner in time. Alia also soothes her emotions and escorts her back home.

summary_sm1l6m3_1_001.cn: 你得知詹娜的病情很可能是矿石病导致的，而越医生为了给她配药，目前急需一批新的药材。
summary_sm1l6m3_1_001.en: You learn that Jenner's disease is probably caused by Oripathy. Medical Officer Yue needs a batch of new medical ingredients right now to give Jenner treatment.

summary_sm1l6m3_3_001.cn: 醒来的詹娜竟然没能认出阿丽娅，反而一眼认出了你。而在她的描述中，源石大树似乎还安然无恙……
summary_sm1l6m3_3_001.en: Jenner is awake but doesn't recognize Alia. Instead, she identifies you immediately. From her words, she seems to think that the Great Originium Oak is still around...

summary_sm1l6m3_4_001.cn: 越医生提醒你们，詹娜应该是出现了记忆回退，考虑到她的身体状况，尽量避免让她受到强烈刺激。你们意识到必须想办法向詹娜隐瞒源石大树已经被炸毁一事。而就在这时，詹娜那边似乎出现了新情况……
summary_sm1l6m3_4_001.en: Medical Officer Yue reminds you that Jenner's memory may be suffering from age regression. Given her physical condition, the best approach is to avoid exposing her to strong stimuli. You realize that you must figure out a way to hide the fact from Jenner that the Great Originium Oak has been blown up. While you are discussing, something happens to Jenner again...

summary_sm1l6m3_6_001.cn: 你们来到食堂，发现詹娜正与厨师争执，她质疑厨师竟然不会做工团的特色菜黄油羽兽。在和厨师解释了詹娜的特殊情况后，为了让詹娜吃到记忆中的菜肴，你决定向她询问这道菜的菜谱。
summary_sm1l6m3_6_001.en: You arrive at the canteen and find Jenner arguing with the chef. She questions why the chef doesn't know how to make the UWST signature dish of butter fowl. You inform the chef of Jenner's special condition. In order to serve Jenner the dish from her memories, you decide to ask her for its recipe.

summary_sm1l6m3_6d5_001.cn: 你从詹娜口中获悉了黄油羽兽的菜谱，并将之转告给了厨师。为了帮助厨师完成这道菜，你决定出发寻找缺少的食材——番茄罐头。
summary_sm1l6m3_6d5_001.en: You learn the butter fowl recipe from Jenner and inform the chef. To help out, you decide to hunt down the missing touch - canned tomatoes.

summary_sm1l6m3_8_001.cn: 你与马特维回到矿区营地，修建阻路工事的工团成员正因为人手不足而烦恼，马特维决定留下帮助他们，而你则需要尽快将找到的食材送往食堂。
summary_sm1l6m3_8_001.en: Matvei and you return to the Mining Camp. The UWST crew mates making the road barricades need more people, so Matvei decides to stay and help them. You, on the other hand, need to find the ingredients quickly and send them to the canteen.

summary_sm1l6m3_9_001.cn: 回到食堂，你将找到的番茄罐头交给了厨师。之后，詹娜终于吃上了久违的黄油羽兽，但她也因此回忆起当年广播会播放而如今却未能听到的歌曲，现实与记忆的矛盾令她陷入某种恍惚。
